item.trans: art. 一；任一；每一 row A in a cinema电影院第一排座位
art. 一；任一；每一 row A in a cinema电影院第一排座位
art. 一；任一；每一 row A in a cinema电影院第一排座位
n. 狂热；放任 vt. 遗弃；放弃 同义词:loose, mania, desert, yield, quit He abandoned all hope.他放弃一切希望。
n. 抛弃；放纵 同义词:rejection, loose If it fails , it could heighten the sense of abandonment .如果它失败了，就将加剧被遗弃的意识。
vt. 缩写，使省略；使简短 vi. 使用缩写词 同义词:syncopate The ceremony was abbreviated by rain.因为下雨，仪式从简。
n. 磨损；磨耗；擦伤 同义词:wear and tear, arrosion Standard silicon carbide seals provide high resistance to abrasion and corrosion over a wide range of temperature extremes.标准金刚砂密封，在高温或低温状态下，仍然具有强大的耐磨损和耐腐蚀能力。
n. 摘要；抽象；抽象的概念 adj. 抽象的；深奥的 vt. 摘要；提取；使……抽象化 vi. 做摘要；写梗概 同义词:brief, summary, resume, deep, nonobjective, extract, brief to abstract juice from an orange从橘子中提取液汁
adj. 荒谬的；可笑的 n. 荒诞；荒诞作品 同义词:ridiculous, preposterous He revolted against absurd idea .他厌恶那种荒谬的想法。
n. 充裕，丰富 同义词:plenty, pregnancy, amplitude, enrichment Wealth allows them to be indulged in abundance .财富让人类沉溺于大量的享受。
adj. 丰富的；充裕的；盛产 同义词:full, ample, plentiful, luxurious Abundant hair sprouted from his broad chest .他宽阔的胸膛上长出许多毛。
vt. 使……加快；使……增速 vi. 加速；促进；增加 同义词:improve, increase speed to accelerate one's steps加快步伐
adj. 促进的，[物] 加速的；催化的 同义词:stimulative, catalytical to accelerate one's steps加快步伐

vt. 使用；存取；接近 n. 进入；使用权；通路 同义词:make use of, fashion, employ, border, exercise, opening, admittance Bank customers can access their checking accounts instantly through the electronic system.银行户主可通过电子系统即刻查找自己的支票活期存款账户。(或：银行客户可通过电子系统立即取出活期存款。)
adj. 受到赞扬的 v. 欢呼（acclaim的过去式及过去分词） The crowd acclaimed the winners.群众为获胜者喝彩。
vt. 容纳；使适应；供应；调解 vi. 适应；调解 同义词:adapt, contain, suit, accept, serve, adjust, adapt to something to accommodate oneself to circumstances使自己适应情况(或环境)
n. 伴奏；伴随物 同义词:obbligato Athletes , with or without the accompaniment of music .运动员无论在有无音乐伴奏的情况下。
vt. 陪伴，伴随；伴奏 vi. 伴奏，伴唱 同义词:attend, keep company Please accompany me on my walk.请陪我散步。
adj. 可折叠的 n. 手风琴 同义词:folding, collapsable, squeezebox The impact accordioned the car beneath the truck.砰地一撞，小轿车在卡车底下被压扁了。
vi. 累积；积聚 vt. 积攒 同义词:store up, scrape up to accumulate great wealth by hard work靠勤劳积攒大量财富

adj. 习惯的；通常的；独有的 v. 使习惯于（accustom的过去分词） 同义词:usual, used, particular, common, exclusive accustomed to the process might take a couple of months as you figure out how to prioritize spending .你也许需要数月的时间不断了解如何优先化开支，并对这一过程养成习惯。
n. 熟人；相识；了解；知道 同义词:knowledge, awareness Should auld acquaintance be forgot and never brought to mind ?旧日朋友怎能相忘，怎能不深埋心中？
n. 首字母缩略词 同义词:initialism The committee's name has been acronymed NACA.该委员会的名称被缩合成NACA。
adj. 严重的，[医] 急性的；敏锐的；激烈的；尖声的 同义词:serious, bad, keen In short the joy was ephemeral and the hangover acute .简言之，欢乐是短暂的，纵情后的头痛是严重的。
vt. 使适应；改编 vi. 适应 同义词:condition, suit, season, adjust, accomodate to, accommodate to I suggested he should adapt himself to his new conditions.我认为他应该使自己适应新的情况。
adj. 适合的；能适应的；可修改的 同义词:calculated, propitious Adaptable -- It is possible to build a clockwork system that can adjust to predetermined stimuli .适应性——可以建立一个可调节的钟控系统来预定刺激物。
n. 适应；改编；改编本，改写本 同义词:orientation, reorganization This movie is an adaptation from a real story .这部电影是从真实故事改编而成的。
n. 添加剂，添加物 adj. 附加的；[数] 加法的 同义词:addition agent, make weight, attached, plus, more, second, excess Some food additive are regarded as beneficial by the manufacturer .有些食品添加物，生产者认为是有用的。

adj. 熟练的；擅长…的 n. 内行；能手 同义词:experienced, skilled, accomplished, clever, practiced, expert, sharp How many college students in Taiwan are more adept at Internet use and software than they are at human relationships ?有多少台湾大学生们正在变得越来越熟识互联网和软件的使用而疏于人际关系呢？
adj. 邻近的，毗连的 同义词:nearby, neighbor China owns indisputable sovereignty over the Nansha Islands and their adjacent waters .中方对南沙群岛及其附近海域拥有无可争辩的主权。

adj. 邻接的；毗连的 v. 邻接（adjoin的ing形式） 同义词:adjacent, conterminal A city of east-central Illinois adjoining Urbana. It was founded in 1855 with the coming of the railroad . Population , 63, 502.美国伊利诺斯州中东部一城市，与乌巴马毗邻处的。1855年随着铁路的修建而建立。人口63，502。
vt. 调整，使…适合；校准 vi. 调整，校准；适应 同义词:regulate, coordinate, frame, restructure, correct, adapt to something He adjusted himself to new conditions.他使自己适应新情况。

n. 调整，调节；调节器 同义词:restructuring, conditioning, modulation, setup, accommodation The problem , however , is that the scale of adjustment may be too big to achieve by cuts alone .然而，现在的问题是，调整的规模可能太大了，仅靠削减支出难以实现增长。
n. 土砖，砖坯 But people who work with adobe must experiment .但是从事土坯工作的人必须做试验。
vt. 采取；接受；收养；正式通过 vi. 采取；过继 同义词:assume, take in sth The committee ultimately adopted his suggestions.委员会最终采纳了他的建议。
vt. 装饰；使生色 同义词:paint, hang garlands of flowers adorning her hair她头上戴着的花环
n. 装饰；装饰品 同义词:decoration, dressing Mary was busy with the adornment of the room .玛丽正忙着布置她的房间。

n. 到来；出现；基督降临；基督降临节 同义词:arrival, occurrence, emergence, appearance, rise What happened in Japan qualified, as did the advent of mass production in America a century ago .在日本发生的正是这种变革，就像一个世纪前在美国出现的规模化生产一样。

adj. 不利的；相反的；敌对的（名词adverseness，副词adversely） 同义词:against, contrary, opposite, counter, cross A second error was that Japan tried to offset the adverse economic effects of a strong yen with over- lax monetary policy .第二个错误是日本试图用过度宽松的货币政策来冲销强势日元带来的负面经济效应。
adv. 不利地；逆地；反对地 同义词:ill, disadvantageously Most of the evidence indicates that noise affects adversely higher mental task output .许多迹象表明噪音对较高级脑力工作成果有不利影响。
n. 逆境；不幸；灾难；灾祸 同义词:disaster, tragedy, evil, grief Adversity leads to prosperity .灾难使人走向繁荣。
vt. 提倡，主张，拥护 n. 提倡者；支持者；律师 同义词:maintain, submit, prophet, supporter passionately advocate economic reforms热烈拥护经济改革
adj. 美的；美学的；审美的，具有审美趣味的 同义词:esthetical High quality of conception or execution , as found in works of beauty ; aesthetic value .高质量的观念或制作，如表现在美的作品中的；美学价值。
adv. 审美地；美学观点上地 It aims to identify the characteristic value of aesthetically satisfying objects .它的目的在于鉴别审美快感的物体所特有的价值。
vt. 影响；感染；感动；假装 vi. 倾向；喜欢 n. 情感；引起感情的因素 同义词:influence, impact of, impact on, catch, contract, tend, prefer, emotion, will, sensibility Bright light affects the eyes.明亮的光线影响视力。

adj. 受到影响的；做作的；假装的 vt. 影响；假装；使…感动（affect的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:assumed, simulate The researchers found that the virus affected every part of fire - ant development , including the eggs .研究者们发现这种病毒会在火蚂蚁成长的各个阶段感染，包括卵。
n. 联号；隶属的机构等 vt. 使附属；接纳；使紧密联系 vi. 参加，加入；发生联系 同义词:associated company, receive, take on sb, participate in, take part in, go through to affiliate oneself to (或 with) a party加入某政党
vt. 折磨；使痛苦；使苦恼 同义词:harry, worry, trouble, tear, devil She has been much afflicted by this sad news.她为此不幸的消息感到很难过。
adj. 富裕的；丰富的；流畅的 n. 支流；富人 同义词:abundant, fluid, full, fluent, luxurious, branch, distributary KUNMING , the capital of Yunnan province , is an affluent city .云南省省会昆明是一个富裕的城市。
adj. 加重的；令人恼怒的 v. 使恶化；激怒（aggravate的ing形式） 同义词:weighted, anabatic, provoking The bad weather aggravated his illness.坏天气加重了他的病情。
vi. 集合；聚集；合计 vt. 集合；聚集；合计 n. 合计；集合体；总计 adj. 聚合的；集合的；合计的 同义词:amount, concentrate, collect, mass, crowd, assemble, sum, collective, all told, collective, polymeric to aggregate riches积聚财富
n. [地质][数] 聚合，聚集；聚集体，集合体 同义词:collection, polymerization, clustering, gather The main reason of aggregation is caused by the biology of the lady beetle .聚集的原因主要是由其自身习性所致。
n. 激动；搅动；煽动；烦乱 同义词:warmth, excitation It could trigger mass agitation for a change of government .而这有可能引发大规模动乱导致政府更迭。
adj. 类似的；同类的；同族的 同义词:parallel, analogous Some levy fees on certain products , akin to bottle deposits, to ensure they are disposed of safely.有些地方对某种产品征收费用，确保它们得到适宜处置，例如废弃的瓶子。
n. 点金术；魔力 同义词:charm, fascination This fruitless quest was called alchemy by the Arabs .这种无谓的的探索被阿拉伯人称作炼金术。
n. [林] 桤木 Material : Gold Plated Alder Cone , gold plated bookmark .素材：镀金桤木球果吊饰，镀金书签。
n. [植] 藻类；[植] 海藻 同义词:seaweed, varech The existing projects , though , are looking at freshwater algae .虽然现在的计划正着眼于淡水藻类。
adj. 外国的；相异的，性质不同的；不相容的 n. 外国人，外侨；外星人 vt. 让渡，转让 同义词:foreign, external, foreigner, uitlander, transfer, negotiate Jim is an alien in this film .吉姆在这部电影里是个外星人。
adj. 全部的 adv. 全然地；越发 n. 全部 pron. 全部 同义词:entire, overall, total, utterly, sheerly, full, entirety, allness Now we all know the Muffin Man .现在我们大家都认识松饼人。
adj. 全部的 adv. 全然地；越发 n. 全部 pron. 全部 同义词:entire, overall, total, utterly, sheerly, full, entirety, allness Now we all know the Muffin Man .现在我们大家都认识松饼人。
vt. 分配；拨出；使坐落于 vi. 分配；指定 同义词:portion, part, appropriate, parcel out, to assign The Government has allocated funds for housing.政府已为住房建筑拨给资金。
vt. 使成合金；使减低成色 n. 合金 vi. 易于铸成合金 同义词:composition metal to alloy silver with tin以锡降低银的成色

adj. 供选择的；选择性的；交替的 n. 二中择一；供替代的选择 同义词:selective, vicissitudinary An alternative to the all red bouquet is to buy some white roses and insert one red one in the center of the bunch.一种花束与所有都是红色花朵的花束不一样是，去购买一些白色的玫瑰穿插在红色的玫瑰花束中。
n. 高地；高度；[数] 顶垂线；（等级和地位等的）高级 同义词:height, raise, elevation, rise Helicopters perform poorly in hot weather and at high altitude .直升机在天气炎热和海拔较高时表现不佳。
n. 铝 Depending on the course of the dollar , fluctuations inside of , or temporary breaks beyond , the contemplated aluminum price range can be expected .基于美元的走势、内部因素的波动以及暂时打破高点的情况，铝的预期价格范围是能够估计的。
n. 气氛，布景；周围环境 同义词:atmosphere, mood, set It 's better to dine in a very unique ambience .最好是在一个独特的环境就餐。
adj. 有责任的，应服从的；有义务的；经得起检验的 同义词:responsible, bound, liable, accountable We amenable to the law .我们全都是对这法律负责的。
vt. 放大，扩大；增强；详述 vi. 详述 同义词:extend, zoom up, expand on, enlarge on We must amplify our effort by working a lot harder.我们必须加紧干。
n. 始祖，祖先；被继承人 同义词:father, root, grandfather Our grandfathers ancestored some of the well-known families in Beijing.我们的祖父辈是北京几家望族的祖先。
vt. 歼灭；战胜；废止 vi. 湮灭；湮没 同义词:defeat, suppress, submerge Our soldiers annihilated a force of five hundred enemy troops.我们的战士消灭了 500名敌军。
adj. 年度的；每年的 n. 年刊，年鉴；一年生植物 同义词:yearly, etesian, year book, almanac When annual income is forced to exceed annual expenditure , the result may well be misery .当每年的收入被迫超过每年支出时，其结果很可能就是痛苦。
adv. 每年；一年一次 同义词:yearly What did you do in the annually assessment of the company ?公司每年进行的年终评估你们都会怎么做?。
n. 异常；不规则；反常事物 同义词:abnormality, deviance The organic matters reach high maturation stage . There is no thermal maturation anomaly .有机质已达高级成熟阶段，但矿区范围未见热成熟异常。

adj. 匿名的，无名的；无个性特征的 同义词:faceless, innominate At some point in Italy between 1268 and 1289 someone came up with the idea , but the actual inventor anonymous .在1268-1289之间的某一时刻，意大利的某个人有了发明眼镜的想法，但实际的发明者却不得而知。
adj. 抗生的；抗菌的 n. 抗生素，抗菌素 同义词:germproof, microbiotic, bacteriophage After the wound is clean , use a small amount of antibiotic ointment or cream .伤口清理干净以后可以使用少量的抗生素药膏或软膏。
n. 抗生素；抗生学 同义词:microbiotic Antibiotics can cause disorders of water and salt metabolism .抗菌素能引起水、盐代谢的紊乱。

n. 抗抑郁剂 adj. 抗抑郁的（等于antidepressive） They aggregated the findings from decades of antidepressant trials , looking for patterns and trying to see what was changing over time .他们收集了数十年来抗抑郁药物的试验结果，寻求样本，试图发现随着时光变迁的改变。
vt. 废弃；使…过时；使…具有古旧形式或风格 adj. 过时的；旧式的 同义词:out of use, scrap, ancient, outdated This latest device will antiquate the ice-cube tray.这个最新的器件使小方冰块盘变成废物。
adj. 过时的；陈旧的；年老的 v. 使古旧；废弃（antiquate的过去分词） 同义词:old, ancient, aged, advanced, disused This latest device will antiquate the ice-cube tray.这个最新的器件使小方冰块盘变成废物。
n. 高龄；古物；古代的遗物 同义词:eld, advanced age His tastes addict him to the study of antiquity .嗜好使他沉迷于研究古代的事物。
adv. 相距；与众不同地；分离着 adj. 分离的；与众不同的 同义词:unusual, different, distinctive, isolated, separating Apart from tears , only time could wear everything away .除了眼泪，只有时间可以冲刷掉一切。
vi. 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判 n. 呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判 vt. 将…上诉，对…上诉 同义词:attract, clamour for, asking, request, motion, charm to appeal a case to a higher tribunal把案件向高一级法院上诉
vi. 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判 n. 呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判 vt. 将…上诉，对…上诉 同义词:attract, clamour for, asking, request, motion, charm to appeal a case to a higher tribunal把案件向高一级法院上诉
n. 学徒；生手 vt. 使…当学徒 vi. 当学徒 同义词:freshman, fresh hand His father apprenticed him to a barber.他父亲送他去当理发师的徒弟。
n. 方法；途径；接近 vt. 接近；着手处理 vi. 靠近 同义词:method, way, system, mechanism, medium, border, go on for, come near to, draw near A storm is approaching.暴风雨即将来临。

adv. 适宜地；适当地 同义词:properly, well, adequately, appropriately, befittingly Ideas and concepts , even paradigms , come to fruition because of their social and historical milieu , as Merton and others have so aptly shown .思想和观念，甚至范式因其社会和历史环境而成熟，正如默顿以及其他人适当表明的一样。

adj. 水生的；水栖的；在水中或水面进行的 n. 水上运动；水生植物或动物 同义词:acquatic, aquicolous The major bones in human knees , backs and wrists arose in aquatic creatures hundreds of millions of years ago .人类的膝盖、背部及手腕的主要骨骼发展，在数亿年前的水生动物阶段便已经定型。
n. 弧（度）；弧光（全称electric arc）；弧形物；天穹 adj. 圆弧的；反三角函数的 vt. 形成电弧；走弧线 Ranger 6 arced on a graceful,curving course towards the moon.(月球探测卫星)徘徊者6号沿着一条优美的曲线循弧线飞向月球。
adj. [古] 考古学的；[古] 考古学上的 Genetic change can overlay archaeological or cultural continuity .基因变化会掩盖考古和文化的传承。
n. 考古学 The newspaper article waked my interest in archaeology .报纸上的文章激起了我对考古学的兴趣。
n. 群岛，列岛；多岛的海区 The archipelago nation bestrides the world 's busiest sea lanes .这个群岛国家跨越了世上最繁忙的海上通道。
n. 建筑师 The building is well architected.这幢大楼造得很好。
adj. 努力的；费力的；险峻的 同义词:hard, rapid, bold, struggling Humans can quickly wreck the natural environment , but repairing it is a long , arduous process.人类可快速破坏自然环境，但修复环境却是漫长而艰钜的任务。
n. 舞台；竞技场 同义词:stage, lists He could not descend himself into the arena .他自己不能下到竞技场里去。
adj. 干旱的；不毛的，[农] 荒芜的 同义词:hungry, waste, desert These plants will not root in such arid soil .这种植物在这种贫瘠的土地上不会生根。
n. [军] 装甲；盔甲 vt. 为…装甲 同义词:mail, helmets Their feathers were like armor impenetrable to steel.它们的羽毛就象刀剑穿不透的盔甲。
adj. 芳香的，芬芳的；芳香族的 n. 芳香植物；芳香剂 同义词:sweet, fragrant, scented plants, fragrances Asia having off -white flowers and aromatic seeds used medicinally and in curry .南欧和东亚的一年生草本植物，开黄白色花，种子芳香，可药用或制咖喱。
n. 数组，阵列；排列，列阵；大批，一系列；衣服 vt. 排列，部署；打扮 同义词:series of, clothes, thread, garment, ranging, dress oneself, rank, form Napoleon arrayed his troops for battle.拿破仑部署他的军队以便作战。

adj. 组合的；各种各样的；混杂的 v. 把…分等级；把…归为一类（assort的过去分词） 同义词:various, combined Among the assorted education guarantees is that some pupils who fall behind will be able to get one-to- one catch-up tuition .为改善教育做出的五花八门的保证当中，也包含着对成绩落后的学生提供一对一的补习辅导。

adj. 令人震惊的；令人惊骇的 同义词:electric, shocking What has happened in China for the last twenty years is by any standard astounding .中国过去二十年的发展，以任何标准来看，都属成绩骄人。

n. 毛毯，毯子；毯状物，覆盖层 adj. 总括的，全体的；没有限制的 vt. 覆盖，掩盖；用毯覆盖 同义词:soogan, sugan, entire, corporate, overall, universal, invest, house, sheet, roof, cap Confetti blanketed the ballroom floor.五彩纸屑布满舞池。
n. 爆炸；冲击波；一阵 vi. 猛攻 vt. 爆炸；损害；使枯萎 同义词:detonation, burst, tear into, charge at, hurt, blow apart Music blasted from the little radio.从小收音机里播出刺耳的音乐声。
adj. 燃烧的；强烈的；闪耀的 adv. 非常 v. 燃烧；闪耀；迸发；公开（blaze的ing形式） 同义词:intense, burning, brilliant, sharp, keen, extremely, badly, highly, greatly, too, opening, calcining to blaze a trail在树皮上刻痕标示林中路径；开路
adj. 阴冷的；荒凉的，无遮蔽的；黯淡的，无希望的；冷酷的；单调的 同义词:raw, wild, flat, frozen, blank The high and faithful spirit of the people counted for nought in this bleak domain .在这阴森的领域中，人民崇高而忠实的精神也于事无补。

n. 恩惠；福利；利益 adj. 愉快的；慷慨的 同义词:behalf, welfare, sake, benefit, grace, good, bright, generous, handsome, fragrant Falling fertility in poor and middle- income societies is boon in and of itself.对低，中等收入国家来说，人口出生率持续下降无疑是好处多多。

vt. 促进；增加；支援 vi. 宣扬；偷窃 n. 推动；帮助；宣扬 同义词:facilitate, promote, enhance, further, jack, pick pocket, rip off, assistance, motivation, hand, aid, publicity If you boost him up,he can just reach the top of the shelf.如果你托他一把，他正好能够到架顶。
adj. 无聊的；令人厌烦的 n. 钻孔 v. 钻孔；使厌烦；挖空（bore的ing形式） 同义词:trying, frivolous, drilling hole, bouche, drilling The speaker was boring everybody.说话者令每个人生厌。
n. 边界；范围；分界线 同义词:region, extent, spectrum, territory, area The boundary particle theory " looks like " a theory of particles in the absence of gravity .边界上的粒子理论「看起来」像是一个不含重力的粒子理论。

n. 弓；鞠躬；船首 vi. 鞠躬；弯腰 vt. 鞠躬；弯腰 adj. 弯曲的 同义词:stem, Yumi, stoop down, bend down, stoop down, bend down, curve, winding, flexural, crooked The branches were bowed down with the weight of the snow.树枝被沉重的积雪压弯了。
n. 违背，违反；缺口 vt. 违反，破坏；打破 同义词:separation, gap, violation, infringement, destroy, violate Our troops have breached the enemy defences.我方部队突破了敌人的防线。
n. 休息，中断；破裂处 vt. 打破，弄破；中断；弄坏；削弱 vi. 突变 同义词:rest, interruption, smash in, cut off She broke a vase.她打碎了一只花瓶。
n. 微风；轻而易举的事；煤屑；焦炭渣；小风波 vi. 吹微风；逃走 同义词:breath, doddle, tail out, pull foot It breezed from the west all day.整天刮着微微的西风。
n. 光辉；才华；宏伟 同义词:flame, irradiancy In the light purple brilliance and fragrance , I quicken unconsciously my step .在这浅紫色的光辉和浅紫色的芳香中，我不觉加快了脚步。
adj. 海水的；咸的；盐水的 同义词:salty, salinous That 's self- preservation , not work . Briny 's always been good at that .那只是自我保存，并不是工作--勃拉尼一向是善于那样的。
n. 活泼；轻快；敏捷 同义词:animation, brightness, volatility He brisked up his pace.他加快了步伐。
adj. 易碎的，脆弱的；易生气的 同义词:delicate, tender, fragile Throughout urban Africa , as well , it is common to brittle corn stalks peeking out from behind crowded shacks.而且在非洲的各个城市，也常见到脆嫩的玉米梗摇曳于拥挤的矮房间。
n. 青铜；古铜色；青铜制品 adj. 青铜色的；青铜制的 vt. 镀青铜于 vi. 变成青铜色，被晒黑 同义词:gunmetal, aeneous The sun bronzed their faces.阳光晒得他们的脸呈古铜色。
n. 气泡，泡沫，泡状物；透明圆形罩，圆形顶 vi. 沸腾，冒泡；发出气泡声 vt. 使冒泡；滔滔不绝地说 同义词:foam, yeast, boil, intumesce, gush over The water began to bubble in the teapot.水在茶壶里开始沸腾。
vi. 扣住；变弯曲 vt. 扣住；使弯曲 n. 皮带扣，带扣 同义词:button up, wind, curve Buckle your seat belt.把座位安全带扣上。
n. 童车；双轮单座轻马车 adj. 多虫的 So you want to go back to the buggy days ?所以你想要回到马车横行的年代去？
n. 建筑；建筑物 v. 建筑；建立；增加（build的ing形式） 同义词:construction, fabric, structure, bldg, establishing, adding, increasing They are building a house.他们正在盖一所房子。
n. 体积，容量；大多数，大部分；大块 vt. 使扩大，使形成大量；使显得重要 同义词:most of, volume, content, exaggerate, broaden Numerous small contributions soon bulk up into a considerable sum.许多小额捐助不久就积成了一笔可观的款子。
n. 束；捆 vt. 捆 vi. 匆忙离开 同义词:tract, truss, rope, bolt out, blow through We bundled the old newspapers for the trash man.我们为垃圾清理工把旧报纸扎成一捆。
adj. 繁重的；累赘的；恼人的 同义词:heavy, onerous The burdensome task of preparing her income tax return awaited her .准备所得税偿还的繁重任务等着她去完成。
vi. 萌芽 vt. 发芽 n. 嫩枝 同义词:germ, spring up, come into bud, come up, shoots She burgeoned into a fine actress.她迅速成长为一名优秀的女演员。

vi. 探索，寻找；挖地洞，挖通道；住入地洞，躲藏起来；钻进某处；偎依著 vt. 挖掘，挖出；在…挖洞（或通道）；使躲入洞穴 n. （兔、狐等的）洞穴，地道；藏身处，住处 同义词:explore, search after, to dig, tap into, residence, hole, subway, underground, accommodation They burrowed into the ground.他们掘洞钻入地下。

vi. 破产；爆裂；降低级别 vt. 使破产；使爆裂；逮捕 n. 破产；半身像；萧条；胸部 adj. 破产了的；毁坏了的 同义词:fail, crack, seize, put out of business, failure, bankruptcy, chest, breast Soldiers got in a fight and busted up the bar.士兵们参加斗殴并毁坏了酒吧间。
vi. 喧闹；忙乱；充满 vt. 使忙碌；催促 n. 喧闹；活跃；裙撑；热闹的活动 同义词:whoop up, abound with, crowd, occupy, exercise, activity, rumpus She bustled about cooking supper.她忙于做晚饭。
prep. 通过；被；依据；经由；在附近；在……之前 adv. 通过；经过；附近；白俄罗斯 同义词:via, THRU through, past to stand by the wall站在墙边
prep. 通过；被；依据；经由；在附近；在……之前 adv. 通过；经过；附近；白俄罗斯 同义词:via, THRU through, past to stand by the wall站在墙边
n. 驾驶室；出租汽车；出租马车 vi. 乘出租马车（或汽车） 同义词:taxi, wheelhouse Will it take long by cab ?坐计程车去，需要很长时间吗?。
n. 内阁；橱柜；展览艺术品的小陈列室 adj. 内阁的；私下的，秘密的 同义词:ambry, council of ministers, private, secret, underground, chamber, inside He has chosen loyalty over competence in cabinet .他选择忠诚胜于能力的人进入内阁。
n. 仙人掌（cactus的复数形式） I love cacti , because of his strong vitality .我爱仙人掌，因为他生命力极强。
n. [园艺] 仙人掌 同义词:Cholla Stem, cholla We have to water this cactus once a month .我们必须每月给仙人掌浇一次水。

n. 校准；刻度；标度 同义词:standardization, regulation, scale, graduation, alignment According to the Range Doppler equations , the geometric calibration of SAR image can be realized using SAR imaging parameters .依据合成孔径雷达（SAR）距离方程和多普勒方程，用SAR成像参数可实现SAR图像的几何校正。
vi. 作战；参加竞选；参加活动 n. 运动；活动；战役 同义词:war, battle, movement, activity, exercise, sport, battle We are campaigning for equal rights for women.我们正在开展妇女拥有平等权利的运动。
n. 食人；嗜食同类；残忍的行为 同义词:anthropophagy The war is just like the cannibalism of animals .战争就如同动物之间的互相残杀。
n. 天篷；华盖；遮篷；苍穹 vt. 用天蓬遮盖；遮盖 同义词:baldachin, marquee, blot out, overcurtain The sky was canopied with dark clouds.天空乌云密布。
n. 峡谷 同义词:glen, coomb, kloof canyon unfolds in an inevitable sequence .峡谷按照必然的顺序显露出来。
n. 才能，能力；性能，容量 同义词:talent, ability, competence, performance, property, quality I think I have the capability of organizing a party .我想我有能力组织一次社交聚会。
n. 能力；容量；资格，地位；生产力 同义词:ability, competence, membership, status, productivity Subordination and silence best became their years and capacity .服从与沉默，最适合他们的年令与能力。
n. 壳；甲壳 同义词:shell, sheel He probably knows something about it . He may be wise but he has to be locked up in his carapace until he dies.他应该知道有关的东西吧。也许他很贤明的，但他的一生注定被锁在自己的甲壳里。
n. [有化] 碳水化合物；[有化] 糖类 同义词:glucide, saccharide Don't eat so much carbohydrate !别吃太多碳水化合物！
n. 强心剂；强胃剂 adj. 心脏的；心脏病的；（胃的）喷门 同义词:metrazol, cordis But the size of those cardiac patches has been limited .但是那些心脏修补的大小是受限制的。
n. 货物，船货 同义词:commodity, freight, merchandise This boat was cargoed with bananas and oranges.这只船装载着香蕉和橘子。
n. 狂欢节，嘉年华会；饮宴狂欢 同义词:Dionysia, Fasching In the Rhineland and the south , it 's carnival time .在莱茵兰和南部地区，这几天是狂欢节时间。
adj. 食肉的；肉食性的 同义词:raptatorial, zoophagous Sheep are not carnivorous but tigers are .绵羊非食肉类，而老虎才是。
n. 雕刻；雕刻品；雕刻术 v. 雕刻（carve的ing形式） 同义词:sculpture, engraving, sculpting She carved a flower out of a radish.她把萝卜刻成一朵花。
vt. 投，抛；计算；浇铸；投射（光、影、视线等） n. 投掷，抛；铸件，[古生] 铸型；演员阵容；脱落物 vi. 投，抛垂钓鱼钩；计算，把几个数字加起来 同义词:throw, pitch, mould, figure, putting, throw, figure, shy The boy cast a stone into the water.男孩把一块石头扔进水中。
vt. 投，抛；计算；浇铸；投射（光、影、视线等） n. 投掷，抛；铸件，[古生] 铸型；演员阵容；脱落物 vi. 投，抛垂钓鱼钩；计算，把几个数字加起来 同义词:throw, pitch, mould, figure, putting, throw, figure, shy The boy cast a stone into the water.男孩把一块石头扔进水中。
n. 铸造；铸件；投掷；角色分配 v. 铸造；投掷；投向；选派演员；扔掉（cast的ing形式） 同义词:molding, putting, throw, foundry, founding The boy cast a stone into the water.男孩把一块石头扔进水中。
n. 种类，分类；[数] 范畴 同义词:variety, classification, kind, manner, sort, nature " Middle- class " describes an income category but also a set of attitudes .“中产阶级”描述的不仅是一种收入分类，亦是一套看法。
vt. 投合，迎合；满足需要；提供饮食及服务 同义词:humor, meet the demand He has a small hotel and also caters for weddings and funerals.他开了一家小旅馆，并承办红白喜事的酒席。
n. 大教堂 同义词:minster, duomo His most famous creation is the unfinished cathedral known as the Sagrada Familia .他最出名的作品就是尚未完工的神圣家族大教堂。
n. 洞穴；凹处 vt. 挖空；置…于洞穴中 同义词:recession, cavity, hole, hollow out In the eerie silence of the cavern .洞里有一种可怕的寂静。
n. 腔；洞，凹处 同义词:recession, hole It occupies the central cavity of bone .它位于骨骼中央的骨髓腔里。

vi. 停止；终了 vt. 停止；结束 n. 停止 同义词:desist from, come to a stop, conclude, cheese, quit, stop, stay, stand, cessation, set-back The present system of reaping without sowing should cease immediately.目前这种不劳而获的制度应当立即废止。
adj. 天上的，天空的 n. 神仙，天堂里的居民 同义词:heavenly, ethereal, jinnee, djinni The angular distance of celestial body below the horizon .在地平线以下消失；指太阳和月亮等天体。
n. 细胞；电池；蜂房的巢室；单人小室 vi. 住在牢房或小室中 同义词:electric battery, electric element He celled with two other prisoners.他与另外两犯人一同关在一间牢房中。
n. 大提琴演奏家 World - renowned cellist Yo-Yo Ma founded The Silk Road Project in 1998 .享誉全球的大提琴演奏家马友友于1998年创办“丝绸之路工程”。
n. 大提琴 同义词:violoncello He refused requests to play the cello suites in the many countries that recognised the regime .他拒绝了许多国家要他演奏大提琴组曲的请求，因为它们都承认佛朗哥政权。
vt. 实施统计调查 n. 人口普查，人口调查 同义词:lustrum, nose-count Census Bureau says an immigrant enters the country every 31 seconds .人口普查局称每31秒就有一个移民进入美国。
adj. 仪式的；正式的，礼仪的 n. 仪式，礼节 同义词:formal, official, state, service, etiquette We should wear formal dress on ceremonial occasion .在正式场合，我们应穿着正式。
n. 典礼，仪式；礼节，礼仪；客套，虚礼 同义词:service, protocol, exercise The award ceremony will start soon .颁奖仪式很快就要开始了。
vt. 擦破；擦热；擦痛；激怒 vi. 擦伤；磨擦；激怒 n. 擦伤；气恼 同义词:anger, provoke, brush burn, rub the wrong way, brush-burn, abrasion She chafed her cold hands vigorously.她使劲搓热她冰冷的双手。
n. （身体或器官内的）室，膛；房间；会所 adj. 室内的；私人的，秘密的 vt. 把…关在室内；装填（弹药等） 同义词:apartment, room, indoor, private, secret, underground, inside, load He was chambered in a narrow basement.他被关进一个狭窄的地下室里。
n. 混沌，混乱 同义词:disorder, confusion, involvement, mix, turmoil " There is order in chaos , " Farmer says .“在混沌中存在着秩序”，法默说。
n. 木炭（过去式charcoaled，过去分词charcoaled，现在分词charcoaling，第三人称单数charcoals）；炭笔 vt. 用木炭画 同义词:xylanthrax, wood coal The artist dusted the charcoal drawing down to a faint image .这位画家在素描上撒粉使其变为暗淡的图像。
vt. 特许；包租；发给特许执照 n. 宪章；执照；特许状 同义词:license, license, patent, permit a chartered accountant持证会计师
n. （法国封建时代的）城堡；（尤指法国的）别墅 同义词:villa, castle For three heavy hours , the stone faces of the chateau , lion and human , stared blindly at the night .庄园里的石面孔（狮子的面孔，人的面孔）茫然地望着黑夜，望了三个沉重的小时。
vi. 核对无误；将军（象棋）；证明无误 vt. 检查；制止；寄存 n. 支票；阻止；阻止物 同义词:examine, inspect, review, park, prevention, cheque He checked his horse sharply.他猛然把马勒住。
n. 寒冷；寒意；寒心 adj. 寒冷的；冷漠的；扫兴的 vt. 冷冻，冷藏；使寒心；使感到冷 vi. 冷藏；变冷 同义词:cold, algor, cold, distant, refrigerate I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.我想要啤酒变凉，因此我把它放在冰箱里一小时。
adj. 寒冷的；怕冷的 同义词:cold, acold Now customers sit outside the hotel tucked up in blankets on more chilly evenings .现在，如果晚上比较寒冷，顾客们可以盖着毛毯在酒店外小坐了。
n. [脊椎] 黑猩猩 同义词:jocko, pongo I went to Tanzania in East Africa and worked in the Gombe Stream Chimpanzee Reserve .我去了东非坦桑尼亚的“冈比小溪黑猩猩保护区”工作。
vt. 雕，刻；凿；欺骗 vi. 雕，刻；凿；欺骗 n. 凿子 同义词:chip, sell, character, kid, pull a fast one, firmer It is a bust chiseled from a rock.那是一座石雕半身像。
n. 骑士精神（复数chivalries）；骑士制度 同义词:errantry He was an apotheosis of chivalry .他是骑士精神的典范。
n. 砍；排骨；商标；[网]削球 vt. 剁碎；砍 (俚)丑人 同义词:brand, label, logo, cut, hew, hew Chop some wood for the fire.给炉子劈点木柴来。
adj. 波涛汹涌的；波浪起伏的；不断改变方向的 同义词:surfy, surgy It was a bit choppy on the cruise but I was all right once I found my sea legs.在航游中有点风浪，但一旦我习惯于坐船旅行我就没什么问题了。

n. 弦；和弦 同义词:hypothenuse, quadrature Sometimes when you play , you hit a note or chord , and your facial and body expressions contort to match the audio expression .有时当你演奏时，你击出一个音符或和弦，你的面部和身体表情会扭曲以配合听觉的表达。
n. 大块；矮胖的人或物 同义词:bulk, blocking And the government gets a large chunk of revenue —not to be sniffed at in these difficult times .而政府得到了大把的财政收入—在现在的困难时期这不该被嗤之以鼻。
vi. 传播，流传；循环；流通 vt. 使循环；使流通；使传播 同义词:spread abroad, to disseminate, cycle Traffic circulates in the streets of a city.车辆和行人在市内街上川流不息。
n. 流通，传播；循环；发行量 同义词:revolution, rotation, cycle, propagation, diffusion When were the decimal coins put into circulation ?十进位的硬币是什么时候发行的?。
vt. 限制；在…周围画线 同义词:block, set a limit to Please circumscribe the words which are wrongly spelled.请将拼错的词圈出来。
vt. 引用；传讯；想起；表彰 同义词:reference, think of Can you cite another case like this one?你能举出另一个像这样的例子吗?
adj. 民用的；百姓的，平民的 n. 平民，百姓 同义词:many-headed, populace, common man Incidentally , that story about the big convoy from San Francisco is civilian morale .顺便提一句，关于从旧金山开来庞大护船队的传说是安抚民心的空话。
n. 礼貌；礼仪；端庄 同义词:ceremony, protocol Mr. Slope 's civility had been more than ordinarily greasy .斯洛普先生的礼仪比平日更为谄媚。
vi. 提出要求 vt. 要求；声称；需要；认领 n. 要求；声称；索赔；断言；值得 同义词:exact, say, lack, desire, call for, requirement, do, assurance, need, desire Every citizen may claim the protection of the law.每个公民都可以要求受到法律的保护。
vi. 捞蛤 n. 蛤；沉默寡言的人；钳子 同义词:tong, few words How can a clam cram in a clean cream can ?一个蛤蜊怎么能够填满一个干净的奶酪罐子呢？
n. 喧闹，叫嚷；大声的要求 vi. 喧嚷，发喧嚣声；持续地喊声 vt. 喧嚷着说出 同义词:rumpus, whoop-up But patients often clamor for something and doctors too often accede to their patients ' demands .但是病人常常会嚷着要开点药，而医生通常也会满足病人的要求。
n. 宗族；部落；集团 同义词:nationality, collective, tribe The Wagner clan , he writes, inherited " a glorious but poisoned legacy ".他形容瓦格纳家族“一部充满辉煌和毒药的遗产”。
n. 分类；类别，等级 同义词:category, degree, grade, rate, rank The new approach could help make such classification routine .这种新方法可促进此种归类方式的普及。
vt. 分类；分等 同义词:categorize, sort through He says the administration decision to re- classify those documents is symptomatic of a larger , growing problem .他说将档案重新分类处理的行政决定是问题更严重，不断扩大的一种前兆。
n. [土壤] 粘土；泥土；肉体；似黏土的东西 vt. 用黏土处理 同义词:earth, flesh, dirt It is also important to dry the clay containers slowly .缓慢的干燥粘土容器也是十分重要的。
n. 悬崖；绝壁 同义词:precipice, escarpment The true dips are commonly observed in quarry faces, cuttings and cliff etc .在采场面，断面和断崖等面上人们常看到真倾角。
vi. 坚持，墨守；紧贴；附着 同义词:stay, stand on He clung to the rope with both hands.他双手紧紧攥住绳子。
adv. 顺时针方向地 adj. 顺时针方向的 同义词:deasil If it's morning , you 'll find south about halfway between the hour hand and twelve o'clock , clockwise .如果是早上，按顺时针方向转过去，时针和十二点位置的中间差不多就是南边。
adj. 笨拙的 同义词:awkward, inept But it was a clumsy one.但这是一个笨拙的内阁。
n. 群；簇；丛；串 vi. 群聚；丛生 vt. 使聚集；聚集在某人的周围 同义词:gang, bunch, qun, bush, converge The students clustered their tents together.学生们把帐篷集中搭在一起。
n. 代码，密码；编码；法典 vt. 编码；制成法典 vi. 指定遗传密码 同义词:password, cryptogram, encode to code a telegram将电报译成密码
vt. 编纂；将...编成法典；编成法典 Codify a Senior Level Health IT Leader within the Administration to oversee a national health IT strategy .在内阁中任命一个高级别的医疗IT领导人来监督全国医疗IT策略。
vi. 共存；和平共处 These countries coexisted for many years.这些国家和平共处了很多年。
vi. 同居（尤指未婚而同居者） 同义词:live together Through it , we learn of the many others – the wondrous diversity of flora and fauna – with whom we cohabit on this planet .通过它，我们认识了与我们共同生活在地球上的许多其它生物——多种多样的奇妙动植物。
n. 凝聚；结合；[力] 内聚力 同义词:combination, coupling, wedding, bond, join There was no cohesion and there was no one person in charge .没有任何凝聚力，也没有任何一个人来主管。
adj. 有结合力的；紧密结合的；有粘着力的 同义词:combinative Cohesive means that a certain class performs a set of closely related actions .聚合意思着一个普通的类执行一系列的密切相关的动作。
vt. 盘绕，把…卷成圈 n. 线圈；卷 vi. 成圈状 同义词:entwine, book, volume, roll, winding, wreathe He coiled the rope on the deck.他在甲板上把绳子绕好。
vi. 一致，符合；同时发生 同义词:cotton, square, identify, accord The centres of concentric circles coincide.同心圆的圆心是一个。
adj. 一致的；符合的；同时发生的 同义词:united, consistent, matching, uniform, corresponding My opinion coincident with hers .我的意见与她的完全一致。
n. 合作；勾结；通敌 同义词:synergism, co-operation He fostered new collaboration with the suburbs .他培育了郊区的新型协作模式；

adj. 集体的；共同的；集合的；集体主义的 n. 集团；集合体；集合名词 同义词:mutual, corporate, common, joint, bloc, clan Still collective effort of the states is already beginning to compensate for the lack of reductions by the Bush administration .不过，美国各州的努力全部加起来，已经使得布希政府没有降低排放量的情形有所补偿。

adj. 集体的；共同的；集合的；集体主义的 n. 集团；集合体；集合名词 同义词:mutual, corporate, common, joint, bloc, clan Still collective effort of the states is already beginning to compensate for the lack of reductions by the Bush administration .不过，美国各州的努力全部加起来，已经使得布希政府没有降低排放量的情形有所补偿。
vi. 碰撞；抵触，冲突 vt. 使碰撞；使相撞 同义词:hit, impact on, crash His bicycle collided with a lorry.他的自行车撞在一辆卡车上。
n. （意见，看法）的抵触，冲突 同义词:interference, conflict, war, crash, impact The other process of droplet growth is by collision and coalescence .云滴增长的另一个过程是各云滴间的碰撞和并合。

adj. 巨大的；异常的，非常的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro, intense Thanks to colossal improvements in sanitation and medicine , that figure is now 75 for men and 80 for women .由于人类在卫生学和医药学的巨大进步，现在男性的寿命是75岁，女性80岁。
n. 巨像；巨人；巨大的东西 同义词:giant, monster Now while the Colossus is very dangerous against ground targets , it's much more vulnerable to an air counterattack.到现在“巨神像”是个非常危险的高地攻击目标，更加容易受到空中打击。

adj. 易燃的；易激动的；燃烧性的 n. 可燃物；易燃物 同义词:emotional, flammable, tinderbox, burnable Yet something momentous has happened in a pivotal country in the most combustible part of the world .然而在一个世界上最热点地区的关键国家，至关重要的事情已经发生了。
n. 燃烧，氧化；骚动 同义词:burning, inflammation The most common type of reaction studied calorimetrically is combustion .量热研究中最常见的反应类型是燃烧反应。
vi. 来；开始；出现；发生；变成；到达 vt. 做；假装；将满（…岁） int. 嗨！ 同义词:occur, happen, proceed, become, figure, simulate, doest, hi, heigh I've come to say good-bye.我是来向你辞行的。
n. [天] 彗星 The Great Comet of2007 reached its brightest as it rounded the Sun well inside the orbit of Mercury .当这颗2007年的大彗星运行到比水星轨道更接近太阳时，它的亮度达到最大值。
n. 委员会；佣金；犯；委任；委任状 vt. 委任；使服役；委托制作 同义词:council, soviet, brokerage, authorization, depute, authorise They commissioned an architect to design the new library.他们委托一位建筑师设计这座新图书馆。
adj. 坚定的；效忠的；承担义务的 v. 承诺；委托；干坏事；付诸（commit的过去分词） 同义词:firm, confirmed, stable, decisive, delegated, trusted The old man committed his will to the care of the lawyer.老人把他的遗嘱委托律师保管。
n. 商品，货物；日用品 同义词:cargo, merchandise Time is the most precious commodity .时间是最宝贵的商品。
adj. 常识的；具有常识的 Her call for " commonsense conservatism " is a string of clichés.她所呼吁的“常识性保守主义”只不过是老生常谈。
adj. 公共的；公社的 communal spirit that encourages people to share food , especially when it is scarce , may start to break down.共产主义思想鼓励人们共享食物，尤其是在食品短缺时，但这次或许没人遵从。
n. 社区；[生态] 群落；共同体；团体 同义词:village, organization, body, group What makes it a community is ultimately in- person meetings .正是亲身的会面最终形成了一个社区。
n. 通勤者，经常乘公共车辆往返者；[交] 月季票乘客 commuter trains are never punctual .市郊往返列车从来不准点。
n. 合同，契约；小粉盒 adj. 紧凑的，紧密的；简洁的 vt. 使简洁；使紧密结合 同义词:stipulation, covenant, close, brief The snow on the pavement was compacted and has turned to ice.人行便道上的雪被踩实并结成了冰。
n. 同伴；朋友；指南；手册 vt. 陪伴 同义词:friend, guide, fellow, manual, notebook, attend, keep company They companioned the visitors to the classroom他们陪着来宾到教室去。
adj. 可比较的；比得上的 At the same particle size , coarse or fine , performance is comparable .只要颗粒相同，不管是粗的，还是细的，结果相同。
adj. 兼容的；能共处的；可并立的 We return again to the search for a compatible element .我们回过头来再去寻找相容的元素。
vt. 强迫，迫使；强使发生 同义词:pressure, force, enforce They were often compelled to work eleven or twelve hours a day.他们常常被迫每天工作十一二个小时。
n. 补偿；报酬；赔偿金 同义词:payment, consideration, insurance, reward, offset As a first step , compensation committees and risk - management committees should be merged .第一步，薪酬委员会和风险管理委员会应合并在一起。
adj. 相互矛盾的；抵触的 v. 竞赛（compete的ing形式） 同义词:contradictive About 800 athletes competed in fifteen events.大约有800名运动员参加了15个项目的竞赛。
n. 竞争力，好竞争 同义词:competitive strength It will lead to higher unemployment and social unrest now , but only restore competitiveness in the distant future .这在当前将导致失业率上升和社会动荡，但只能在遥远的将来恢复竞争力。
vt. 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编 同义词:to edit, copy-edit It often takes five or six years of hard work to compile a good dictionary.编一部好的词典常常需要苦干五六年。
n. 满足，自满；沾沾自喜 同义词:satisfaction, content, fill He must possess a measure of competitiveness because I hate complacence .他必须拥有一定的竞争能力，因为我讨厌男人自以为是。
n. 补语；余角；补足物 vt. 补足，补助 同义词:make up a loss, make sth up This year 's report will use the Alkire - Foster approach to complement its own Human Development Index .今年的报告还将采用阿尔凯尔-福斯特方法，作为其人类发展指数的补充。
adj. 补足的，补充的 同义词:supplementary, adscititious Secondly , on the basis of complementary advantages to promote pragmatic cooperation .第二，在优势互补的基础上推动务实合作。
n. 复体，[免疫] 复合物 Regardless of how the complexes accumulate , they spell trouble .无论这些复合体是如何累积的，都会引起麻烦。
adj. 难懂的，复杂的 同义词:involved, detailed, sophisticated, elusive You mustn’t complicate the problem by raising new issues.你千万不要提出新的争端使问题更加复杂化。
vi. 遵守；顺从，遵从；答应 同义词:engage, abide by/obey/observe Visitors to the mine must comply with the rules.到矿上参观的人必须遵守规章。
adj. 组成的，构成的 n. 成分；组件；[电子] 元件 同义词:constituent, module, element, constituent Cannot perform this operation on a component without a site .如果没有站点，将不能在组件上执行此操作。
adj. 镇静的；沉着的 v. 组成；作曲（compose的过去分词）；著作 同义词:killed, calm, steady England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.英格兰、苏格兰和威尔士组成大不列颠岛国。
n. 作文，作曲；[材] 构成；合成物 同义词:synthetic, songwriting He crossed off the needless words in his composition .他从作文中把不必要的字都删掉了。

vt. 合成；混合；和解妥协；搀合 vi. 和解；妥协 n. [化学] 化合物；混合物；复合词 adj. 复合的；混合的 同义词:synthetise, mix together, make it up, make peace with someone, mixture, hybrid, mix, mixed, hybrid He compounded water, sand and soil and formed bricks.他将水、沙和土掺和一起做成砖。
vi. 受压缩小 vt. 压缩，压紧；精简 同义词:impact, pack Wood cuttings and sawdust can be compressed into boards.木头的碎渣和锯末可以压成木板。
vt. 包含；由…组成 同义词:involve, contain The committee comprises men of widely different views.该委员会包括了具有各种不同意见的人。

n. 反对票；反对论 vt. 精读；默记 adv. 反面地 adj. 欺诈的 prep. 以… 同义词:non, peruse, learn by heart, reversely, deceptive, imposturous I'll write a letter to the manager and see if I can con him into okaying it.我将给经理写封信，看看是否能说服他同意这件事。
vt. 隐藏；隐瞒 同义词:lock, pocket, to hide He concealed the key inside his tie.他把钥匙藏在领带里面。
vt. 承认；退让；给予，容许 vi. 让步 同义词:afford, accept, agree, recognize, extend, meet halfway, give ground This dictionary is generally conceded to be the best in China.这部词典普遍被认为是中国最好的词典。
vt. 怀孕；构思；以为；持有 vi. 怀孕；设想；考虑 同义词:design, hold, allow, think of, think about He conceived a new plan very quickly.他很快就想出一个新的计划方案。
n. 观念，概念 同义词:idea, sense, notion, construct Indeed , the concept of free speech .的确，言论自由的概念。
n. 怀孕；概念；设想；开始 同义词:idea, threshold, pregnancy, beginning, opening The heart is complex organ that starts beating at few weeks after conception .心脏是一个复杂的器官，它在生命孕育以后的一个星期开始跳动。
adj. 协调的；协定的；商议定的 同义词:harmonious, coordinated White House official claims that the protests were the result of a concerted viral whisper campaign ".一位白宫官员称抗议活动的起因是“像病毒一样蔓延开的耳语运动”。
n. 让步；特许（权）；承认；退位 同义词:recognition, license It is some concession .这已是一些让步了。
adj. 简明的，简洁的 同义词:brief, compact The physician 's need for objective , concise , and well- organized information on drugs is obvious.医生非常需要有关药物的客观性强，内容精炼，条理分明的情报资料。
adj. 混凝土的；实在的，具体的；有形的 vi. 凝结 vt. 使凝固；用混凝土修筑 n. 具体物；凝结物 同义词:honest, effective, real, to freeze, clot, coagulation The workmen are still busy concreting the road.工人们仍忙着用混凝土铺路。
n. 冷凝；凝结；压缩 同义词:compression, hitting Great quantities of cooling water must be available for condensation of the ethyl chloride .为了凝结氯乙烷气体，必须使用大量的冷却水。
vi. 浓缩；凝结 vt. 使浓缩；使压缩 同义词:concentrate, to freeze, dewater, inspissate If steam touches cold surfaces, it is condensed into water.蒸气接触到冷的表面就凝结成水。
n. 秃鹫，秃鹰 同义词:vulture North American condor ; chiefly dull black ; almost extinct .北美秃鹫；主要是暗黑色；几乎灭绝。
n. 导电性；[物][生理] 传导性 同义词:electroconductibility One major disadvantage of anodized surfaces is their very poor conductivity .阳极化处理表面的一个主要缺点是它的导热性非常低劣。
n. 圆锥体，圆锥形；[植] 球果 vt. 使成锥形 同义词:conoid, strobilus, taper I think I'll go for a triple scoop of chocolate surprise in a waffle cone .我会要三个里面有着让人赞不绝口的蛋奶饼的巧克力味冰淇淋。
n. 联盟；联邦；私党 同义词:alliance, union, association, league, federation A man who fought for Confederacy can't be all bad .一个为南部联盟战斗过的人是不会坏到哪里去的。
n. 配置；结构；外形 同义词:allocation, mechanics, framework, profile, texture Cannot open Help for the System Configuration Editor .不能为该系统配置编辑器打开帮助。
n. 界限，边界 vt. 限制；禁闭 同义词:boundary, border, block, set a limit to I wish you would confine yourself to the matter under discussion.希望你只谈目前我们正在讨论的问题。

n. 限制；监禁；分娩 同义词:limitation, delivery, restriction, qualification, prison He spent six years in jail , mostly in solitary confinement , until his conviction was overturned .六年监狱生活，安瓦尔大部分都是被单独关押，直到冤案平反。
vt. 确认；确定；证实；批准；使巩固 同义词:identify, favor, sustain, validate The experiment confirmed my theory.实验证实了我的理论。
n. 冲突，矛盾；斗争；争执 vi. 冲突，抵触；争执；战斗 同义词:interference, difference, war, battle, collision, combat, collide with The hours of those two exams conflict.那两门测验的钟点互有抵触。

adj. 冲突的；相矛盾的；不一致的 v. 冲突；争执（conflict的ing形式） 同义词:inconsistent, nonuniform, skirmishing Rather than seeing the real and virtual realms as distinct and conflicting , in short, it makes sense to see them as complementary and connected .现实与虚拟世界没有被看成是截然不同且彼此冲突的世界，换句话说，它们被看作是互补和彼此相联系。
vt. 面对；遭遇；比较 同义词:front, compare The next big issue confronting the workers is the question of wages.摆在工人面前的第二大问题是工资问题。
adj. 意气相投的；性格相似的；适意的；一致的 同义词:united, consistent, corresponding, solid, matching It was easy to see , from his beaming face, that he had congenial companions .从他愉快的笑容里不难看出，他已经交上了志趣相投的朋友。
n. 拥挤；拥塞；充血 同义词:injection, crowding Department stores are often congested before Christmas.圣诞节前百货商店里常常很拥挤。
vt. 聚集 vi. 聚集 adj. 集合在一起的 同义词:gather round, heap upon, hoard up, concentrate, collect, mass, crowd, gather round The students are congregated in the auditorium.学生在礼堂集合。
n. 针叶树；[植] 松柏科植物 In conifer orchards new stumps should be removed .在针叶树的种子园，新的伐桩应予除掉。
n. 推测；猜想 vi. 推测；揣摩 vt. 推测 同义词:speculation, theory, perhaps, guess, projection, guess, speculate, guess, presume We could not conjecture the fact from what he said.我们从他的话中还推测不出真实情况。
adj. 连贯的；连续不断的 同义词:connected, coherent China staged dramatic rallies for a second consecutive session .中国股市连续第二个交易日大幅上涨。
n. 结果；重要性；推论 同义词:outcome, product, result, significance, event, conclusion Its chief consequence is that they cannot do their job well.其主要后果是，它们不能做好自己的本职工作。
adj. 保守的 n. 保守派，守旧者 同义词:standpat, backward-looking, old guard, pontificator Even so , the report says the prediction of substantial damage by 2030 is conservative .虽然如此，报告还指出，对2030年破坏程度的预测是保守的。
vt. 保存；将…做成蜜饯；使守恒 n. 果酱；蜜饯 同义词:save, hold, confiture, glazed fruit to conserve one's strength保存自己的力量
vi. 结交；陪伴；符合 vt. 使结合；使联系 n. 配偶；伙伴 同义词:associate, accord, combine, bond, comrade, spouse Thieves and other criminals often consort together.盗贼和其他犯罪分子常常厮混在一起。

adj. 显著的；显而易见的 同义词:obvious, prominent, marked, noted, outstanding Giving money to charity is thus more akin to conspicuous consumption than it is to blatant benevolence .这样，向慈善机构捐款就更类似于一种挥霍而不是炫耀自己的善行。
n. 阴谋；共谋；阴谋集团 同义词:designing, plot Like most conspiracy stories , " 13 Bankers " contains a kernel of truth .与多数阴谋故事一样，《13位银行家》也蕴含真相。
adj. 不变的；恒定的；经常的 n. [数] 常数；恒量 同义词:permanent, steady, invariable They face a constant battle to protect pockets of high profits and have few chances to grow .他们面临一场保护高额利润口袋持久的战斗，这些利润很少有机会增加。
adv. 不断地；时常地 同义词:forever, continually, unceasingly, straight, endlessly All this information has to be constantly refreshed , sometimes several times a year .所有这些信息还要时常更新，有时一年要更新好几次。

n. [天] 星座；星群；荟萃；兴奋丛 同义词:zodiac sign, asterism In Constellation rejected a bid for all its operations from EDF, agreeing instead to be bought by a unit of Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway .在九月，美国联合能源公司拒绝了同一公司的出价，且表示愿意被巴菲特伯克希尔哈撒韦公司旗下的一间公司收购。

n. 成分；选民；委托人 adj. 构成的；选举的 同义词:element, client, component, principal, component, electoral Physiology : Study of the functioning of living organisms or their constituent tissues or cells .生理学：研究活的生物体或其组织或细胞功能的科学。
vt. 组成，构成；建立；任命 同义词:install, establish, form, found, build Four quarts constitute a gallon.四夸脱构成一加仑。
n. 宪法；体质；章程；构造 同义词:formation, fabric, structure, build, make This is to ensure that no single party can later change constitution .这是为了确保没有单独的政党在将来能够改动宪法。
adj. 宪法的；本质的；体质上的；保健的 n. 保健散步；保健运动 同义词:essential, intrinsic, interior Congress has no constitutional power to remove the president .但宪法并未规定议会有权撤销总统。
vt. 驱使；强迫；束缚 同义词:chain, bound, force, provoke, enforce Hunger constrained him to eat.饥饿迫使他进食。

adj. 拘泥的；被强迫的；不舒服的 v. 驱使；强迫；勉强（constrain的过去分词） 同义词:uncomfortable, uneasy, propelled But many will find their ability to borrow constrained by investors' flight from risk — and the surge in public debt in the rich world .但是一些国家的筹借能力将受到投资者远离风险的限制—同时还受到发达国家大量发行国债的限制。
n. [数] 约束；局促，态度不自然；强制 同义词:enforcement, restriction That suggests the need for an institutional constraint .这说明英国需要一个制度上的约束。
vt. 压缩；束紧 同义词:to compress, telescope to constrict a muscle压缩肌肉
adj. 收缩的；狭隘的；受限制的 v. 使…收缩；抑制（constrict的过去分词） 同义词:restricted, contractive, forborne to constrict a muscle压缩肌肉
n. 建设；建筑物；解释；造句 同义词:interpretation, explanation, fabric, building, structure But most of the casinos are still under construction .然而大多数赌场的建设仍在进行中。
n. 消费；消耗；肺痨 同义词:expense, depletion To push them up artificially would merely raise unemployment , which would depress consumption and imports still further .人为地推高工资只不过是提高了失业率，这将进一步降低消费和进口。
n. 接触，联系 vt. 使接触 vi. 联系，接触 同义词:touch, link, meet, to link When you contact these two wires, the machine will start at once.当你使这两条导线一接触，这台机器就会立刻开始运转。
n. 集装箱；容器 同义词:vessel, pocket Cover the container with a clean piece of wood .在容器上盖上一块干净的木板。
n. 同时代的人；同时期的东西 adj. 当代的；同时代的；属于同一时期的 同义词:coeval, modern-day, cotemporary This play is the image of contemporary urban life .这个剧本是当代城市生活的生动写照。
n. 环境；上下文；来龙去脉 同义词:circumstance, setting, surrounding, condition Field above a hidden context field can not be a custom group field .在一个隐藏的相关字段上面不能是一个自定义分组字段。

n. 轮廓（contour的复数）；等高线 v. 画等高线；画轮廓（contour的三单形式） 同义词:outlines, lineaments Yet the contours of the next imbalance are becoming clear and China's exchange rate is central .然而，下一个失衡的轮廓正变得清晰起来，而中国的汇率是其中的核心因素。
n. 收缩，紧缩；缩写式；害病 同义词:shrinkage, necking down The hormone that stimulates gall bladder contraction was called cholecystokinin .刺激胆囊收缩的激素被称为胆囊收缩素。
n. 承包人；立契约者 同义词:entrepreneur In order to solve the problem , we plan to work through a contractor .为了解决这个问题，我们正计划通过一个承包机构来做这项工作。
vt. 贡献，出力；投稿；捐献 vt. 贡献，出力；投稿；捐献 同义词:make contribution, offer up, make contribution, offer up They contributed food and clothing for the refugees.他们向难民捐助了食物和衣服。
n. 大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗 同义词:tradition, usage, institution, appointment, bond Have you been to that convention center before ?你以前去过那个会议中心吗？

adj. 符合习俗的，传统的；常见的；惯例的 同义词:traditional, usual, familiar, classical The vaccine works differently from conventional vaccines in that it does not prevent infection directly .这个疫苗作用方式不同于一般的疫苗，它并不会直接防止感染。
adv. 照惯例，照常套 Cleaning the panels conventionally uses precious water .常规太阳能板的清洁是使用水。
vi. 聚合；集中于一点 vt. 会聚；使聚集；使向一点会合 同义词:group, gather together, cluster These lines converge at a certain point.这些线集中于某一点。
vt. 使转变；转换…；使…改变信仰 vi. 转变，变换；皈依；改变信仰 n. 皈依者；改变宗教信仰者 同义词:transform, shift, idolater, proselytizer Water is converted into steam if it is boiled.水沸腾时转化为蒸汽。
n. [电] 变流器，整流器；转化器 同义词:rectifier, commutator Media converter : A device which converts data from one storage medium to another .媒体转换机能：把数据从一贮存媒体转往另一媒体的装置。
vt. 证明…有罪；宣告…有罪 n. 罪犯 同义词:criminal offender, culprit He was convicted of murder.他被判为杀人罪。
n. 定罪；确信；证明有罪 同义词:assurance, damningness This was her third conviction .这是她第三次定罪。
adj. 确信的；深信的 v. 使确信（convince的过去分词）；说服 同义词:confident, sure, induced, persuaded He convinced me of the difficulty of the work.他使我确信这件工作的艰巨性。
adj. 令人信服的；有说服力的 v. 使相信；使明白（convince的现在分词） 同义词:persuasive, potent, defogging He convinced me of the difficulty of the work.他使我确信这件工作的艰巨性。
adj. 欢乐的；欢宴的；酒宴的 同义词:festive, rollicking St Clare was invited out to a convivial party .圣?克莱亚应邀去赴一个宴会。
n. 珊瑚；珊瑚虫 adj. 珊瑚的；珊瑚色的 同义词:polyp This is suggested by observation of pristine coral reefs in the middle of the Pacific .这是在观察太平洋中部的原始珊瑚礁的报告中提出的。
n. 珊瑚（coral的复数） Those sour seas slow the growth of corals .酸性海域会阻碍珊瑚的生长繁殖。
n. 核心；要点；果心；[计] 磁心 vt. 挖...的核 同义词:quick, kernel, main, heart, essential She cored the apples.她挖掉苹果的核。
adj. 有相互关系的 v. （使）相关联；（使）相互对照（correlate的过去分词） 同义词:corelative It is interesting to correlate the history of the 20th century with its literature.把20世纪的历史与文学联系起来是很有趣的。
n. 腐蚀；腐蚀产生的物质；衰败 同义词:erosion, eating away This metal resists corrosion .这种金属抗腐蚀。
n. 贪污，腐败；堕落 同义词:degradation, deterioration corruption is a very pressing task .反腐败是一项非常迫切的任务。

adj. 宇宙的（等于cosmical） 同义词:universal, mundane If the satellite has a tilted orbit , the result is a series of vertical bending waves , an out - of - plane corrugation —small ripples in a cosmic carpet .如果卫星的轨道是倾斜的，就会有一连串垂直的弯曲波，也就是突出平面的皱纹，好似宇宙地毯的涟漪。
n. 服装，装束；戏装，剧装 vt. 给…穿上服装 同义词:clothing, wear, garment, apparel The leading role in the film is costumed in medieval armor.影片中的主角穿着中古时代的甲胄。
vt. 抵消；中和；阻碍 同义词:offset, kill, slow An air straightener should be placed down stream from propeller to counteract circular air motion in the tube .一种气体直线流动器应该使气流从推进器的反作用中使气体的活动在管内循环。
n. 平衡力；自动抵销 vt. 使平衡；抵消 同义词:make weight, equilibrant, kill, offset Hard working often counterbalances slowness at learning.勤奋往往能弥补智力的迟钝。
adj. 反时针方向的 adv. 反时针方向 同义词:contraclockwise The first moment is clockwise and the second is counterclockwise .第一个力矩为顺时针方向，第二个力矩为反时针方向。
n. 副本；配对物；极相似的人或物 同义词:repeat, coppy Your right ear is the counterpart of your left ear .你的右耳朵是你左耳朵的相对物。
n. 牛仔；牧童；莽撞的人 同义词:buckaroo, cowpuncher Welcome to the phenomenon of cowboy poetry .欢迎大家一睹牛仔诗的盛况。
n. （美）牧牛工 同义词:cowpoke Do you know the legend of the Cowhand and Weaver Maid ?你知道牛郎和织女的传说吗？
n. 螃蟹；蟹肉；脾气乖戾的人；起重机 vt. 抱怨；破坏；使偏航 vi. 捕蟹；发牢骚；抱怨 同义词:crane, derrick, destroy, undermine, whine about, pinge Broadside winds crabbed the boat close to the riverbank.从舷侧吹过来的风使船斜行到河岸。

vt. 使破裂；打开；变声 vi. 破裂；爆裂 n. 裂缝；声变；噼啪声 adj. 最好的；高明的 同义词:fracture, open up, fracture, come apart at the seams, split, crevice, greatest, best, perfect, prime Don't pour hot water into the glass or it will crack.不要把热水倒入玻璃杯里，否则杯子会破裂。
n. 工艺；手艺；太空船 vt. 精巧地制作 同义词:technology, hand, ship, workmanship a carefully crafted story一个精心编造的故事
n. 手艺人；工匠 同义词:handicraftsman, fundi Inevitably , under such a system , there craftspeople working for very little money , she says .不可避免的是，在这样的体制下，有些艺人的劳作只能换取微薄的收入，她说。
n. 火山口；弹坑 vt. 在…上形成坑；取消；毁坏 vi. 形成坑；消亡 同义词:volcanic vent, dead hole, destroy, damage, recall His car cratered yesterday.他的汽车昨天坏了。
vi. 爬行；匍匐行进 vt. 爬行；缓慢地行进 n. 爬行；养鱼池；匍匐而行 同义词:creep, creep, aquarium A child learns to crawl before he learns to walk.小孩在学走路之前先学爬。
n. 蜡笔，有色粉笔 vt. 以蜡笔作画，用颜色粉笔画 同义词:pastels On the right side there was a wall crayoned with colourful designs.在右边有一面画有五彩图案的墙。

n. 信任；凭证；祭器台（等于credence table，credenza） 同义词:faith, trust, confidence, dependence But once again science gives at least partial credence to something that was once considered only a myth .但是科学至少再一次给了那些曾经被认为只是神话的东西一部分的信任。
n. 债权人，贷方 同义词:debtee, loaner Part IV : Protection and prohibition of creditor 's rights .第四部分：对债权人权利的保护与限制。
n. 裂缝；裂隙 同义词:crack, split Every crevice in these walls has been filled with putty .这几堵墙的每个裂缝都用油灰补塞上了。
vt. 削弱；使跛；使残废 n. 跛子；残废 adj. 跛的；残废的 同义词:break, to weaken, disablement, lameness, disabled, spavined He was crippled in the war.他在战争中成了跛子。
adj. 造成严重后果的 v. 削弱（cripple的ing形式）；使受损 同义词:weakening He was crippled in the war.他在战争中成了跛子。
n. 十字形；矛盾 adj. 十字形的；交叉的 vt. 画十字形于…；使…交叉成十字状 vi. 交叉；交叉往来 adv. 十字形地；十字交叉地 同义词:conflict, discrepancy, cross, cruciate, cross, intercross Statesmen will crisscross the Continent.政治家们将在欧洲大陆上来往奔波。
n. 交叉腿骨的图形（常画在骷髅下，象征死亡） A pirate ship was always decorated with a black flag bearing a white skull and crossbones .海盗船通常悬挂一面白色的骷髅旗。
n. 杂交繁育 v. 异种交配（crossbreed的现在分词） 同义词:intercrop, interbreeding small plump hybrid developed by crossbreeding Plymouth Rock and Cornish fowl .由普利茅斯洛克鸡和洛克康沃尔鸡杂交而得的小肥鸡。
vi. 啼叫；报晓 n. [鸟] 乌鸦；鸡鸣；撬棍 同义词:corbie, wrecking bar The rooster crows at dawn.公鸡在黎明时打鸣儿。
adj. 粗糙的；天然的，未加工的；粗鲁的 n. 原油；天然的物质 同义词:rough, native, robust, raw, coarse Brent crude futures have fallen to 55 dollars a barrel .北海布伦特原油期货收于每桶55美元。
adj. 粗糙的；天然的，未加工的；粗鲁的 n. 原油；天然的物质 同义词:rough, native, robust, raw, coarse Brent crude futures have fallen to 55 dollars a barrel .北海布伦特原油期货收于每桶55美元。
vt. 弄皱；使一蹶不振 vi. 起皱；倒坍；一蹶不振 n. 皱纹；褶皱 同义词:crush, rumple, wrinkle, plication, rugosity He crumpled the contract into a ball.他把合同揉成一团。
n. 外壳；面包皮；坚硬外皮 vi. 结硬皮；结成外壳 vt. 盖以硬皮；在…上结硬皮 同义词:outer housing, encloser Ice crusted the lake last night.湖面上昨夜结了一层冰。
adj. 甲壳纲的 n. 甲壳纲动物 It has armor and limbs like a crustacean , but has the massive hinged jaws of other fishes .它有着甲壳类动物一样的甲壳和肢脚，却又拥有鱼类一般的铰合式巨颚。
adj. 透明的；水晶般的；水晶制的 同义词:transparent, limpid An orange - red crystalline compound , C14H6O2 ( OH ) 2 , used in making dyes .茜素一种桔红色的晶体化合物，C14H6O2（OH）2，用于制造染料。
adj. 裹有糖霜的；蜜饯的 v. 结晶（crystalize的过去分词） He crystallized salt as part of his experiment.他使盐结晶作为他的实验的一部分。
n. 立体派；立体主义 This was the cityscape of Cubism .这正是立体派的都市风景。
n. 提示，暗示；线索 vt. 给…暗示 同义词:connotation, implication, reminder Will you cue me on my lines?你愿意在我的台词方面给我提示吗?
vi. 到绝顶；达到高潮；达到顶点 vt. 使结束；使达到高潮 同义词:top, fulfill, bring to an end The Christmas party culminated in the distribution of presents.圣诞晚会在分发礼物时达到最高潮。
adj. 笨重的；累赘的；难处理的 同义词:problem, hulking This arrangement cumbersome to manage .如此安排繁琐得难以管理。
n. 馆长；监护人；管理者 同义词:managers, governor curator has mentored a lot of college students .这位馆长教导了很多大学生。
n. 课程 A curriculum -building tool helps educators create lesson plans on the site .课程编写工具帮助教学者在网站上创建课程计划。

n. 管理人；监护人；保管人 同义词:administrator, supervisor Investors are also worried by measures to increase the liability that custodian banks have for the assets they look after.投资者也同样对此表示担忧，该提案增加了受托管的银行对资产管理的负担。
n. 角质层；表皮；护膜 同义词:periostracum, stratum corneum Nails that are white near the cuticle and red or brown near the tip can be a sign of kidney disease .护膜附近的指甲呈白色、指尖附近的指甲呈红色或棕色可能是肾病的征兆。
n. 圆筒；汽缸；[数] 柱面；圆柱状物 同义词:cyclinder, cylindrical surface Steam in a cylinder expands to push a piston outward .气缸中的蒸汽膨胀并推动活塞向外运动。
n. 破折号；冲撞 vt. 使…破灭；猛撞；泼溅 vi. 猛冲；撞击 同义词:jerking motion, discomfit, knock against, impinge on She dashed the glass into smithereens against the wall.她把玻璃杯撞在墙上砸得粉碎。
adj. 使人畏缩的；使人气馁的；令人怯步的 同义词:dispiriting They were daunted by the amount of work still to be done.他们被 那大量待做的工作吓倒了。
n. 黎明；开端 vt. 破晓；出现；被领悟 同义词:morning, origin, come out, break of day The day dawned with a cloudless sky.东方发白，晴空万里无云。
adj. 耀眼的；眼花缭乱的 v. 使…眼花（dazzle的ing形式） 同义词:glaring, sparkly She was dazzled by the sudden sunlight.猛然的阳光使她目眩。
vt. 辩论，争论，讨论 vi. 辩论，争论，讨论 n. 辩论；辩论会 同义词:reason, dispute about, deal, pro-and-con, dispute, controversy When I left, the men were still debating.我离开时，那些人仍在辩论。
n. 碎片，残骸 同义词:remain, chip He brushed away the debris of leaves and pine needles , webs , cocoons and insect corpses .他掸掉了一大堆枯叶、松针、蜘蛛网、虫茧和昆虫的尸体混成的垃圾。
n. （纳税品等的）申报；宣布；公告；申诉书 同义词:profession, announcement His attempt to sweep away all preconceptions and prejudices was a clear declaration of revolt from the past .他企图清除一切先入之见和偏见，这明确宣告了他对过去的反叛。
n. 下降；衰退；斜面 vi. 下降；衰落；谢绝 vt. 谢绝；婉拒 同义词:reduction, recession, fall, go down, slump, excuse oneself from He declined to address the delegates.他拒绝向代表们发表讲话。
adj. 下滑的；衰退的；倾斜的 v. 下降；衰退；婉谢（decline的ing形式） 同义词:gradient, recessionary, descending He declined to address the delegates.他拒绝向代表们发表讲话。
vt. 装饰；布置；授勋给 vi. 装饰；布置 同义词:paint, hang, make, post, set sth out, trick out to decorate walls of the lobby with murals用壁画装饰大厅的墙壁
n. 装饰，装潢；装饰品；奖章 同义词:medal, adornment Decoration of the unfinished project is a kind of conceptual incubation .装饰那些未完成的作品是一种概念般的孵化。
adj. 装饰性的；装潢用的 同义词:ornamental But we can also be surprised by the more decorative plants that also self- sow .当我们也会因为更多装饰性植物能够自播而感到惊奇。
vt. 澄清；除去污物 vi. 排便；澄清 同义词:clarify, fine down, bowel movement, fine down to defecate a liquid澄清一种液体

n. 顺从 同义词:compliance, Friend VS Lover Instinctive deference to authority , paternalism and reluctance to cause others to lose face inhibit overt challenge and criticism .对权威出自本能的顺从、家长作风以及不愿让别人丢脸的心态，抑制了公然的挑战与批评。
adj. 恭敬的；惯于顺从的 同义词:respectful, reverent She is always deferential to anyone in authority .她对任何权威人士总是必恭必敬。

n. 缺陷，缺点；缺乏；不足的数额 同义词:defect, shortage, vice, need, fault To control further processing , delivery or installation of nonconforming product until the deficiency or unsatisfactory condition has been corrected .在缺陷或不满意状况被矫正前，控制不合格产品被进一步加工、交货或安装。
n. 赤字；不足额 同义词:red ink Even if the US were to do so, it would not change the size of the US trade deficit , only its composition .就算是美国愿意这么做，也无助于改变美国贸易赤字规模，而只会改变其构成情况。

vt. 使变形；使成畸形 vi. 变形；变畸形 adj. 畸形的；丑陋的 同义词:transfigure, warp, to morph, be out of shape, ugly, thrawn In cases where the drug was taken during pregnancy,its effects deformed the infants.在怀孕期间如果吸毒，其后果会使婴儿成畸形。

n. 变形 同义词:distortion, transformation, morphing In fact , the deformation control goal of deep excavation not only includes retaining system , but also includes the adjoin environment .实际上，深基坑变形控制目标不仅包括支护体系，而且包括相邻环境。
adj. 灵巧的；机敏的；敏捷熟练的 同义词:neat, dexterous So both nations are deft at playing with numbers .这两个国家对玩弄数字游戏都很有研究。
n. 退化；降格，降级；堕落 同义词:regression, corruption, deterioration, degeneration Right again . Chlorophyll degradation makes it possible to see the other colors .又对了。叶绿素的退化使我们能够看见别的颜色。
vt. 贬低；使……丢脸；使……降级；使……降解 vi. 降级，降低；退化 同义词:lower, bemean, sink in the scale, lower down She felt he was degrading her by making her report to the director.她感到他让她向主管人报告是在侮辱她。
vt. 使…脱水；使极其口渴；使丧失力量和兴趣等 vi. 脱水；去水 Foods are dehydrated to conserve them for future use.把食物脱水弄干贮藏以备将来食用。
adj. 脱水的 同义词:dewatered, evaporated Foods are dehydrated to conserve them for future use.把食物脱水弄干贮藏以备将来食用。
adj. 故意的；深思熟虑的；从容的 vt. 仔细考虑；商议 同义词:intended, studied, designed, contained, conscious, negotiate, mull over to deliberate a question思考问题
n. 微妙；精密 同义词:subtleness, nicety Lydgate divined some delicacy of feeling here , but did not half understand it.这里包含的微妙情绪，利德盖特有些察觉，但一点也不理解。
adj. 微妙的；精美的，雅致的；柔和的；易碎的；纤弱的；清淡可口的 同义词:subtle, female, refined, fine, fragile What a delicate work of art !多精美的一件艺术品啊！
n. （河流的）三角洲；德耳塔（希腊字母的第四个字） But good jobs are hard to come by in the Delta .但是在三角洲地区，想找一份好工作还是很困难。

n. 密度 同义词:specific mass We say the gas becomes ideal in the zero- density limit .我们说在零密度的极限条件下，气体变成理想的。

n. 存款；保证金；沉淀物 vt. 使沉积；存放 vi. 沉淀 同义词:fund, saving, covers, sludge, precipitation, trust in, trust with, settle, to precipitate She deposited her paycheck every Saturday.她每星期六都存储她的薪金支票。
n. 掠夺；破坏，破坏痕迹 同义词:destruction, breaking, blasting on three days of depredation and one day to escape .埃斯特打算剽掠三天，再用一天时间溜走。
n. 沮丧；洼地；不景气；忧愁 同义词:recession, disappointment Work , he says , masks depression .他说，工作掩盖了抑郁。
vt. 源于；得自 vi. 起源 同义词:to originate He derives great satisfaction from his stamp collection.他从集邮中得到极大的满足。
n. 脱盐作用；减少盐分 Renewables will also support a desalination plant that will provide fresh water.可循环使用的能源也会提供给会生产干净水的脱盐加工工厂。
vi. 下降；下去；下来；遗传；屈尊 vt. 下去；沿…向下 同义词:decline, go down They descended from the mountaintop.他们从山顶下来。
adj. 下降的；祖传的 n. 后裔；子孙 同义词:falling, downward, child, seed He is a descendant of Confucius.他是一个古老家族的后裔。

n. 下降；血统；袭击 vt. 除去…的气味；使…失去香味 同义词:reduction, birth, decline, fall, blood Your possessions will be distributed by the state under its statute of descent if you die without a will .如一个人无遗嘱死亡，其财产将按州的法定继承法规予以处置。
vt. 指定；指派；标出；把…定名为 adj. 指定的；选定的 同义词:specify, ticket, name, appoint, assigned, named, appointed She designated the place where we were to meet.她指定了我们将会面的地点。
adj. 令人满意的；值得要的 n. 合意的人或事物 同义词:satisfying, fulfilling But it is desirable for any news outfit .对任何新闻团体这都是合理的。
adj. 不顾一切的；令人绝望的；极度渴望的 同义词:venturous, devil-may-care Outsiders may do more to help — at least to tackle the desperate plight of civilians .局外人也许能给予更多的帮助——至少可以缓解平民的绝望困境。

despoil的变形

vt. 察觉；发现；探测 同义词:explore, perceive She detected the odor of gas in the room.她闻到房里有煤气味。
adj. 可检测的；可发觉的 Primary plaques detectable in 16 to 20 hours .在16到20小时内可查出原发溶斑。

vi. 恶化，变坏 vt. 恶化 同义词:go ill, change for the worse, go ill, exasperate The patient's condition has deteriorated over the last few hours.几个钟头前病人的病情已恶化。
adj. 决定性的 n. 决定因素；[数] 行列式 同义词:crucial, critical, final, decisive, conclusive, Determinants and Permanents Clearly the size of the market is not the determinant .显然，其市场的大小并不是决定因素。

vt. 毁灭；毁坏 同义词:destroy, damage The invader de-vastated the whole town.入侵者蹂躏了整个城镇。
n. 毁坏，荒废 同义词:demolition, disruption The devastation across central Florida from a tornado and storm is severe and widespread .一场龙卷风席卷了佛罗里达州，造成了严重的，大规模的毁坏。
n. 装置；策略；图案 同义词:apparatus, installation, strategy, unit, gear This is its first attempt to sell its own device .这是它第一次尝试销售自己的研发产品。
adj. 缺乏的；全无的 同义词:lacking, scarce imprisonment that devoids a person of humanity剥夺某人人权的关押

adj. 斜的；对角线的；斜纹的 n. 对角线；斜线 同义词:off-angle, pitched, solidus Emre makes a diagonal run, takes the ball past two then crosses at the near post . Calderoni collects.在左翼埃姆雷做了一个交叉跑动，连过两人后传到近角，卡尔德罗尼得到。
adv. 对角地；斜对地 同义词:cornerways, arrisways The building comprises two stacked , diagonally -staggered , concrete volumes .建设包括两个堆叠，角交错，具体数量。
n. 直径 We must gauge the diameter of wire first .我们必须先测量电线的直径。

n. 用语；措词 同义词:phrase, parlance Diction is also very important .措辞也很重要。
vi. 区分，区别 vt. 区分，区别 同义词:to distinguish, tell apart, to distinguish, tell apart Its slate roof differentiates this house from others.这间房子的石板瓦房顶使其有别于这地区的其他房子。
adj. 弥漫的；散开的 vt. 扩散；传播；漫射 vi. 传播；四散 同义词:divergent, transmit, spread abroad, spread abroad, to disseminate The printing press helped diffuse scientific knowledge.印刷品有助于传播科学知识。

n. 离题；脱轨 同义词:off the point, irrelevance " Please pardon my digression , " said Mary . " I didn't mean to diminish the importance of our conversation .“请原谅我离题了，”玛丽说，“我并不想贬低我们谈话的重要性。

n. 稀释，冲淡；稀释法；冲淡物 同义词:thinning, fluxing Both hygiene and proper dilution are difficult to ensure .奶粉的卫生和恰当稀释很难得到保证。
vt. 使减少；使变小 vi. 减少，缩小；变小 同义词:micrify, minify, to cut down, fall off The dry spell quickly diminished our water suply.干旱期使我们的水供应锐减。
n. 恐龙；过时、落伍的人或事物 You are my only dinosaur patient !你是我唯一的恐龙病人！

vt. 抛弃；放弃；丢弃 vi. 放弃 n. 抛弃；被丢弃的东西或人 同义词:yield, desert, quit, fall out of, render up, to renounce, to abandon, to give up, rejection, abandonment He discarded an old hat and an old pair of shoes.他扔掉了一顶旧帽子和一双旧鞋。
vt. 识别；领悟，认识 vi. 看清楚，辨别 同义词:recognize, identify, see clearly, tell from We discerned a sail on the horizon.我们看见了地平线上的一张帆。
n. 识别；洞察力；敏锐；眼力 同义词:recognition, identification, vision, insight, perception For her Minerva aided and endowed with courage and discernment .因为密涅瓦帮助她，给了她勇气和洞察力。
vt. 解雇；卸下；放出；免除 vi. 排放；卸货；流出 n. 排放；卸货；解雇 同义词:issue, forgive, issue, shed, firing, dismissal The dockers discharged a ship.码头工人卸下了船上的货物。
n. 学科；纪律；训练；惩罚 vt. 训练，训导；惩戒 同义词:science, punishment, rod, knowledge, payment, coach, drill The football team was disciplined by a professional trainer.这支足球队受过专业教练员的训练。
adj. 使人沮丧的；令人气馁的 v. 沮丧（discourage的ing形式）；失去勇气 同义词:depressing, desponding She was discouraged in her marriage.她对自己的婚姻感到泄气。
n. 论述；谈话；演讲 vi. 演说；谈论；讲述 vt. 说出；演奏出 同义词:speech, talk, address, lecture, treatise, orate, speechify, come out with, give voice to They discoursed at the gate for a while.他们在大门口交谈了一会儿。
adj. 谨慎的；小心的 同义词:careful, cautious, prudent, wary Be discreet about any information you uncover .揭露任何信息都要谨慎。
adj. 离散的，不连续的 n. 分立元件；独立部件 同义词:uncontinuous, incontinuous How about time that comes in discrete steps , as for computers , instead of being continuous ?或者时间并不连续，而是一步步离散分立的，就像电脑一样？

vt. 分配，分发；免除；执行 vi. 免除，豁免 同义词:perform, implement, portion, discharge, part, get free of, exempt from The Red Cross dispensed charity to refugees.红十字会向难民放赈。
vt. 分散；使散开；传播 vi. 分散 adj. 分散的 同义词:transmit, spread around, spread around, spread about, scattered, decentralized The riot police dispersed the crowd.防暴警察驱散了人群。

n. 处理；支配；清理；安排 同义词:transactions, settlement, treating, handling, governance Right now , the only thing the company cares about is efficient waste disposal and higher profits .现在，公司唯一关心的事情就是有效地进行废物处理和提高利润。
adj. 有…倾向的；打算做…的；有某种健康状态的 v. 处理；配置；使适应（dispose的过去分词）；使有倾向 同义词:prone, liable, conditioned He disposed his money in charity.他将自己的钱用于慈善事业。
adj. 不成比例的 The IDB found that disproportionate share of tax is paid by big companies .美洲开发银行发现，大型企业竟然要缴付不成比例的税捐。
n. 争论者，辩论者 adj. 争论的 同义词:controversialist, wrangler, gladiatorial, contestable A person engaged in a controversy or debate , especially in public ; a disputant .争论者，辩士：进行争辩或辩论的人，尤指在公共场合；
vt. 辩论；怀疑；阻止；抗拒 vi. 争论 n. 辩论；争吵 同义词:discuss, debate, argue, stem, block, debate, argue with, argument, debate, brush, controversy We disputed with each other on various issues.我们为各种问题互相争论。
n. 不光彩，坏名声 同义词:bad reputation A string of corruption scandals has brought all of politics disrepute .一连串的腐败丑闻已经使得所有的政治派别声名狼藉了。
vt. 宣传，传播；散布 vi. 散布；广为传播 同义词:distribute, publicize, transmit, shed, put about to disseminate seeds播种
vt. 浪费；使…消散 vi. 驱散；放荡 同义词:lose, spend, to break up, sow one's wild oats The sun dissipated the mist.阳光驱散了薄雾。
vt. 使溶解；使分解；使液化 vi. 溶解；解散；消失 n. 叠化画面；画面的溶暗 同义词:hemolyze, haemolyze, melt, disappear Water dissolves salt.水能使盐溶解。
vt. 使…膨胀；使…扩张 vi. 扩张；膨胀 同义词:fill, swell with Habitual overeating had distended the boy's stomach.习惯性的暴食使这男孩的胃扩张了。
adj. 明显的；独特的；清楚的；有区别的 同义词:obvious, visible, unique, evident, individual In the medium term , a sharp rise in inflation is a distinct possibility .在中期，通货膨胀的急剧上升是一次明显的可能。
n. 区别；差别；特性；荣誉、勋章 同义词:quality, identity, character, tang, discrimination The first is the thermodynamic distinction between past and future .第一个是过去与未来在热力学上的区别。
adj. 有特色的，与众不同的 同义词:unusual, different, apart He says it is possible to detect different species of mosquito because their wings beat distinctive frequency .他表示，检测不同种的蚊子是有可能的，因为它们翅膀扇动的频率有着明显区别。
adv. 特殊地；区别地 同义词:exceptionally, differentially For the dark matter , however, relaxation distinctively different .对于黑暗物质来说，松弛的方式完全不同。

adv. 明显地；无疑地，确实地 同义词:obviously, clearly, easily, strictly, no doubt She now distinctly saw two or three figures already so near to her , that a precipitate flight would have been equally fruitless and impolitic .她现在能够看清两三个人影已经离她不远，再要仓促逃跑不仅是徒劳，而且未免失策了。
vt. 扭曲；使失真；曲解 vi. 扭曲；变形 同义词:contort, misinterpret, become deformed, to morph Arthritis had distorted her fingers.关节炎使她手指变形了。
vt. 转移；分心 同义词:shift, divert from The music distracted her from her work.音乐使她无法专心工作。
vt. 分配；散布；分开；把…分类 同义词:portion, part, spread They distributed political pamphlets in the hall.他们在大厅里散发政治小册子。
n. 分布；分配 同义词:allocation, assignment The general question of size distribution and its representation was briefly discussed .谱分布及其表示法的一般问题已简单地讨论过了。
n. 潜水者；跳水的选手；潜鸟 同义词:ducker, plunger He would suffer from the change in pressure like a diver who comes out of deep water too fast .否则，他们就会像潜水员从深水过快浮上水面那样因为压力突然变化而受到伤害。
n. 分歧 同义词:variance, bifurcation, gulf The task of typography is to determine the degree of divergence .字体编排设计的任务同时也是决定分歧的程度。

adj. 不同的；多种多样的；变化多的 同义词:different, unlike, varying, another, dissimilar They then proceed to use this analytical framework to explore subjects as diverse as cancer , pregnancy , mate choice , literature and religion .于是，他们着手利用这一分析框架，探讨癌症、怀孕、择偶、文学和宗教等多种多样的主题。

n. 多样化；变化 同义词:variation, shift, change, turn, mutation A more fundamental point is simply that diversification cannot work well in a credit bubble because virtually all asset categories are driven up by leverage .更基本的一点就是，多样化在信用泡沫中无法正常发挥作用，因为几乎所有资产类别都通过杠杆作用被抬高了。
adj. 多样化的；各种的 v. 使…多样化（diversify的过去分词） to diversify the services使服务多样化

n. 转移；消遣；分散注意力 同义词:entertainment, transfer, occupation, recreation, metastasis Such " over- reach ", in Dr Kochi 's view , amounts to a costly , risky diversion of resources away from the realistic aim of just controlling malaria .在高池博士看来，这种“过度扩展”无异于是一种昂贵而风险的资源配置，并远离了仅仅控制疟疾这一实际目标。
n. 多样性；差异 同义词:difference, multiplicity And now all three tactics — information , diversity and choice —are looking shaky .现在信息、多元化、以及选择、这三种手段看起来不可靠。
n. 文件, 证明文件, 史实, [计]文件编制 Review all documentation , such as videotapes , pictures , logs , sitreps , and cables .审阅所有文件，如录像、图片、日志、军情报告、及电报。
n. 教条，教理；武断的意见 同义词:credendum This is a time to put dogma and politics to one side and concentrate on pragmatic answers .因此现在必须将教条和政治放在一边，全力关注使用的解决方案。
n. 海豚 同义词:sea hog, porpoise The symbols of Apollo were the wolf , swan , raven , stag , dolphin , laurel , and lyre .阿波罗的象征物是狼、天鹅、渡鸦、雄鹿、海豚、桂冠和竖琴。
n. 领域；域名；产业；地产 同义词:province, territory, world, industry, kingdom, universe, field I can't answer your question about photography . It 's not in my domain .我不能回答你关于摄影的问题，这不在我所学的范围内。
adj. 国内的；家庭的；驯养的；一心只管家务的 n. 国货；佣人 同义词:internal, household, home, family, servant Do you want domestic or imported beer ?你是要国产的还是进口的啤酒?。
adj. 显性的；占优势的；支配的，统治的 n. 显性 同义词:ruling, predominant It may be hard to achieve in a group that includes a dominant member , such as Egypt .一个团体中如果包含某个如埃及这种统治性成员，将很难取得成就。
vt. 控制；支配；占优势；在…中占主要地位 vi. 占优势；处于支配地位 同义词:possess, contain, regulate, bit, bottle, advantage over, prevail over He completely dominates the family.这个家完全由他做主。
adj. 休眠的；静止的；睡眠状态的；隐匿的 同义词:still, resting A dormant volcano may explode at any time .休眠火山可能在任何时间爆发。
n. 宿舍，学生宿舍 adj. 住宅区的 同义词:lodging house, student hostel, uptown The dormitory was aired in the morning .早晨，宿舍通过风。
adj. 背部的；背的，背侧的 同义词:neural, tergal They also dorsal horn neurons less able to respond to pain signals .此外，鸦片类物质也会降低脊髓背角神经元对疼痛讯息的反应。
n. 草稿；汇票；草图；[篮球]选秀 vt. 起草，设计；为...打样 He drafted his speech.他起草了讲演稿。
vi. 排水；流干 vt. 喝光，耗尽；使流出；排掉水 n. 排水；下水道，排水管；消耗 同义词:discharge of water, exhaust, use out, consumption, sewage to drain oil from a crankcase把曲轴箱里的油排干

adj. 庞大的，巨大的；凶暴的，极恶的 同义词:huge, tremendous, massive, macro, vast " It was an enormous culture shock , " she says.她说：“那是一种巨大的文化冲击。

n. 企业家；承包人；主办者 同义词:contractor, enterpriser The original French word entrepreneur refers to someone who undertakes , who does something .企业家这个词来源于法语，原意是指承担任务和做事情的人。

vt. 使竖立；建造；安装 adj. 竖立的；笔直的；因性刺激而勃起的 vi. 直立；勃起 同义词:construct, fit, fix, structure, frame, straight, upright, to stand on end, get it up to erect a house盖房

n. 侵蚀，腐蚀 同义词:corrosion, eating away There is an erosion of confidence in banks especially now they have invested in products they don't understand .人们对投行的信任受到侵蚀，特别是现在它们曾投资于自己不理解的产品。

adj. 永恒的；不朽的 同义词:permanent, lasting, everlasting, undying, timeless Do you think that you can find eternal love through the Internet ?你认为你可以通过互联网到永久的爱情吗？
n. 来世，来生；不朽；永世 同义词:life after death, afterlife Four or five minutes can feel like an eternity .五分钟可能让人感得这是一段没完没了的时间。
adv. 伦理上 The impulse to invest ethically is praiseworthy , but I'm skeptical of " one size fits all " approaches to it.促进合乎道义的投资是值得赞赏的，但我怀疑这种“一刀切”的做法能否行得通。
adj. 种族的；人种的 同义词:racial, tribal They claim to be the world 's largest ethnic group without a state of their own .他们声称，在世界上没有自己国土的民族里，他们是最大的一个。

adj. 明显的；明白的 同义词:obvious, distinct, visible Even on his last day at the White House , when the thinning hair and gaunt face of a cancer patient was so evident , he stressed how he loved his job .即使在他在白宫的最后一天，在一个癌症病人的稀疏的头发和憔悴的脸如此明显的情况下，他仍表达了他是多么的热爱他的工作。

n. 挖掘，发掘 同义词:digging, disinterment The treasure survived until its excavation in 1978 .在1978年以前，这批宝物一直沉睡于地下。

adv. 异常地；特殊地；例外地 同义词:singularly, unconventionally It was an eventful year . Even the weather was exceptionally bad .那是个多事的年头，甚至天气都特别糟。
n. 超过，超额；过度，过量；无节制 adj. 额外的，过量的；附加的 同义词:immoderation, exorbitance, additional, added, attached, extra, plus It would export excess supply , instead .相反，它将输出过度的供应。

n. 裸露症患者；倾向自我宣传的人；喜欢出风头的人 exhibitionist desires to attract attention to himself .好表现的人渴望吸引人们注意自己。
adj. （要价等）过高的；（性格等）过分的；不在法律范围之内的 同义词:excessive, ultra, tall Furthermore , the expense of lofting the heavy projectiles into orbit would exorbitant .不仅如此，将沉重的抛射物送上轨道的费用也十分惊人。
vt. 扩张；使膨胀；详述 vi. 发展；张开，展开 同义词:dwell on, enlarge on, grow, go way They hope to expand their company.他们希望扩大公司的规模。
n. 膨胀；阐述；扩张物 同义词:inflation, exposition He also questioned the firm 's expansion plans and overseas acquisitions .他还质疑该公司的扩展计划和海外收购活动。
n. 远征；探险队；迅速 同义词:velocity, speed He bound himself to pay half the cost of the expedition .他保证支付这次远足旅行费用的一半。
n. 支出，花费；经费，消费额 同义词:spending, payout This expenditure would include two railway lines .这些支出将包括两条铁路线。
n. 专门知识；专门技术；专家的意见 同义词:special knowledge, professional knowledge The centre is itself an example of such expertise .该中心本身就是这种专门技能的一个实例。
adj. 明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的 同义词:precise, decided, distinct, specific, express Bill Venners : What do you mean ? Could you be more explicit ?比尔：你的意思是什么？能更“明确”的解释一下吗？
vt. 开发，开拓；剥削；开采 n. 勋绩；功绩 同义词:develop, mine, merit, feat to exploit a business opportunity利用商业机会
adj. 指数的 n. 指数 同义词:index, indice Very quickly you get an exponential ramp.很快，你看到一个指数级的增长。
vt. 表达；快递 adj. 明确的；迅速的；专门的 n. 快车，快递，专使；捷运公司 同义词:voice, put, precise, decided, technical, rapid, specific, rapido, flier to express an idea clearly清楚地讲述(或表达)一个想法
vt. 表达；快递 adj. 明确的；迅速的；专门的 n. 快车，快递，专使；捷运公司 同义词:voice, put, precise, decided, technical, rapid, specific, rapido, flier to express an idea clearly清楚地讲述(或表达)一个想法
adj. 表现的；有表现力的；表达…的 As he said this his countenance became expressive of a calm , settled grief that touched me to the heart .他说这句话的时候，脸上流露出一种使我心弦震颤的冷静而深沉的悲哀。

vt. 延伸；扩大；推广；伸出；给予；使竭尽全力；对…估价 vi. 延伸；扩大；伸展；使疏开 同义词:afford, allow, deal, deliver, finger, reach, spread, range, enlarge, push The carpenter extended the measuring tape as far as it would go.木匠把卷尺拉长到不能再拉为止。
adj. 延伸的；扩大的；长期的；广大的 v. 延长；扩充（extend的过去分词） 同义词:chronic, long time, expanding, standing, broader, lengthened They extended warm congratulations to the congress .他们向会议表示热烈的祝贺。
adj. 广泛的；大量的；广阔的 同义词:widespread, massive, comprehensive, substantial, vast It is the only institution so far to extensive use of the grade .剑桥是目前为止唯一一个充分利用到各种级别的机构。
adj. 外部的；表面的；[药] 外用的；外国的；外面的 n. 外部；外观；外面 同义词:foreign, outer, outside, surface, out, outside, without, surface, face, garment Why should it depend for recovery on external demand ?其经济复苏为何要依赖于外部需求呢？
adj. 灭绝的，绝种的；熄灭的 vt. 使熄灭 同义词:out If we continue to destroy the countryside many more animals will become extinct .我们若继续破坏自然环境，将会有更多的动物绝种。
n. 消失；消灭；废止 同义词:evaporation, disappearance A certain extinction rate is essential for evolution .一定的灭绝率，对于进化来说是必要的。

adv. 特别地，非常；另外 n. 临时演员；号外；额外的事物；上等产品 adj. 额外的，另外收费的；特大的 同义词:specifically, particularly, badly, highly, greatly, too, walker-on, special edition, additional, added, excess We have a teacher at my school who gives us extra lessons sometimes .我们学校里有名老师有时给我们上一些额外的课程。
vt. 提取；取出；摘录；榨取 n. 汁；摘录；榨出物；选粹 同义词:abstract, milk, pop, juice, succus to extract a tooth拔牙
n. 织物；布；组织；构造；建筑物 同义词:cloth, organization, formation, construction, textile The use of metallised fabrics is sometimes proposed to reduce the emissivity of a fabric .不时地有人建议采用镀有金属膜的织物以减少织物的发射率。
vt. 制造；伪造；装配 同义词:manufacture, make, doctor The finest crafts people fabricated this golden ring.这枚金戒指是由最优秀的工匠制作的。
vt. 促进；帮助；使容易 同义词:promote, boost, further It would facilitate matters if they were more co-operative.如果他们再合作些就容易多了。
n. 简易化；[生理] 助长；容易 同义词:easiness, liable to Social facilitation effect Working harder when in a group than when working alone .社会促进效应：个人在群体中工作比单独工作更努力。
n. 设施；设备；容易；灵巧 同义词:equipment, furniture, establishment, plant, fixture Might stringing things together be a core facility of the brain ?串连事物的本领会是我们脑部的核心技能吗？
n. 派别；内讧；小集团；纪实小说 同义词:wing, junta The progressive faction demanded a reserve system and currency supply owned and controlled by the government .进步派系要求建立由政府占有和控制的储备制度和货币供应。
n. 因素；要素；[物] 因数；代理人 vi. 做代理商 vt. 把…作为因素计入；代理经营；把…分解成 同义词:element, deputy, agent, basic, essential He factored his cousin's estate for five years.他经管他表兄弟的财产有五年之久。
n. 科，系；能力；全体教员 同义词:ability, capacity, competence, department, power She had , of course , no faculty for quenching memory in dissipation .她当然也没有以放荡纵欲来冲淡记忆的能耐。
vi. 褪色；凋谢；逐渐消失 vt. 使褪色 adj. 平淡的；乏味的 n. [电影][电视] 淡出；[电影][电视] 淡入 同义词:peter, color fading, discolor, stupid, literal-minded The blue rug has faded over years.蓝色的地毯多年后已经褪色了。
n. 饥荒；饥饿，奇缺 同义词:hunger, fames Warnings of flood , famine , drought and mass extinction merge into an overwhelming sense of futility .洪水、饥荒、干旱和物种灭绝等征候，渐渐化作无法抑制的徒劳感。
adj. 狂热的 同义词:crazy, wild, enthusiastic Some might even say they are fanatical .有些人甚至说他们是狂热的。

n. 魅力；魔力；入迷 同义词:charm, grace This has helped prompt them to join the fray and , in many cases, rediscover a fascination with collecting that dates back thousands of years .这些因素推动它们加入了这股热潮，并且重新发现了具有数千年历史的收藏爱好的魅力。
adj. 流行的；时髦的；上流社会的 同义词:popular, going, modern, ruling, epidemic Fundamentally , from the view point of their own class , the fashionable writers were correct .从根本上看，从他们本阶级的观点看，这些流行作家是正确的。
adj. 致命的；重大的；毁灭性的；命中注定的 同义词:important, significant, great, fell, kill In drivers and workers it can lead to fatal accidents .这在司机或工人身上可能引发致命的事故。
n. 疲劳，疲乏；杂役 vt. 使疲劳；使心智衰弱 vi. 疲劳 adj. 疲劳的 同义词:tiredness, weariness, wear down, tire Climbing the mountain fatigued the whole scout troop.登山使整个侦察连感到疲劳。
n. 旋塞；插口 同义词:soket Then draw water from the lowest faucet in the house.然后从最低的水龙头中接水就可以了。

adj. 可行的；可能的；可实行的 同义词:possible, working, potential, viable We should take active attitude feasible countermeasures to stride over the green trade barrier .我们应该采取积极的态度，切实可行的对策，跨越绿色贸易壁垒的障碍。

vt. 喂养；供给；放牧；抚养（家庭等）；靠…为生 vi. 吃东西；流入 n. 饲料；饲养；（动物或婴儿的）一餐 同义词:grass, take care of, range, take food, flow into, meal, breeding, husbandry to feed a baby on breast milk用人奶喂养婴儿

vt. 谋生；保护；挡开；供养 vi. 照料；供养；力争 同义词:maintain, support, secure, preserve, sustain, nurse, attend on She raised her arm up to fend branches from her eyes.她抬起胳膊将树枝从她眼前挡开。
adj. 富饶的，肥沃的；能生育的 n. 肥沃，多产 同义词:rich, viable, pregnancy, enrichment Fertile lands in some states could be mistaken for lakes .有些州肥沃的土地可能会误变成湖泊。

adv. 狂热地；兴奋地 同义词:excitedly, crazily Notwithstanding its deeply polluted state , China is also feverishly to clean up .即使污染已经很严重了，中国政府还是在努力地清理污染。
n. 纤维；光纤（等于fibre） 同义词:fibre, funicle His wax model will be correct in every detail , every fiber and muscle and proportion .他的蜡像模型不放过任何细节，每一个线条、肌肉及比例，都是正确的。
n. 小说；虚构，编造；谎言 同义词:invention, novel But the most intriguing is the strange world of fan fiction .而最吸引人的莫过于哈迷小说的奇妙世界。
adj. 虚构的；假想的；编造的；假装的 同义词:affected, imaginary, assumed, simulate They bought the materials fictitious names .他们用假名买下了这些材料。
n. 保真度；忠诚；精确；尽责 同义词:precision, loyalty A dog teaches a boy fidelity , perseverance , and to turn around three times before lying down.狗教会一个男孩忠诚，坚忍不拔，在倒下之前还要挣扎一下。
n. 领域；牧场；旷野；战场；运动场 vi. 担任场外队员 adj. 扫描场；田赛的；野生的 vt. 把暴晒于场上；使上场 同义词:domain, province, territory, world, kingdom, universe, wild, feral He fielded the ball smartly.他机敏地截住球。

n. 数字；人物；图形；价格；（人的）体形；画像 vi. 计算；出现；扮演角色 vt. 计算；认为；描绘；象征 同义词:digital, price, value, number, rate, occur, cast, offer, come out, indicate, expect, guess, find, feel The sculptor figured the girl in clay.雕塑家用粘土塑造了这个女孩子的形象。

n. 文件；档案；文件夹；锉刀 vt. 提出；锉；琢磨；把…归档 vi. 列队行进；用锉刀锉 同义词:document, portfolio, paper, record, folder, introduce, present, prefer, advance, put in, procession Please file (away) those letters in a drawer.请把那些信件归档放入抽屉内。
n. 冷杉；枞木 abbr. 弗京（firkin） 同义词:firtree Poplar , elm , walnut , camphor , fir , rosewood , bamboo , etc .白杨，榆木，胡桃，樟树，枞树，紫檀，竹子等。
vi. 剥落；成片状剥落 vt. 使…成薄片；将…剥落 n. 小薄片；火花 同义词:chip, shell, spark, A FRAME An approach called PVD is main way to prepare nano scale flake at present .本文阐述的物理气相沉积法（vd法）目前制备纳米片状铝粉的主要方法。
vt. 使闪耀；使张开；用发光信号发出；使外倾 vi. 闪耀，闪光；燃烧；突然发怒 n. 闪光，闪耀；耀斑；爆发；照明弹 同义词:sparkle, burn, shine on, explosion, stroboflash The fire flared up as the paper caught.纸着火时突然烧了起来。
n. 跳蚤；低廉的旅馆；生蚤的动物 同义词:Siphonaptera What do you call a travelling flea ?一种旅行的跳蚤被称为什么？
adj. 飞逝的；转瞬间的 v. 迅速移动（fleet的ing形式） 同义词:zapping To avoid making the story too heavy and serious , the film does also have its fleeting moments of silly fun .为了避免剧情过于沉重、严肃，影片还特意穿插了短暂的荒谬搞笑情节。
n. 灵活性；弹性；适应性 同义词:give, elasticity, adaptability Together these proteins give the artery its strength and flexibility .这些蛋白质联手提供了动脉的强度及弹性。
adj. 灵活的；柔韧的；易弯曲的 同义词:elastic, pliable By this reckoning , a flexible body learns to acclimatize to stresses .由此可以判断，灵活可塑的身体学会适应压力。

n. 群；棉束（等于floc） vt. 用棉束填满 vi. 聚集；成群而行 同义词:cluster, gang, bunch, qun, concentrate, collect, mass, crowd Students are flocking to such fields as genetics and molecular biology.大学生正在大量从事诸如遗传学和分子生物学等领域的研究。
n. 起伏，波动 同义词:wave, undulation Sometimes temporal fluctuation may take place inthe local velocity .有时，在局部速度中可能出现瞬时脉动。

adj. 最重要的；最先的 adv. 首先；居于首位地 同义词:principal, supreme, main, lead, firstly, primarily, initially, first of all, chiefly First and foremost , road safety consciousness is generally not firmly ingrained in Singaporeans .一个基本的问题是，国人并没有根深蒂固的公路安全意识。

adj. 强大的；可怕的；令人敬畏的；艰难的 同义词:powerful, terrible, august, horrible Here the practical challenges would be formidable .这在实践中将面临巨大的挑战。
