vt. 培养；养育，抚育；抱（希望等） adj. 收养的，养育的 同义词:cultivate, rear, raise, plant, mother to foster the sick照料病人
n. 破裂，断裂；[外科] 骨折 vi. 破裂；折断 vt. 使破裂 同义词:cracking, rhexis, crack, come apart at the seams, crack, flaw He fell and fractured his leg.他摔下来跌断了腿。
adj. 脆的；易碎的 同义词:delicate, crumbly We have to face the fact that land is fragile .我们不得不正视一个事实，土地是脆弱的。
n. 脆弱；[力] 易碎性；虚弱 同义词:frangibility, friability Such examples hint at the fragility of a globalised world .这些例证也暗示了一个全球化世界的脆弱。
n. 碎片；片断或不完整部分 vt. 使成碎片 vi. 破碎或裂开 同义词:debris, chip Some of the molecular ions fragment into smaller daughter ions and neutral fragments .有些分子离子断裂成为较小的子离子和中性碎片。
n. 争论；打架；磨损处 vt. 使磨损；变得令人紧张、急躁 vi. 被磨损 同义词:controversy, combat, fight, scuff frayed cuffs磨破的袖口
vt. 运送；装货；使充满 n. 货运；运费；船货 同义词:ship, transit, forward, charges, carriage They freighted the boat with bananas.他们把香蕉装载在船上。
adj. 狂热的；发狂的 n. 疯子；狂人 同义词:crazy, wild, enthusiastic, madman, nutcase It is a frenetic , technology - driven world of which few ordinary investors are even aware .这是一个由技术推动的狂热世界，普通投资者几乎毫不知情。

n. 狂暴；狂怒；暴怒 vt. 使发狂；使狂怒 同义词:fury, turbulence, dement, derange October may produce scenes of rare frenzy at the Wallace Collection when an exhibition of 25 oils by Damien Hirst opens.十月，达米恩•赫斯特的25副油画将在华莱士收藏馆展出，届时场面一定会非常疯狂。
adj. 寒冷的，严寒的；冷淡的 同义词:cold, cutting, freezing I was reminded how much I prefer trains as I waited for one frigid December day in Waterbury , Vt .某个冬日早晨当我在美国佛蒙特州瓦特贝利市等火车时，再次想起自己是多麽地偏爱火车。
n. 边缘；穗；刘海 adj. 边缘的；附加的 vt. 加穗于 同义词:margin, ear, brink, suburb, additional, attached, marginal, plus, more The river is fringed with trees.河两边种有树。
prep. 来自，从；由于；今后 同义词:by virtue of, ex- to go from London to Paris从伦敦到巴黎
vt. 挫败；阻挠；使感到灰心 vi. 失败；受挫 adj. 挫败的；无益的 同义词:defeat, discomfit, founder, come to naught, thwarted, unprofitable to frustrate plans取消计划
adj. 令人沮丧的 v. 使沮丧（frustrate的ing形式） 同义词:abjective, dispiriting, dispiriting to frustrate plans取消计划
n. 挫折 同义词:setback, clawback Still , they avoided the limelight , much to the frustration of aviation enthusiasts excited by snippets of news .他们依旧避开聚光灯，让引颈期盼片断消息的飞行热中份子感到挫折。
vi. 冒烟；发怒 vt. 熏；冒烟；愤怒地说 n. 烟；愤怒，烦恼 同义词:smoke, anger, smoke, anger, worry, trouble, wrath The smouldering wreck fumed for days.燃烧的残骸冒了几天的烟
vt. 熏制；香薰；用烟熏消毒 They fumigated the room to kill the vermin.他们用烟熏房间以杀死害虫。
n. 运行，运作；功能；机能；起酌（function的动名词） v. 运行，起作用（function的现在分词形式） 同义词:revolution, action The machine doesn't function.那机器不能运行了。
n. 真菌；菌类；蘑菇（fungus的复数） 同义词:mushrooms Many trees and plants not only host mycorrhizal fungi – they have actually come to depend on them.许多树木和植物不仅是菌根真菌的宿主，而且它们自身也要依赖真菌。
n. 真菌，霉菌；菌类 同义词:eumycete, mycete A more radical answer , though, may be to use a completely different sort of insecticide : a fungus .更根本的答案可能会是利用一个完全不同的杀虫剂：一种真菌。
vt. 提供；供应；装备 同义词:afford, prepare, serve, tender, lend to furnish information提供情报
adj. [物] 熔化的，[化学] 熔凝的；装有保险丝的 v. 混合；熔解（fuse的过去分词） 同义词:molten, fusional, compounded Copper and zinc are fused to make brass.铜与锌熔合后形成黄铜。
n. 融合；熔化；熔接；融合物 同义词:melt, amalgamation Bacteria fusion promises to be a major advance in research involving microbial genetics .细菌融合看来是微生物遗传学研究的一个较大的进展。

n. 银河；[天] 星系；银河系；一群显赫的人 同义词:the Milky Way Indeed , it would be very surprising if a misunderstanding of the galaxy caused the CMB to be aligned with the solar system .的确，如果一个关于银河系的误解，就能造成CMB朝向太阳系排列的效果，这将是非常令人惊讶的。
n. 画廊；走廊；旁听席；地道 vt. 在…修建走廊；在…挖地道 vi. 挖地道 同义词:hall, passage, corridor, underground, subway This gallery is open free .这家美术馆免费开放。
vt. 镀锌；通电；刺激 同义词:stimulate, fan to galvanize a person into action刺激某人采取行动
n. 间隙；缺口；空白 vi. 裂开 vt. 使成缺口 同义词:separation, blank, seam, spring off, jag There is an gap between what IQ tests can measure and what we want to them to show .在智商测试所能测量的和我们希望这些测试所显示的之间存在着巨大的鸿沟。
adj. 气态的，气体的；无实质的 同义词:gasiform, gassy It could also help illuminate how giant , gaseous exoplanets often come to orbit their parent stars so closely .还有助于说明，巨大的气态外部行星如何这么近地围绕起源恒星的轨道运行。
vt. 使形成；发生；生殖 同义词:go on, call into being His kind smile soon generated friendliness.他友善的微笑很快造成了友好的气氛。
adj. 慷慨的，大方的；宽宏大量的；有雅量的 同义词:handsome, liberal Early in December the foreman came along with generous provisions for Christmas .十二月初，领班带来了供圣诞节享受的丰盛的食物。
adj. 遗传的；基因的；起源的 同义词:inherited, hereditary What they found was a genetic abnormality .他们发现的是一种基因的反常。

adv. 从遗传学角度；从基因方面 Almost every morsel of our food is genetically modified - admittedly by artificial selection not artificial mutation , but the end result is the same .我们吃的几乎每一口食物都是转基因的——通过人工选择而不是人工突变，但是最终结果是相似的。
n. 遗传学 同义词:hereditism Today was the first day of our unit genetics .今天是我们学习遗传学单元的第一天。
adj. 亲切的，友好的；和蔼的；适宜的 同义词:friendly, nice, sweet, kind, well He knows how to genial smiles on the audience .他知道怎样向观众们投送亲切的微笑。

n. 类型；流派；风俗画 adj. 风俗画的；以日常情景为主题的 同义词:description, type, style, breed But the scandal that has been rumbling on since the end of November in Brasília has bested all previous efforts genre .但是，自从去年十一月底在巴西利亚一直甚嚣尘上的丑闻，已经将过去所有的努力付诸东流。
adv. 真诚地；诚实地 同义词:sincerely, truly, frankly, honestly A " free city " which was not genuinely free would suffocate freedom .一个并不真正自由的“自由城”将使自由受到窒息。
vt. 使得；获得；受到；变成 n. 生殖；幼兽 vi. 成为；变得；到达 同义词:acquire, make, earn, buy, find, generation, reproduction, become, land to get information获得情报
n. 巨人；伟人；[动] 巨大的动物 adj. 巨大的；巨人般的 同义词:Titan, jotun, huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro If this continues , then there will be no giant pandas in the world .如果这些继续的话，世界上很快就将没有大熊猫了。
n. [建] 大梁，纵梁 同义词:sommer, carling The scheme is a transition between the girder with vertical piers and the true arch .该结构是具有垂直墩的箱梁桥钢与真正的拱桥之间的一种过渡形式。
vt. 给；产生；让步；举办；授予 n. 弹性；弯曲；伸展性 vi. 捐赠；面向；有弹性；气候转暖 同义词:award, effect, form, grant, inspire, flexibility, curve, elasticity, look, make a contribution to He gave her a handsome present.他送给她一份精美的礼物。
adj. 冰的；冰冷的；冰河时代的 同义词:ice, icy Much protest will take place in the courts , which will proceed at their usual glacial pace.很多抗议将在法庭上演，但法庭办事一贯拖拖拉拉，这次也不例外。
n. 冰河，冰川 同义词:ice floe These fish moved into glacier -carved lakes thirteen thousand years ago .这种鱼在一万三千年前就迁徙到冰川湖中。

adj. 迷人的，富有魅力的 同义词:killing, taking, engaging, charming, fascinating At one point, when we are mired deep in muck, I ask MacPhee whether this is the glamorous life of a paleontologist .当我们深陷排泄物泥沙的某一刻，我问麦克菲这是不是就是古生物学家迷人的生活。
n. 腺 He read of animals with prolonged pregnancies whose fetuses lacked a gland .他了解到妊娠过长的动物，它们的胎儿缺少脑垂体前叶。
adj. 腺的，腺状的 同义词:adenoid Genius itself, it seems to me , is but an over- supply of glandular secretions .据我看来，天才仅是腺分泌的供给过多的结果。
n. 玻璃器皿；玻璃器具类 Drying of printing on glassware .玻璃器皿印刷烘干；
n. 一瞥，一看 vi. 瞥见 vt. 瞥见 同义词:glance, dekko, catch sight of, catch sight of He glimpsed her as the beautiful girl went by.当美丽的姑娘走过时他瞥了一眼。
adj. 全球的；总体的；球形的 同义词:spherical, ball-shaped So from the global perspective , it is very important .所以从全局的角度来看，这是很重要的。

item.word: go against the grain to do sth
item.trans: vi. 走；达到；运转；趋于 n. 去；进行；尝试 vt. 忍受；出产；以…打赌 同义词:walk, step, track, stroke, conduct, process, experiment, try, yield, stomach, stand, abide, tough to go 90 miles an hour每小时走90英里
vi. 走；达到；运转；趋于 n. 去；进行；尝试 vt. 忍受；出产；以…打赌 同义词:walk, step, track, stroke, conduct, process, experiment, try, yield, stomach, stand, abide, tough to go 90 miles an hour每小时走90英里
vi. 走；达到；运转；趋于 n. 去；进行；尝试 vt. 忍受；出产；以…打赌 同义词:walk, step, track, stroke, conduct, process, experiment, try, yield, stomach, stand, abide, tough to go 90 miles an hour每小时走90英里
adj. 华丽的，灿烂的；极好的 同义词:brilliant, wonderful, excellent, famous, super The good news was I met two gorgeous men !好消息是我遇到了两个很棒的男人！
n. 美食家 同义词:foodie, gastronomist, belly-god Alex Vandervoort was a committed party -goer, and loved gourmet food and wine .亚历克斯?范德沃特是个离不开社交场的人物，喜欢佳肴美酒。
n. 花岗岩；坚毅；冷酷无情 同义词:moorstone Usually the Shinto god of the earth keeps the brute 's head pinned down with a granite keystone .地祗大明神通常能将狂兽的头压制在一块花岗岩要石下。
adj. 形象的；图表的；绘画似的 同义词:ikonic, imagic An international jury made up of prestigious graphic humour artists will select the winners .一个国际评审委员会由著名的图形幽默艺术家将选择赢家。
n. 蚱蜢；[植保] 蝗虫；小型侦察机 vi. 见异思迁；蚱蜢似地跳 同义词:locust grasshopper did not listen.蝗虫根本听不进去。
adj. [力] 重力的，[力] 引力的 In the gravitational field of the earth , negative energy corresponds to bounded motion and positive energy to unbounded motion .在地球的重力场中，负的能量相应于有界限运动，正的能量相应于无界限运动。
n. 重力，地心引力；严重性；庄严 同义词:weight, seriousness Exactly right . And that reason is gravity .完全正确。而那个原因就是重力。
vt. 放牧；擦伤 vi. 吃草；擦伤 n. 放牧；轻擦 同义词:grass, feed, raw, range, brush burn, pasturage to graze cattle放牛
n. 放牧；牧草 v. 擦过；抓伤（graze的现在分词） 同义词:pasturage The car grazed the tree.汽车擦着了树。
vi. 抱怨；嘟囔 n. 怨言 vt. 喃喃地说出 adj. 抱怨地表示；嘟囔地说 同义词:beef about, repine, earful, querimony, mouth She is always grumbling!她总是喃喃诉苦!
n. 海湾；深渊；分歧；漩涡 vt. 吞没 同义词:bay, deep, variance, engulf, swallow It placed more than 500 reporters from around the world with forces in the Gulf .他们在海湾的部队中安排了500多名来自世界各地的记者。
v. 涌出；迸出 n. 涌出；迸发 同义词:spring forth, outrush, well up Oil gushed from the well.油从油井中喷出。
n. 喷油井；说话滔滔不绝的人 同义词:spouter The oil rushes up the tube and spouts up as a gusher .石油会沿着钢管上涌，如同自喷井那样喷射出来。
adj. 体操的，体育的 同义词:calisthenic Grammar is a good gymnastic .语法是一门很好的训练科目。
n. 旋转，[力] 回转；螺层 同义词:revolution, rotation, rolling, turning In this case , a charged particle has a simple cyclotron gyration .在这种情况下，带电粒子有一个简单的回旋回转。
n. [生态] 栖息地，产地 同义词:home, production place The place is the habitat for giant panda .这个地区是大熊猫的生活基地。
n. 冰雹；致敬；招呼；一阵 vt. 致敬；招呼；向...欢呼；猛发；使象下雹样落下（过去式hailed，过去分词hailed，现在分词hailing，第三人称单数hails） vi. 招呼；下雹 int. 万岁；欢迎 同义词:precipitation, blast, welcome, rah They hailed him as King.大家欢呼拥戴他为国王。
n. 特点；品质证明 vt. 给…盖上品质证明印记；使具有…标志 同义词:trait, distinguishing feature The necklace was hallmarked with Pt 999.那条白金项链上印有纯正优质标记。
vi. 停止；立定；踌躇，犹豫 n. 停止；立定；休息 vt. 使停止；使立定 同义词:desist from, come to a stop, break, stop, rest, stay, stand, put a stop to They halted for lunch.他们停止前进吃了顿午饭。
vt. 妨碍；束缚；使困累 n. 食盒，食篮；阻碍物 同义词:let, chain, bound, hindrance, incumbrance A steady rain hampered the progress of the work.持续不停的大雨妨碍了工程的进展。
n. 手工艺；手工艺品 同义词:artifact handicraft shows fine workmanship .这件工艺品做工精细。
adj. 不干涉的；不插手的 Mr Yang took hands- off role as chairman after the IBM acquisition .在联想收购IBM之后，杨元庆选择了不太干涉公司事务的董事长职位。
adj. 亲身实践的，亲自动手的 With his hands -on approach he brings to life the mystery and majesty of these giant wonders of the botanical world .结合自己的亲身体验，他将植物世界这些奇迹巨人们的神秘与雄壮描绘地栩栩如生。
adj. 偶然的；随便的；无计划的 n. 偶然；偶然事件 adv. 偶然地；随意地 同义词:occasional, casual, casualness, accidentalism, accidentally, fortuitously The town grew in a haphazard way.这城镇无计划地随意发展。
vi. 变硬，变坚固；变坚强；变冷酷 vt. 使…变硬；使…坚强；使…冷酷；使…麻木不仁 同义词:stiffen With the temprature cool, magma would be hardened into rock.温度越来越低，岩浆也就变硬，最后成了岩石。
n. 计算机硬件；五金器具 同义词:brightwork The next cycle the power of the hardware increases , making possible better graphics and more complex games .在下个循环中，硬件机能的增强使制作更好图形和更复杂游戏成为可能。
vt. 治理；套；驾驭；披上甲胄 n. 马具；甲胄；挽具状带子；降落伞背带 同义词:keep on top, saddlery, coat of mail He harnessed his horse to a tree.他把他的马拴在一棵树上。
n. 严肃；刺耳；粗糙的事物 同义词:serious about, solemnity For all its harshness and irrationality , it is the only world we've got.尽管它严酷而又不合理，它终究是我们具有的唯一的世界。

n. 匆忙；急忙；轻率 vi. 匆忙；赶紧 vt. 赶快 同义词:hurry, hasty indeed, hurry, rush, hurry up, get a move on, shake it up, snap it up haste , some take the first opportunity that presents itself .有些人匆匆忙忙地接受了主动出现的第一个机会。
n. 孵化；舱口 vt. 孵；策划 vi. 孵化 同义词:incubation, engineer, scheme, incubate to hatch eggs孵蛋，抱窝
n. 拖，拉；用力拖拉；努力得到的结果；捕获物；一网捕获的鱼量；拖运距离 vt. 拖运；拖拉 vi. 拖，拉；改变主意；改变方向 同义词:pull, catch, drag, drag one's feet, draw, pull She hauled her large box into the room.她把那只大箱子拖进了房间。
vt. 常出没于…；萦绕于…；经常去… vi. 出没；作祟 n. 栖息地；常去的地方 同义词:habitat, purlieu He haunted the British Museum when living in London.在伦敦居住期间，他常去不列颠博物馆。
adj. 闹鬼的；反复出现的；受到困扰的 v. 常去；缠住；使担忧（haunt的过去式和过去分词） He is going to sell it because it haunted .汤普森先生之所以想卖它，是因为那里常闹鬼。
n. 港口；避难所，安息所 vt. 为……提供避难处；安置……于港中 同义词:port, home, harbor He havened his motorboat on a small harbour.他把摩托艇停泊在一个小港上。
vt. 赌运气；冒…的危险，使遭受危险 n. 危险，冒险；冒险的事 同义词:risk, risk, throw, venture, adventure In making the investment, he hazarded all his savings.他不顾风险，把所有的积蓄全都投了资。
vi. 注意，留心 n. 注意到；留心到 vt. 注意，留心 同义词:take care of, mind you, be mindful of, watching, take care of, be mindful of, mind you He didn't heed my advice.他没有听从我的忠告。
n. 脚后跟；踵 vt. 倾侧 vi. 倾侧 同义词:careen He's being heeled by the police.他正受到警方的追捕。
n. [化学] 氦（符号为He，2号元素） Most of commercial helium is recovered from natural gas through a cryogenic separation process .大多数商用氦是通过一种低温分离过程从天然气中回收的。
n. 边，边缘；摺边 vt. 包围；给...缝边 vi. 做褶边 同义词:margin, rim, case, invest Hem your shirt with lace.把你的衬衣镶上花边。
n. 半球 同义词:semisphere He said despite economic gains throughout the hemisphere , too many people remain mired in poverty .他说尽管整个半球的经济在增长，太多人仍深陷在贫穷的泥潭中。
n. 先驱；传令官；报信者 vt. 通报；预示…的来临 同义词:precursor, forerunner One falling leaf heralds the coming of autumn.一片落叶预示着秋天的来临。
adj. 力大无比的；困难的；赫拉克勒斯的 To be fair , Herculean progress has already been made .老实说，巴西已经取得了巨大的进步。
n. 兽群，畜群；放牧人 vi. 成群，聚在一起 vt. 放牧；使成群 同义词:drove, menagerie, grass, feed, range Wild geese herd to the south in autumn every year.每年秋天大雁都成群结队地飞往南方。
n. 遗产；传统；继承物；继承权 同义词:tradition, succession, inheritance, legacy Individuals who do get on often dump their Romani heritage , and the baggage that goes with it.一些融入社会的人往往已经抛弃了罗姆人的传统，抛弃了罗姆人的信仰。
adj. [化学] 多相的；异种的；[化学] 不均匀的；由不同成分形成的 同义词:uneven, polyphase The albumins contain the majority of the cellular enzymes and are thus extremely heterogeneous .清蛋白包含细胞的酶的大多数，因而是极其不均匀的。
n. 冬眠；过冬；避寒 同义词:winter sleep, torpidness Black bears hibernate in winters.黑熊在冬季蛰居过冬。
n. 层级；等级制度 In the hierarchy of the Soviet empire , Chechnya was a backwater .在苏维埃帝国的阶级制度，车臣就是一潭死水。
vt. 突出；强调；使显著；加亮 n. 最精彩的部分；最重要的事情；加亮区 同义词:emphasize, stress, first thing His remarks highlighted his own function.他的讲话突出了他个人的作用。
n. 铰链；枢纽；关键 vt. 给…安装铰链 vi. 依…而转移 同义词:key, crux He slowly opened the lid that hinged to the box.他慢慢地打开了用合页接合的箱子盖。

n. 内地；穷乡僻壤；靠港口供应的内地贸易区 同义词:inland, outback The capital 's citizens , inured to fighting in hinterland , remain shocked by the speed with which the rebels reached them .首都的居民尽管已经习惯于乍得中心地区的战乱，他们仍然对叛军进攻的速度感动惊讶。
vt. 持有；拥有；保存；拘留；约束或控制 vi. 支持；有效；持续 n. 控制；保留 同义词:own, save, support of, stand up for sb, control, preservation, grasp, guiding, command He always holds a pipe between the teeth.他嘴里总叼着烟斗。

adj. 空的；中空的，空腹的；凹的；虚伪的 n. 洞；山谷；窟窿 vt. 使成为空洞 vi. 形成空洞 adv. 彻底地；无用地 同义词:empty, artificial, false, bare, vacant, hole, cavity, cavitate, thoroughly, entirely, completely, fully, tight He hollowed out a cave in the snowfield for night.他在雪原上挖了个洞以过夜。
adj. 均匀的；[数] 齐次的；同种的 同义词:conspecific We should note that the elements of a flexibility matrix are not necessarily dimensionally homogeneous .我们应该注意柔度矩阵中的诸元素不一定是量纲完全一样。
n. [天] 地平线；视野；眼界；范围 同义词:extent, boundary, region, spectrum, territory, area The captain swept the horizon with a telescope .船长用望远镜环视了一下地平线。
adj. 水平的；地平线的；同一阶层的 n. 水平线，水平面；水平位置 同义词:level, aclinic, hydrostatic level, horizon line Also notice the unfortunate use of horizontal scrollbars in all list fields .不过，注意所有的列表域遗憾地使用了水平滚动条。
adj. 敌对的，敌方的；怀敌意的 n. 敌对 同义词:adverse, enemy, opposed, opposition, antagonism She is ruled a hostile witness by the judge .她被法官裁定是一个怀有敌意的证人。
n. 敌意；战争行动 同义词:hatred, enmity Opposition to the war , he still thinks , explains much of the hostility to him .他仍然认为，对战争的反对可以解释对他的多数敌意。
n. 住宅；家庭；机构；议会；某种用途的建筑物 vt. 覆盖；给…房子住；把…储藏在房内 vi. 住 同义词:residence, organization, machinery, family, home, invest, sheet, roof, cap We should manage to house and feed the poor.我们得设法解决贫民的食宿问题。
vt. 把...挤在一起；使缩成一团；草率了事 vi. 蜷缩；挤作一团 n. 拥挤；混乱；杂乱一团 同义词:gather up, cower, chaos, disorder, confusion, congestion, involvement He huddled his books in the corner of his bedroom.他把书胡乱堆积在他卧室的一角。
n. 蜂鸟 同义词:trochilus, wood nymph It could be hummingbird .说不定是一只蜂鸟。
vt. 丢下；用力投掷；愤慨地说出 vi. 猛投；猛掷 n. 用力的投掷 同义词:let drop At last they hurled huge stones at enemy's heads.最后，他们用大石头向敌人的头上用力掷了过去。
n. [化学] 氢 Micro cells use energy sources like hydrogen and methanol .微型电池用像氢气、甲醇这样的能源。
adj. 过敏的；高灵敏度的；超感光度的 同义词:irritable, touchy Some argue that the absence of parasites is leading to hypersensitive immune systems .有些理论认为少了寄生虫的寄生便导致了免疫系统的超敏反应。
n. 假设 同义词:tentative His hypothesis turned out to be correct .事实证明他的假设是正确的。
n. 冰；冰淇淋；矜持；（俚）钻石 vt. 冰镇；结冰 vi. 结冰 adj. 冰的 同义词:gelato, reservedness, glacial In winter, the weather in the North can ice people's breath.冬天，北方的天气冷得可以使人们呼出的呵气立即结冰。
n. [地理] 冰山；显露部分 同义词:Berg, floeberg A huge iceberg was suddenly spotted by a lookout .一个了望员突然发现一座巨大的冰山。
n. 冰柱；垂冰；冷冰冰的人 同义词:icle She walked in, as chill as icicle , and as high as a princess .她走进来了，跟个冰柱似的，冷冰冰的，又象个公主似的高不可攀。
n. 图标；偶像；肖像，画像；圣像 同义词:figure, idol Before James Bond became a screen icon , he was a paperback hero.在詹姆士邦德成为银幕偶像之前，他是一名平面模特。
adj. 同一的；完全相同的 n. 完全相同的事物 同义词:self, same Then he let the soup of identical bugs replicate and ferment .然后他令这些一模一样的菌虫复制并发酵。
adj. 可辨认的；可认明的；可证明是同一的 同义词:recognizable A more identifiable trend is working in the opposite direction.一个更加可以明确的趋势与上述现象正好相反。
vt. 确定；识别；使参与；把…看成一样 vi. 确定；认同；一致 同义词:confirm, recognize, ascertain, cotton, square He identified his baggage among hundreds of others.他在几百件行李中认出了自己的行李。
n. 身份；同一性，一致；特性；恒等式 同义词:accordance, estate, unity, agreement, quality How do you think this shapes their identity ?你认为这会怎样塑造他们的特性？
n. 意识形态；思想意识；观念学 An obsolete ideology can hamper an economy .过时的意识形态会束缚经济。
n. 成语，习语；土话 同义词:phrase, dialect Although this is a serious subject , using this idiom indicates a kind of humor as well .尽管这是个严肃的话题，但是还是要用这个成语来表示一种幽默的方式。
adj. 火的；[岩] 火成的；似火的 同义词:pyrogenic Is there any other way of producing igneous rocks besides the volcanic eruption ?除了火山喷发形成岩浆岩这一种方式外，还有其它方式吗?。
vt. 阐明，说明；照亮；使灿烂；用灯装饰 vi. 照亮 同义词:say, lamp, elucidate, clarify, light up, to shine In the countryside, houses are still illuminated by oil lamps.在农村，房屋仍然靠油灯照明。

n. 照明；[光] 照度；启发；灯饰（需用复数）；阐明 同义词:lumination, luminous intensity A little bit of knowledge illuminates much around it, and that new illumination feeds on itself , so one corner explodes .一点点知识就可以阐释周围的许多现象，而新的阐释又启发了知识自身，于是知识的角落迅速扩大。
n. 幻觉，错觉；错误的观念或信仰 同义词:hallucination, fantasm But earth 's flowers of illusion are kept eternally fresh by death .但是大地的幻象的花朵，却被死亡保持得永远新鲜。
vt. 阐明，举例说明；图解 vi. 举例 同义词:clarify, elucidate, give an example, cite an example He illustrates the lesson with a picture.他用一张图片来说明这篇课文。
adj. 虚构的，假想的；想像的；虚数的 同义词:fictitious, figmentary My pet will be an imaginary duck .我的宠物会是一只虚拟的鸭子。
adj. 虚构的；富于想像的；有创造力的 同义词:fictitious, figmentary The second money -saver is to use existing technology in imaginative new ways .第二种省钱方法是以富有想象力的新方法使用现有技术。
vt. 吸收，接受；喝；吸入 同义词:absorb, adopt I saw him imbibing liquor.我看见他正在饮烈酒。
n. 模仿，仿造；仿制品 adj. 人造的，仿制的 同义词:simulation, mimicry, artificial, synthetic This is almost certainly in imitation of the similar American custom .这个用法几乎可以肯定是模仿美国的类似习惯。
adj. 巨大的，广大的；无边无际的；非常好的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro She drew immense strength and wisdom from the masses .她从群众中吸取了巨大的力量和智慧。
vt. 使固定；使不动；使停止流通 同义词:fix, nail She was immobilized by shock.她由于震惊而目瞪口呆。
adj. 免疫的；免于……的，免除的 n. 免疫者；免除者 同义词:exonerative Some research groups are hoping to train immune cells to recognize and go after cancer stem cells .有些研究团队希望能训练免疫细胞，使它们能辨识并追缉癌症干细胞；
n. 免疫力；豁免权；免除 同义词:phylactic power, immunizing power The immunity achieved is generally brief and must be boosted .所获得的免疫性一般是短暂的，须激发注射。

vt. 影响；撞击；冲突；压紧 vi. 冲击；产生影响 n. 影响；效果；碰撞；冲击力 同义词:affect, influence, reach, work on, strike, charge at, effect, impression, influence, infection, affection The soldier impacted his sword into the ground.那个战士将他的剑紧紧插入地下。
vt. 损害；削弱；减少 同义词:hurt, break, blast to impair one's health损害某人的健康
vt. 给予（尤指抽象事物），传授；告知，透露 同义词:afford, allow, deal, reveal, extend The carpet imparted an air of elegance to the room.地毯使房间有了一种优雅的气氛。
n. 口吃；妨碍；阻止 同义词:prevention, intervention, violation, check He impediment in speech .那小女孩说话有点口吃。
adj. 必要的，势在必行的；命令的；紧急的 n. 需要；命令；祈使语气；规则 同义词:necessary, urgent, essential, emergency, instant, necessity, instruction, need, request, order But the economic imperative is clear .但是经济规则一目了然。
adj. 不渗透性的；（对水等）不能渗透的 The landfill sits on a natural foundation of London clay which is more impermeable .垃圾填埋点位于伦敦泥土的自然地基上，这些泥土几乎是不可渗透的。
adj. 客观的；非个人的；没有人情味的；非人称的 n. 非人称动词；不具人格的事物 同义词:objective A safe topic of conversation between strangers in Britain is the weather -- unemotional and impersonal .在英国，陌生人之间的合适的话题是天气??因为这不涉及情感与个人隐私。
vt. 扮演；模仿；拟人，人格化 同义词:play, simulate, pattern, imitate to impersonate Hamlet on the stage在舞台上扮演哈姆雷特
n. 扮演；模仿；装扮 同义词:simulation, imitation to impersonate Hamlet on the stage在舞台上扮演哈姆雷特
n. 动力；促进；冲力 同义词:momentum, promotion, acceleration The writer believes team work provides staff a stronger impetus for some part of works in their decision .团队工作给予成员们更强劲的动力，因为他们在决策中有自己出的一份力。
vt. 实施，执行；实现，使生效 n. 工具，器具；手段 同义词:accomplish, perform, come true, fulfill, enforce, instrument, facilities, vehicle, tool, engine to implement a promise履行诺言
n. 含义；暗示；牵连，卷入 同义词:connotation, meaning, import, involvement, reminder But the other implication is not so easily proved .但是，相反的推断不是容易证明的。
adj. 含蓄的；暗示的；盲从的 同义词:suggested, undemonstrative Shear force is implicit in the development of bending moments .杆中的剪力在弯矩的推导中是不明显的。
n. 进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性 vt. 输入，进口；含…的意思 vi. 输入，进口 同义词:significance, stress, value, weight, meaning, to input, type in, to input, type in imported goods进口货
vi. 利用；欺骗；施加影响 vt. 强加；征税；以…欺骗 同义词:do with, trade on, force, levy tax to impose duties on imported wines向进口酒征税
adj. （建筑物等）壮观的；威风的；（仪表）堂堂的；给人深刻印象的 v. impose的ing形式 同义词:spectacular, impressionistic to impose duties on imported wines向进口酒征税
adj. 感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的 同义词:affecting, heart-warming The most impressive find is the nearly complete skeleton of a huge Columbian mammoth .最震撼的发现是几乎完整的一具大型哥伦比亚猛犸的骨架。
n. 印记；痕迹；特征；版本说明 vt. 加特征；刻上记号 同义词:mark, print, characteristic, trace to imprint a document with a seal在公文上盖章
n. 监禁，关押；坐牢；下狱 同义词:prison, durance The murderer was sentenced to life imprisonment .那个杀人犯被判终身监禁。
n. 即兴创作；即席演奏 It needed great powers of reasoning and improvisation .这需要极大的推理和临时拼凑的能力。
vt. 即兴创作；即兴表演；临时做；临时提供 vi. 即兴创作；即兴表演；临时凑合 同义词:extemporize to improvise a song即兴创作一首歌曲
prep. 按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内 adv. 进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里 adj. 在里面的；时髦的 n. 执政者；门路；知情者 同义词:within, inside, modern, fashionable, tony in the room在房间里
prep. 按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内 adv. 进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里 adj. 在里面的；时髦的 n. 执政者；门路；知情者 同义词:within, inside, modern, fashionable, tony in the room在房间里
prep. 按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内 adv. 进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里 adj. 在里面的；时髦的 n. 执政者；门路；知情者 同义词:within, inside, modern, fashionable, tony in the room在房间里
prep. 按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内 adv. 进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里 adj. 在里面的；时髦的 n. 执政者；门路；知情者 同义词:within, inside, modern, fashionable, tony in the room在房间里
adj. 难达到的；难接近的；难见到的 IT IS usually agreed that casinos should , in the public interest , be inaccessible and expensive .大家通常认为，为了保证公共利益，应该提高赌场的门槛和成本。
vt. 使不活动；使不活泼；阻止活动 同义词:deactivate They discovered how to inactivate , or knock out, single genes in laboratory animals .他们发现如何使实验用动物体内个体特定基因不活跃、失去作用。
adj. 不充分的，不适当的 同义词:deficient, unhappy, wrong, inappropriate, improper Very often , television coverage of news is superficial and inadequate .电视中的新闻报导常常是肤浅的，不充分的。
adj. 不适当的；不相称的 同义词:inadequate, unhappy, wrong, improper Given the pain that nearly everyone is experiencing , that would be entirely inappropriate .考虑到几乎每个人正在经历的痛苦，那将是完全不合时宜的。
vt. 使无能力；使不能；使不适于 同义词:disenable to incapacitate somebody from dancing使某人不能跳舞
adj. 不断的；不停的；连续的 同义词:continuing, straight, endless, ceaseless, running An affliction characterised by the incessant need to move faster .这症很闹心，让人不断的想要跟快的行动。

n. 事件，事变；插曲 adj. [光] 入射的；附带的；易发生的，伴随而来的 同义词:event, circumstance, occurrence, scene, happening, incoming Last year , a member of United States Congress said he has a sleep driving incident .去年，联邦议会的一位成员说他曾有过睡觉开车的事故。
n. 倾向，爱好；斜坡 同义词:tendency, liability, hill, trend, interest Desire or inclination .欲望或倾向。

n. 不协调；不一致；不适宜 同义词:variance, disparity When I point to the incongruity , Chen doesn't miss a beat: " That shows one thing — the assumption that people like money is correct ."当我指出室内外的不协调时，陈其一立刻回应：「这只证明了一件事──人们爱钱的假设是正确的。」
adj. 不协调的；不一致的；不和谐的 同义词:absonant, uncoordinated The incongruous falsetto voice took on a musing note.那个不相称的假嗓子里带着一种沉思的声调。
vt. 包含，吸收；体现；把……合并 vi. 合并；混合；组成公司 adj. 合并的；一体化的；组成公司的 同义词:involve, contain, absorb, comprise, merge, mix together, amalgamative, pooled to be incorporated a member of the union被吸收为工会会员
adj. 难以置信的，惊人的 同义词:tremendous, unbelievable, spectacular, fabulous No one who isn't directly involved would ever believe the incredible duplication and futility .不直接卷入的人没有一个会相信这种不可置信的重复和徒劳。
vt. 表明；指出；预示；象征 同义词:forecast, index, image, shadow, figure to indicate the direction by pointing with one's finger用手指指示方向

n. 指示，指出；迹象；象征 同义词:instruction, symbol, breath, pointing, evidence One indication that this may be what Sinochem is planning is that it has not yet appointed an adviser .这或许正是中化的打算，有一个迹象可以证明这一点：该公司迄今尚未指定交易顾问。
adj. 不可缺少的；绝对必要的；责无旁贷的 n. 不可缺少之物；必不可少的人 同义词:obbligato Your help is indispensable to me .你的帮助对我是绝对必要的。
n. 个人主义；利己主义；个人特征 同义词:privatism, egoism The results of these struggles underline the importance of both individualism and government involvement .这些斗争的结果说明，个人主义和政府干预都是重要的。
adj. 可诱导的；可导致的 同义词:derivable This diauxie curve is typical of inducible enzymes .这种双峰曲线是诱导酶的典型增长曲线。
n. 工业化 The geographic distribution of lung cancer was dissimilar to that of industrialization .肺癌的地理分布同工业化的分布不尽相同。
adj. 工业化的 v. 使工业化；将…组成产业（industrialize的过去分词） to industrialize a country使一个国家工业化
adv. 不可避免地；必然地 同义词:necessarily, ineluctably Young people today understand that the world is now truly and inevitably smaller .今天的年轻人发现世界在变小是真实的却不可避免的。
adv. 逃不掉地；解不开地；解决不了地 同义词:inescapably Their freedom is inextricably bound to our freedom . We cannot walk alone .他们的自由与我们的自由是息息相关的，我们不能单独行动。
n. 感染；传染；影响；传染病 同义词:impression, affection, effect, influence, incidence It can also check for signs of infection .验血还能检查出受感染的征兆。
n. 自卑；下属；次等；下部 同义词:self-contempt, subordinate This inferiority complex , the result of so many defeats , cannot be cured overnight .这种因多次失败而产生的自卑情结不可能一夜之间治愈。
vt. 骚扰；寄生于；大批出没；大批滋生 同义词:harry, ply with places infested by snakes蛇大批出没的地方

vt. 洗；沐浴；冲刷 n. 剩余物 vi. 沐浴 同义词:obliterate, remain, surplusage, bathe Lave ejected from the volcano . Luckily, it did not hurt people .熔岩从火山喷出，幸好没伤着人。
n. 层，阶层；地层 vt. 用压条法培植；把...堆积成层 vi. 借助压条法生根繁殖 同义词:thickness, degree, stratum, tier Mists layered thick about them.层层雾气将他们笼罩。
n. 外行；门外汉；俗人；一般信徒 同义词:layperson, lay people What is the layman to make of this ?是什么外行做的这份报告？
vt. 学习；得知；认识到 vi. 学习；获悉 同义词:to study, linken, to study His son learns fast and well.他的儿子学得又快又好。
n. 租约；租期；租赁物；租赁权 vt. 出租；租得 vi. 出租 同义词:tenancy agreement, rental agreement, rent, hire out, rent, hire out He leased his shop to a friend.他把商店租给了一个朋友。
n. 壁架；突出之部份；暗礁；矿层 同义词:covers, rock Suddenly he struck his toe on a rocky ledge and fell .突然他的脚趾绊在一块突出的岩石上，摔倒了。
n. 遗赠，遗产 同义词:heritage, inheritance Both banks still have lots of legacy assets , many of them tucked in the banking book .两家银行仍然有许多遗留的资产，许多是记录在银行业账簿上的。
n. 豆类；豆科植物；豆荚 同义词:leguminous plant, peapod Legume Legumes are especially good at this .豆类在这方面特别擅长。
vt. 使延长；加长 vi. 延长；变长 同义词:elongate, get long Open-air exercise undoubtedly have lengthened the old man's life.户外运动无疑延长了老人的寿命。
n. [园艺] 生菜；莴苣；（美）纸币 同义词:William, banknote John : It's because I saw one on daddy 's lettuce , but now it 's gone .约翰：因为我看到爸爸的生菜里有一只，不过现在没了。
adj. 有责任的，有义务的；应受罚的；有…倾向的；易…的 同义词:responsible, bound, accountable, prone I only want to know if you have anything liable for tax .我只是想知道你们有什么要上税的东西。
n. 光，光亮；灯 adj. 轻的；光亮的；容易的 vi. 点着；变亮；著火 vt. 照亮；点燃；着火 adv. 轻地 同义词:lamp, lucency, easy, shining, brighten, lamp, lumine Mother lit the gas and began to cook the dinner.妈妈点上煤气，开始做饭。
n. [岩] 石灰岩 The limestone absorbs impurities from the ore .石灰石从矿石中吸收杂质。
vi. 徘徊；苟延残喘；磨蹭 vt. 消磨；缓慢度过 同义词:hang about, wander about, spend, while away The girl lingered by the lake until it was dark.女孩在湖畔一直徘徊到天黑。
n. 垃圾；轿，担架；一窝（动物的幼崽）；凌乱 vt. 乱丢；给…垫褥草；把…弄得乱七八糟 vi. 产仔；乱扔废弃物 同义词:refuse, garbage, junk, rubbish, trash, give birth The students littered their classroom.学生们在教室乱扔东西。
n. 生计，生活；营生 同义词:life, existence, living, keep Still , there is much work left for us to do in addressing economic and livelihood issues .在我们面前，仍然有很多经济民生议题需要我们齐心解决。

adj. 活的；现存的；活跃的；逼真的 n. 生活；生存；生计 v. 生活；居住（live的ing形式）；度过 同义词:realistic, existing, active, excited, going, life, existence, livelihood, keep, subsistence, spending, dwelling She outlived her son by many years.她比她儿子还多活了好几年。
vt. 移动；行动 同义词:put, to shift Even so , Ichthyostega probably locomote like a standard -issue land vertebrate .虽然如此，鱼石螈的运动方式可能与标准陆生脊椎动物不同。
n. 运动；移动；旅行 同义词:movement, removal, exercise, sport, campaign Proconsul gives us a good idea of the anatomy and locomotion of an early ape .祖猿让我们对早期猿类的解剖结构与移动模式，有比较完整的了解。
adj. 火车头的；运动的；移动的 n. 机车；火车头 同义词:moving, sport, athletic, kinetic, engine, haulage motor A locomotive pounded dong the railway track .一辆机车沿铁道隆隆地前行。
vi. 伐木 vt. 切；伐木；航行 n. 记录；航行日志；园木 同义词:lumber, incise, page, register He logged the timber into 3 foot lengths.他将木材锯成3英尺的段木。
adj. （飞机、火箭等）远程的；长期的；远大的 同义词:chronic, long time, standing, extended Instead Mr Kim is building a new long-range missile testing pad .相反，金先生正在建立一个新的远程导弹试验台。
n. 织布机；若隐若现的景象 vi. 可怕地出现；朦胧地出现；隐约可见 vt. 在织布机上织 同义词:weaving machine A flagpole loomed up through the mist.在薄雾中隐隐可见一根旗杆。

n. 知识；学问；全部传说；（动物的）眼光知识 同义词:information, knowledge of, learning, cognition, study The other more ancient lore which I acquired that term will be with me in one shape or another to my last hour .那学期中获得的另一些古代的学问，则将以这样或那样的形式陪伴我到生命的最后一刻。
vi. 伐木；喧闹地向前走；笨重地行动，缓慢地移动 vt. 砍伐木材；乱堆 n. 木材；废物，无用的杂物；隆隆声 同义词:log, wood, waste, timber, refuse, garbage The valley was lumbered hard 2 years ago.这个山谷两年前被大肆采伐过。
n. [光][天] 光度；光明；光辉 同义词:flame, magnitude Astronomers tacitly assume that stars of the same luminosity and color all have the same mass .天文学家心照不宣地默认，光度和颜色都相同的恒星具有相同的质量。
adj. 发光的；明亮的；清楚的 同义词:distinct, bright, liquid, clear, explicit The fire of pain traces for my soul a luminous path across her sorrow.痛苦的火通过她的忧郁替我心灵探索到一条光明的路。
n. 诱惑；饵；诱惑物 vt. 诱惑；引诱 同义词:temptation, gentle, induce, tempt The price lured many buyers.这个价格吸引了许多买家。
adj. 抒情的；吟唱的 n. 抒情诗；歌词 The film has a long- breathed lyric pace .本片有著深长悠远，如歌的步调。
n. [化学] 镁 Even a small amount of magnesium ribbon burns in a flame with a satisfying white heat .即使少量镁条燃烧的火焰就足以释放出令人悦目的白热。
vt. 放大；赞美；夸大 vi. 放大；有放大能力 同义词:praise, celebrate, bless, enlarge, zoom up The microscope magnified the object two hundred times.这架显微镜把实物放大了200倍。
n. 大小；量级；[地震] 震级；重要；光度 同义词:dimensions, moment, size, importance For an explanation see Magnitude .相关解释请参见震级。

adj. 黄色的，玉米色的 n. 玉米；黄色，玉米色 同义词:yellow, xanthic, yellow, zea mays This year the government set an official target of 95 per cent self-sufficiency in wheat , rice , maize and tubers .今年，中国政府制定了小麦、大米、玉米和马铃薯95%实现自给自足的官方目标。

adj. 庄严的；宏伟的 同义词:grand, magnificent, solemn, sacred, noble With the night , St . Peter 's stood out in darkness , stood out in majestic profile against the splendour of heaven .接着夜晚来临，圣彼得教堂耸立在黑暗中，以雄伟的轮廓陪衬天国的光辉。
n. 多数；成年 同义词:plurality, multitude The majority of his colleagues wished to utilize " our time " to rearm as rapidly as possible.他的多数同僚希望利用这个“我们的时代”来尽快地重新武装起来。

n. 化妆品；组成；补充；补考 同义词:recruitment, renewal A skinny girl with mashed hair on one side of her head and no makeup smiled back at me . I could feel my sticky morning breath .镜中的女孩瘦瘦的，乱乱的头发倒在一边，没化妆，微笑地望着我。早上起床后，嘴里的气味也不大好闻。
n. 顺从；可锻性；展延性 同义词:compliance, deference Crisis creates malleability , a moment of opportunity to introduce new ideas , to bring changes in the global system .危机创造可塑性，以及一个机会来引进新观念并给全球体系带来变化。
adj. 可锻的；可塑的；有延展性的；易适应的 同义词:plastic, mouldable Every time we recall a long-term memory , it becomes malleable .每次我们想起一个长期的记忆，它会变得有延展性。
n. 棒，槌棒；木槌；球棍 同义词:rod, bar, staff A small mallet used by auctioneers .一种小型的或年幼的隼。
n. [脊椎] 哺乳动物 同义词:suckler This suite of hormonal changes is what stress is about for the typical mammal .对一般哺乳动物来说，这一套激素的变化也就等同于压力；

n. 长毛象；猛犸象；庞然大物 adj. 巨大的，庞大的；猛犸似的 同义词:monolith, leviathan, huge, enormous, tremendous, massive, macro The most impressive find is the nearly complete skeleton of a huge Columbian mammoth .最震撼的发现是几乎完整的一具大型哥伦比亚猛犸的骨架。

n. [军] 机动；演习；策略；调遣 vi. [军] 机动；演习；调遣；用计谋 vt. [军] 机动；演习；用计；调遣 同义词:strategy, device, exercises, dry run, boss, dry run Objective: To discuss the nursing maneuver of hemodialysis without heparin .目的探讨无肝素血液透析的护理策略。
n. 狂热；狂躁；热衷 同义词:abandon, fanaticism Like most bubbles , the tech mania was rational and foolish at the same time.就象大多数泡沫那样，科技业的疯狂同时展现了理智与愚蠢。

n. 表现；显示；示威运动 同义词:exhibition, representation, display, show His thesis was that life is a process -- a behavior that is not bound to a specific material manifestation .他的论点在于，生命是一个进程——是不受特殊材料表现形式限制的行为。
vt. 操纵；操作；巧妙地处理；篡改 同义词:man, guide, work, handle Do you know how to manipulate a computer ?你知道怎样操作计算机吗?
n. 大厦；宅邸 同义词:palace, edifice He wants to live honourably in Pakistan , in a mansion he is building outside Islamabad .穆沙拉夫希望体面的留在巴基斯坦，住在他建在伊斯兰堡城外的公馆。
n. 地幔；斗篷；覆盖物 vi. 覆盖；脸红 vt. 覆盖 同义词:covering, pella, cover with, write over, invest, house, sheet, roof, cap Snow mantled the hill.雪覆盖了山丘。
adj. 手工的；体力的 n. 手册，指南 同义词:handmade, mechanic, guide, handbook, notebook They look at the computer manual .他们查看电脑说明书。
n. 边缘；利润，余裕；页边的空白 vt. 加边于；加旁注于 同义词:profit, gain, brink, suburb They said they had margined up.他们说他们已付保证金了。
adj. 船舶的；海生的；海产的；航海的，海运的 n. 海运业；舰队；水兵；（海军）士兵或军官 同义词:nautical, sea-born, shipping industry, bluejacket European scientists are trying to find ways of farming more marine fish .欧洲科学家正在尝试找到养殖更多的海洋鱼群的方法。
adj. 海的；海事的；沿海的；海员的 同义词:coastal, thalassic The Argentines had no warning of our readiness to take military action outside the maritime exclusion zone .阿根廷人事先没有得到警告，不知道我们准备在海上封锁区以外采取军事行动。
adv. 明显地；显著地；引人注目地 同义词:obviously, clearly, broadly, remarkably, dramatically But the manner of the two victories was markedly different .但是这两种胜利的方式是明显不同的。
n. 髓，骨髓；精华；活力 同义词:essence, energy, vitality, elite, flower They do know that once the marrow cell undergoes a " leukemic " change , it multiplies into many cells .他们只知道一旦骨髓细胞发生了“白血病性”的变化，就分裂为很多细胞。
n. 面具；口罩；掩饰 vi. 掩饰；戴面具；化装 vt. 掩饰；戴面具；使模糊 同义词:blind, face-piece, dissimulate, make sb up, belie, disguise The bank robbers masked their faces.抢劫银行的强盗脸上戴着面具。
n. 石工；石工行业；石造建筑 同义词:stoneworker The fall of masonry crushed the old man in the old house .炉墙倒坍将那老人压倒在旧房屋里。
adj. 大量的；巨大的，厚重的；魁伟的 同义词:huge, extensive, macro, substantial, tremendous, enormous It is a massive issue .这是一个巨大的问题。
n. 杰作；绝无仅有的人 同义词:chef-d'oeuvre, magnum opus The artistic zealot devoted his life to the completion of a great masterpiece .这位艺术热心者奉献他一生来完成一幅伟大的作品。

n. 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物 vt. 使配对；使一致；结伴 vi. 交配；成配偶；紧密配合 同义词:friend, assistant, brother, aid, fellow, accord, unify, copulate, close fit This result raises the problem , though , of what happens to the parasite when infected females fail to find a mate .不过这个结论引起了问题：要是感染的雌性无法找到伴侣，那麽寄生菌的命运会怎样？
adj. 贫乏的；瘦的 n. 兆 同义词:poor, thin, spare, lean By this meager , solo loop , the whole caboodle is regulated .通过这样一个不完备的单独回路，就理顺了整个过程。
n. 措施；层组（measure的复数） v. 测量（measure的单三形式） to measure the cliff测量悬崖的高度
adj. 机械的；力学的；呆板的；无意识的；手工操作的 同义词:wooden, automatic, dead A soul has to be found in a mechanical act , the soulless labor of operating a camera.我们必须在机械的行为和没有灵魂的照相机操作过程中找到灵魂。
n. 机制；原理，途径；进程；机械装置；技巧 同义词:theory, element, technique, skill, machinery Think of the mechanism as a lock .把这个机理想像为一把锁。
adj. 中间的，中等的；半生熟的 n. 方法；媒体；媒介；中间物 同义词:mid, intermediary, middle, secondary, moderate, method, approach, way, system, how A medium coffee of the day , please .请给我一杯中杯的本日咖啡。
n. 情节剧；音乐剧；耸人听闻的事件，闹剧 同义词:actioner, farce Melodrama is perhaps one fault of the film ; an oddly sanitised picture of daily life is another .拍成情节剧或许是影片的一个缺点，日常生活中出人意料的整洁是另一个缺点。
n. 纪念碑，纪念馆；纪念仪式；纪念物 adj. 记忆的；纪念的，追悼的 同义词:monument, cenotaph, recordative, mnemonic In front of the memorial .在纪念碑的前面。

adj. 商业的；商人的；重商主义的 n. 商品 同义词:commercial, shoppy, goods, wares, merchantable product First came the Chicago Mercantile Exchange ( CME ), whose share price has rocketed since it went public in 2002 .在美国，先是芝加哥商业交易所（期货市场CME），其股票价格从2002年上市后就飞速上升。
n. 商品；货物 vt. 买卖；推销 vi. 经商 同义词:goods, cargo, promote, sell, handle, trade in, do business However, world merchandise trade was still twice that of world economic growth (GDP).世界商品贸易依然是全球经济增长的二倍。
adj. 变化的；新陈代谢的 同义词:changed, sliding, varying, variational Metabolic syndrome , as its name suggests , seems to be related to the way cells process fats and sugars .新陈代谢综合症，就如其名称所言，似乎与细胞加工脂肪和糖分的方式有关。
n. 陨星；流星 同义词:Shooting stars, falling star First , let us consider whether microorganisms could live through the ejection process from the meteorite 's parent body .首先，让我们试想：从陨石母体喷发的过程中，微生物能否生存？
n. 气象学者 What is the life like as a meteorologist ?一个气象学家的生活是什么样子呢？
adj. 一丝不苟的；小心翼翼的；拘泥小节的 同义词:punctilious, wary of Both were in perfect condition under meticulous care by a large team of experts from China and Taiwan .经过中国大陆和台湾众多专家的精心照料，两只大熊猫状态极佳。

adj. 大都市的；大主教辖区的；宗主国的 n. 大城市人；大主教；宗主国的公民 同义词:suzerain, archbishop The events of 9/11 were commemorated from coast to coast , from religions services metropolitan cathedrals to makeshift memorials in small towns .从东海岸到西海岸，从大城市教堂的宗教活动到小镇的临时纪念仪式，人们都在纪念9/11事件。
n. [微] 微生物；微小动植物 同义词:organism, animalcule The endophytic mycelium is a new microorganism resource with the potential pharmaceutical value .植物内生菌是一种新的微生物资源，具有潜在的药用价值。
n. 显微镜 Much greater magnification can be obtained with the electron microscope .用电子显微镜能获得大得多的放大倍数。
adj. 微观的；用显微镜可见的 My taste buds look something like microscopic rose buds .我的味蕾在显微镜下有点象玫瑰花蕾。
n. 微波 同义词:wavelet Never microwave egg in the shell.勿将带壳的鸡蛋放入微波炉内加热。
vi. 移动；随季节而移居；移往 vt. 使移居；使移植 同义词:to move, to shift, transplant Wealthy people often migrate in winter to warmer sunnier countries.有钱人冬天常移居到天气较暖和的、阳光更充足的国家。
n. 迁移；移民；移动 同义词:removal, move, shift, motion, transplantation We call this the vertical migration .我们叫他们垂直迁徙。
n. 里程碑，划时代的事件 同义词:landmark, milliarium to milestone the road towards the next city用里程碑在路边标出通向下一个城市
n. 千年期（millennium的复数）；一千年；千年庆典；太平盛世 millennia , history has told us the story .两千年来，历史告诉我们这样一个故事。
n. 哑剧；小丑；滑稽戏 vi. 摸拟表演 vt. 摸拟表演 同义词:dumb show, panto The actor was miming the movements of a bird.这个演员模拟表演鸟的动作。
adj. 模仿的；拟态的；类似的 同义词:simulate, parallel mimetic dance ; the mimetic presentation of images .摹拟般舞动；对图像的摹拟表现。
v. 混合；交际；联合（mingle的ing形式） adj. 混合的 同义词:mixing, compounding, mixed, hybrid, compound, blending She looked at him, love and disgust mingled on her face.她望着他，脸上露出爱与恨交织的表情。
adj. 微型的，小规模的 n. 缩图；微型画；微型图画绘画术 vt. 是…的缩影 同义词:petty, small-scale, contracted drawing, microcosm This plane model miniatures the airplane.这个飞机模型是飞机的缩影。
vt. 使减到最少；小看，极度轻视 vi. 最小化 We had about ten hours' warning, so we were able to minimize the effects of the flood.由于在十小时前发出了警报，我们能够把水灾的破坏减至最低程度。

n. 小写字；草写小字 adj. 极小的；用草写小字写的 同义词:itty-bitty, teeny Research and development ( R ) in services was minuscule —one- quarter the level of America , as a share of total R .因为日本人你服务行业的研发微不足道啊，按总研发费用百分比计算，是美国的四分之一。
n. 分，分钟；片刻，一会儿；备忘录，笔记；会议记录 vt. 将…记录下来 adj. 微小的，详细的 同义词:cent, moments, note, while, penny, tiny, strict, micro, detailed, particular I want my disagreement to be minuted,我要求把我的不同意见记录下来。
adj. 不可思议的，奇迹的 同义词:magic, mysterious, fantastic Interest , allowing the transfer of value through time , miraculous .允许价值随时间转移的利率堪称奇迹。
n. 移动性；机动性；[电子] 迁移率 同义词:maneuverability, manoeuvrability Traditionally , the middle class has supported meritocracy and upward mobility , more than the elite has done.传统上，中产阶级比精英分子更支持精英管理和个人向上流动。

vt. 嘲弄；模仿；使…失望；使…无效 vi. 嘲弄，嘲笑 n. 嘲弄；仿制品；嘲笑对象 adj. 模拟的；假装的；伪造的 adv. 虚伪地 同义词:guy, simulate, pattern, imitate, make game of, jeer at, derisiveness, imitation, affected, false, assumed, simulate, lyingly, falsely She mocked him as a country boy.她嘲笑他是个乡下孩子。
adj. 稳健的，温和的；适度的，中等的；有节制的 vi. 变缓和，变弱 vt. 节制；减轻 同义词:pacific, medium, secondary, soft, middle, weaken, deny oneself, allay She should moderate her language when children are present.在孩子面前，她说话应该节制。
vt. 修改，修饰；更改 vi. 修改 同义词:alter, dizen, alter, touch up The industrial revolution modified the whole structure of English society.工业革命改变了英国社会的整体结构。
n. 水分；湿度；潮湿；降雨量 同义词:rainfall, humidity content They sense soil moisture in the immediate vicinity of the cup.他们能对直接接近林子的土壤水分作出感应。
adj. [化学] 分子的；由分子组成的 In line with this idea , molecular hydrogen was not found in complex C .与此观念相较，复合体C内并未发现氢分子的踪影。
n. [化学] 分子；微小颗粒，微粒 同义词:numerator of a fraction, microne How does he explain their almost magical convergence in a single elongated molecule of carbon ?他该如何解释这些功能神奇地集中在一条拉长的碳分子管中？
adj. 熔化的；铸造的；炽热的 v. 换毛；脱毛（molt的过去分词） 同义词:fusional, fused Unless, of course , it happens to explode and molten lava all over your campsite !当然，如果他不是它会突然爆炸并喷出熔岩把你野营地吞没的话。
adj. 单色的 同义词:unicolor, homochromous The resolution of white light into its separate monochromatic components is called dispersion .这种白光分解为各单色成分的现象叫做色散。
vt. 垄断；独占；拥有…的专卖权 同义词:corner, forestall The company eventually monopolized the entire cigarette industry.这家公司最后垄断了整个香烟行业。
n. 纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽的作品 vt. 为…树碑 同义词:memorial, cenotaph monument helps all of us remember George Washington , the first President of the United States .这座纪念碑使我们所有人都怀念美国的第一位总统乔治·华盛顿。
n. 士气，斗志 同义词:fight, martialism Finally , believe in what you are saying to boost your morale .最后，通过深信你所说的来增加斗志。

n. 形态学，形态论；[语] 词法，[语] 词态学 同义词:modalism, accidence Morphology is the brach of grammar that studies the internal structure of words , and the rules by which the words are formed.（形态学研究单词的内部结构及其构成的规则。）有关里面的词素前面介绍过了。
adv. 最；非常，极其；最多；几乎 adj. 大部分的，多数的；最多的 n. 大部分，大多数 同义词:extremely, badly, highly, greatly, almost, nearly, too, large, maximum, bulk, masses of most popular color this summer is pink .今年夏天最流行的颜色是粉红色。
n. 主题；动机；主旨；图形；意念 同义词:topic, theme, subject, substance, incentive The motif of the picture is about peace .这幅画的主题是和平。
n. 动机；积极性；推动 同义词:incentive, reason, boost What is your motivation ?你的动力是什么？
vt. 弄脏；用泥涂 vi. 钻入泥中 n. 泥；诽谤的话；无价值的东西 同义词:soil, spot, dirty, muld, vanity She mudded herself when running in the rain.她在雨中奔跑时溅了自己一身泥。
adj. 多层面的 Of late , the company has exhibited a multifaceted obsession with online geo location .最近，该公司已表现出多方面的迷恋网上地理位置。
adj. 多重的；多样的；许多的 n. 倍数；[电] 并联 同义词:numerous, many, hundred, time, paralleling With multiple animals , that 's a very large effect . It cuts the risk almost in half .如果动物种类多，那么效果会很明显，几乎会降低将近一半的风险。
vt. 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘 vi. 乘；繁殖；增加 adv. 多样地；复合地 adj. 多层的；多样的 同义词:ride, breed, improve, accelerate, gain, diversiform, variant to multiply 9 by 4 .以4乘9。
adj. 多层的；有多层楼的 During the period , I was engaged in surveying , road design , site supervision , and structural design for multistory buildings .在此期间，我进行了勘测、道路设计、工地监督和多层建筑物的结构设计。
n. 群众；多数 同义词:majority, mass But ratings can cover multitude of sins .但是投资等级也能涵盖众多过失。
adj. 世俗的，平凡的；世界的，宇宙的 同义词:ordinary, lay, universal, international, stock Increasing the grid 's IQ would bring more mundane benefits , too.提高电网的“智商”也会带来更多的现实利益。

adj. 市政的，市的；地方自治的 同义词:civic, communalistic It is an advanced technique of municipal wastewater , organic industry wastewater treatment and phosphorus removal in wastewater .这是一种城市污水处理、有机工业废水处理和污水除磷的先进技术。
adj. 肌肉的；肌肉发达的；强健的 同义词:robust, intramuscular This is an entirely sufficient energy source for such intermittent muscular tasks as walking or running .对于像走路或跑步这样断断续续的有关肌肉的活动这是完全充足的能量来源。

adj. 无数的；种种的 n. 无数，极大数量；无数的人或物 同义词:thousand, countless, million, infinite, innumerable, million, innumerability With luck , it will also replace the myriad other duties and surcharges that pluck the fruits of Indian commerce .如果运气好的话，它还将替换其他抢夺印度商业果实的众多关税和附加费。
adj. 神秘的；不可思议的；难解的 同义词:magic, fantastic Birds are even more mysterious , because here we do not even see an outer ear .鸟类甚至更为神秘，因为我们甚至看不到它们有一个外耳。
n. 神话；虚构的人，虚构的事 同义词:fairy story, fairy tales But he also was a control freak and an artist who built his own myth .但同时透纳也是一个控制欲极强的艺术家，喜欢自己创造自己的神话。
n. 神话；神话学；神话集 同义词:fairy story, fairy tales History , Poetry , Mythology !历史、诗歌、神话！

adj. 麻醉的；有麻醉作用的；催眠的 n. [药] 麻醉药；镇静剂；起麻醉作用的事物 同义词:anesthetic, anaesthetic, drug, banque A narcotic alkaloid , C18H21NO4 , related to codeine , used as an analgesic and a sedative chiefly in the form of its hydrochloride salt .欧克西克锭一种麻醉性的生物碱，C18H21NO4，和可待因有关的，用作止育药和镇静药，主要以其盐酸化物盐的形式存在。
n. 叙述者；解说员 同义词:relater, commentator He listens and waits for narrator to explain more .他听着，等待讲的人进一步解释。
adj. 本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的 n. 本地人；土产；当地居民 同义词:crude, inherent, indigen, local product He told his family and friends he would study and paint Native Americans .他告诉家人和朋友自己将研究和绘画美洲土著人。
adj. 灵巧的；整洁的；优雅的；齐整的；未搀水的；平滑的 同义词:elegant, flowing, graceful That may be too neat an explanation .那样的解释可能过于理想化。
adj. 贫困的；贫穷的；生活艰苦的 同义词:poor, indigent Needy and handicapped people depend on government relief for their support .穷人和残疾人依靠政府的救济维持生计。
adj. 新古典主义的 Neoclassical style : classical furniture designers and innovative ideas have emerged in the process of change.新古典风格：在古典家具设计师求新求变的过程中应运而生。
n. 霓虹灯；氖（10号元素，符号Ne） She glanced up at the bar . Rows of bottles gleamed dully in the darkened room , reflecting the outside neon .她瞥闪在酒吧上面。排的瓶子在被弄暗的房间中钝地闪烁，反映外面的氖。
n. 神经；勇气；[植] 叶脉 vt. 鼓起勇气 同义词:courage, heart, take courage, get up the courage She was finally nerved to tell him that she was already a wife.她终于鼓起勇气告诉他，她已经为人之妻了。
n. [解剖] 神经元，神经单位 同义词:nerve fiber Phillips has one candidate cell in mind : the motor neuron , which directs muscles from the brain and spinal cord .菲力普斯心目中有个理想目标，就是运动神经元，它也是脑与脊髓控制肌肉的媒介。
n. [核] 中子 Perhaps nuclear reactions , such as neutron capture ?也许是某种核反应，例如，中子捕获？
n. 壁龛；合适的职业 vt. 放入壁龛 同义词:habitacle, alcove to niche a small vase把一只小巧的花瓶放在壁龛中
n. 镍；镍币；五分镍币 vt. 镀镍于 同义词:Ni, medio The same seems to be happening with aluminium , lead and nickel .相同的现象估计也会发生在铝、铅和镍的身上。
n. 不顺从一般公认信念习惯的人；不属于圣公会的英国基督教徒 adj. 不墨守成规的；不顺从一般公认信念习惯的；不信奉国教的 Oscar Wilde was a noted nonconformist .奥斯卡。王尔德是一位著名的非国教徒。
adj. 不符合传统的，非传统的 同义词:unconventional, unorthodoxy Diarrhea cases were widely dispersed and detected by using nontraditional surveillance techniques .腹泻疾病大肆传播，且只能通过非传统的监测技术侦查到。
n. 乡愁；怀旧之情；怀乡病 同义词:homesickness Awash in nostalgia Such charms help canals to survive .充斥的怀旧魅力促使运河得以幸存至今。
adv. 不（用于否定句） 同义词:no, non, n't Some are stupid and not be .另一些则是愚蠢的，不该鼓励。
n. 刻痕，凹口；等级；峡谷 vt. 赢得；用刻痕计算；在…上刻凹痕 同义词:degree, classification, score, grade, rate, win, purchase to notch a lock into the door把锁嵌入门板
n. 笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子 vt. 注意；记录；注解 同义词:bill, minute, William, watching, register, take care of to note a case对一桩案子做笔录
adv. 众所周知地；声名狼藉地；恶名昭彰地 同义词:arrantly But the database is notoriously flawed .但是该数据库故障重重。
adj. 有害的；有毒的；败坏道德的；讨厌的 同义词:harmful, toxic, evil, poisonous, rank There 'll be screaming kids everywhere , not to mention all that noxious barbecue smoke .那儿到处都是孩子们的尖叫声，更不用提那些有害的烤肉浓烟了。
n. 目标；物体；客体；宾语 vt. 提出…作为反对的理由 vi. 反对；拒绝 同义词:target, goal, end, cause, aim, refuse, sit down on I will not wear this dress if you object to it.如果你不喜欢这件衣服，那我就不再穿它了。
adj. 模糊的；晦涩的；昏暗的 vt. 遮掩；使变暗；使难理解 同义词:fuzzy, dark, vague, lowering, overcurtain, becloud The moon was obscured by clouds.月亮被云朵遮掩了。
adj. 着迷的；无法摆脱的 v. 着迷（obsess的过去式）；纠缠 同义词:crazy, mad, implicated They were obsessed by her song.他们都被她的歌声迷住了。
n. 障碍，干扰；妨害物 同义词:interference, let, bar, disturbance, dam Another obstacle is inertia .另一个阻碍是惰性。

n. 发生；出现；事件；发现 同义词:emergence, going on, event, discovery, appearance, circumstance, scene The question of virus occurrence and survival in sediments was addressed only after improved detection methods were at hand.淤泥中病毒发生和存活的问题只有在改进了检测方法以后，才能够得以了解。
prep. 关于；属于；…的；由…组成的 同义词:concerning, about, as for, with reference to, in relation to the king of England英格兰国王
adj. 离岸的；[海洋] 近海的；吹向海面的 adv. 向海面，向海 同义词:paralic, seaward Production costs in Iraq are low , particularly compared to the more complex offshore developments .伊拉克的生产成本很低，特别是与更为复杂的海上开发相比。
n. 后代，子孙；产物 同义词:child, creation, fruit, seed The program generated offspring of a current form , each with slight differences .程序生成一个现有形态的后代，每一代都略有不同。
adj. 嗅觉的；味道的 n. 嗅觉器官 同义词:osphradium Exposure may produce olfactory fatigue or habituation .接触可以引起嗅觉疲劳或成瘾。
n. 开始，着手；发作；攻击，进攻 同义词:beginning, threshold, opening, conception, fresh At its onset , the turmoil in financial markets was described as a liquidity crisis .开始的时候，在金融市场的混乱被描绘成一种清偿危机。
n. 猛攻；突击 同义词:lay on, skite This onslaught has prompted some soul- searching .此枚炸弹激起了不少深思。
adj. 不透明的；不传热的；迟钝的 n. 不透明物 vt. 使不透明；使不反光 同义词:slow, non-transparent, devitrify Most importantly the corporate governance structure opaque .最重要的是，公司治理结构不透明。

adj. 光学的；眼睛的，视觉的 同义词:visual, ocular But at each end of the fibre , optical signals must be converted to and from the electrical signals that computers use to process information .但在纤维的各端，必须将光信号转换成电信号或者将电信号转换成光信号，计算机用电信号处理信息。
adj. 最佳的；最理想的 同义词:first-rank Maybe there is an optimal intensity of competition .也许存在竞争的一个最优密集度。
adj. 最适宜的 n. 最佳效果；最适宜条件 You must try to find your own . Every day you study , bear this principle of the optimum in mind .你应尽力去发现你自己的最佳点，每天学习时要把这个最适度的原则记在心上。
n. 兰花；[植] 兰科植物；淡紫色 adj. 淡紫色的 同义词:cymbidium, Arethusa, violescent, lavender North American orchid having a solitary leaf and flowers with threadlike petals .北美洲的一种兰花，叶单生，花具有丝状反析花瓣。
n. 矿；矿石 同义词:mine The limestone absorbs impurities from the ore .石灰石从矿石中吸收杂质。
adv. 有机地；有组织地；器官上地 同义词:systematically They also say some of the food tested may have been sold as organic although it was not organically grown .当然，他们还认为，有些被检测的食品是作为有机食品出售的，其实它们根本就不是有机生长的。
n. 有机体；生物体；微生物 同义词:living being, biosome My boss is a single-celled organism .我的老板是一位单细胞生物。
n. 方向；定向；适应；情况介绍；向东方 同义词:aspect, way, quarter, guiding, adaptation In their new orientation , these patterns will still have the supersaturated vibrancy of father power .按新的方向时，它们依然是具有超强渗透力的“父亲力量”活性。
n. 创意；独创性，创造力；原始；新奇 同义词:creativity, novelty The victim originality , no wit.受害者不善应付，也没有风趣。
vt. 引起；创作 vi. 发源；发生；起航 同义词:attract, produce, cause, occasion, operate, happen, occur, proceed The film originated from a novel.这部电影源自一部小说。
adj. 装饰的，装饰性的 n. 观赏植物；装饰品 同义词:decorative, illuminative, decoration, trimming European elm with lustrous smooth leaves ornamental .欧洲榆，有光亮、平滑的叶片，用作观赏植物。
n. 装饰物 同义词:widget, adorning The text, as of a book , distinct from illustrations or other ornamentation .一本书前面简短的介绍性的短文。
n. 盎司；少量；雪豹 同义词:bit, tad List the price ounce instead of price per unit .将价格单位列为每盎司而不是单元单位。

n. （战争的）爆发；（疾病的）发作 vi. 爆发 同义词:explosion, burst, fit, burst, blow up One is food security , another is climate change and the third is the threat of a worldwide outbreak of influenza .其中之一是食品安全另一个是气候变化第三个是全世界范围流感爆发的威胁。
n. 出口，排放孔；[电] 电源插座；销路；发泄的方法；批发商店 同义词:exit, market, way out But that discontent has yet to find an outlet .但是这种不满尚未找到一条发泄途径。
n. 输出，输出量；产量；出产 vt. 输出 同义词:export, crop, harvest, yield, export, bulk out Output is falling in Britain , France , Germany and Japan .英国、法国、德国和日本的生产在下降。

adj. 椭圆的；卵形的 n. 椭圆形；卵形 同义词:elliptical, ovate, ellipse, elliptical shape Callout with oval outline and pointer from center of text block . Control handles adjust width and height .从文本块中央引出的具有椭圆轮廓线和指针的标注。控制手柄可调整宽度和高度。
n. 重叠；重复 vi. 部分重叠；部分的同时发生 vt. 与…重叠；与…同时发生 同义词:repeat, segistration Two old trees overlapped their upper branches.那两棵古树的上端分枝相互交搭复生。
adj. 重叠；覆盖 v. 与…重叠；盖过（overlap的ing形式） Two old trees overlapped their upper branches.那两棵古树的上端分枝相互交搭复生。
vt. 超载，超过负荷 n. 超载；负荷过多 同义词:superimposed load, surcharge The electrical system in your house would be overloaded if you used too many electric home appliances at once.如果你同时使用许多家用电器的话，你家里的电力系统就会超载。
vt. 监督；审查；俯瞰；偷看到，无意中看到 同义词:police, survey to oversee prisoners看管犯人
vt. 负担过度（过去式overtaxed，过去分词overtaxed，现在分词overtaxing，第三人称单数overtaxes，名词overtaxation）；[税收] 课税过重；使工作过度 Overtaxed , overworked and paid off with a knife , a club or a rope .人民苛捐杂税，超负荷的工作所得到的报酬就是大刀，棍棒加套索！
vt. 压倒；淹没；受打击 同义词:flood, flow We overwhelmed the enemy by superior forces.我们以优势兵力打垮了敌军。
adv. 压倒性地；不可抵抗地 Again , the evidence overwhelmingly to the contrary .证据再一次不可抗拒地指向反面。
n. 牛（ox的复数） 同义词:cows, neats The farmer yoke the oxen before hitch them to the wagon .农夫在将牛套上大车之前先给它们套上轭。
n. 包装；一群；背包；包裹；一副 vt. 包装；压紧；捆扎；挑选；塞满 vi. 挤；包装货物；被包装；群集 同义词:pair, casing, impact, select, stuff, pile, crowd, host Have you packed all these books?你所存的书都捆好了吗?
adj. （常用来构成复合词）充满…的，塞满了…的 v. 包装（pack的过去分词） 同义词:steeped, fraught We squeezed through the narrow , chattering , jam packed bar to the entrance of the big room.狭窄的酒吧里喧喧嚷嚷，挤得满满的。我们挤过人堆，来到大厅入口处。

adj. 艰苦的；勤勉的；小心的 n. 辛苦；勤勉 同义词:careful, tough, rough, diligent, industry, diligence The leases painstaking stipulations to mitigate any possible environmental harm to species like the polar bear.租权谨慎的包含了处理潜在的对北极熊等物种的环境伤害的约定。
n. 古生物学者 He felt like a paleontologist coming face to face with a living dinosaur .他感觉像是一位古生物学家面对面的来到一只活生生的恐龙面前。

n. 仪表板；嵌板；座谈小组，全体陪审员 vt. 嵌镶板 同义词:fascia board, instrument board The wall was paneled with pine.四周的墙都镶(或贴)上松木板。
n. 裤子；短裤 同义词:britches, short trousers I have on a shirt and pants .我穿了一件衬衫和裤子。
n. 麻痹；无力；停顿 同义词:numbness, asthenia So there is a progressive paralysis .所以这是一种进行性麻痹。
adj. 最重要的，主要的；至高无上的 n. 最高统治者 同义词:primary, main, major, central, great, monarch, imperator At that time my father was head of Paramount Studios .那时，父亲是派拉蒙电影公司的负责人。
n. 释义；改述；演释曲 vt. 改述 vi. 释义；意译 同义词:rephrase, free translation Paraphrase this article in 250 words or less.用不到 250 个字意译出这篇文章。

n. 颗粒；[物] 质点；极小量；小品词 同义词:grain, granule Coconut powder , Milk , Coconut plant particle , Cane sugar , Sea salt , Soya bean .椰子粉，牛奶，椰子植物颗粒，甘蔗糖，海盐，大豆油。
n. 草地；牧场；牧草 vt. 放牧；吃草 同义词:grass, field, lawn, meadow, grass, feed, range The shepherd pastured his sheep on the village common.羊倌在村庄的公地上放羊。

n. 病原体；病菌 同义词:causative agent, harmful bacteria When the pathogen benefits from environmental conditions , disease spread is more likely .当环境条件对病原体有利时，疾病扩散的可能性增加。

n. 赞助人；保护人；主顾 同义词:guardian, backer The word " pattern " is derived from the same root as the word patron .“模式”这个词与保护神这个词来自同一词根。
n. 赞助；光顾；任免权 同义词:sponsorship, auspice He also deeply mistrusts the system of patronage which has proved such a mixed blessing throughout music 's long history .此外他也格外不信任资助的形式，虽然经过长期音乐历史证明，该形式有利有弊。
n. 卵石；水晶透镜 vt. 用卵石铺 同义词:boulder, ratchel Cookies are spread with white sugar pebbling the surface.饼干表面撒满着粒粒白糖。
n. 特性；特质；怪癖；奇特 同义词:quality, tang, identity, specific, character The peculiarity of his request struck him with sudden force.他突然强烈地感觉到他那要求的奇特性。
n. 下垂物，垂饰 同义词:lappet, bulla Also remember that for a gem ring or pendant .此外要记住，就宝石戒指或珠宝首饰而言。
vt. 渗透；穿透；洞察 vi. 渗透；刺入；看透 同义词:filter, permeate, sink, osmose The nail easily penetrated the soft wood.钉子很容易地就穿透了软木材。
adj. 渗透的；尖锐的；有洞察力的 v. 穿透；贯穿（penetrate的ing形式） 同义词:osmolar, saturated, interpenetrating The nail easily penetrated the soft wood.钉子很容易地就穿透了软木材。

n. 半岛 同义词:byland, chersonese Beijing should explicitly sanction the possibility of a reunified peninsula even if that means accepting a strong US ally pressing against its border .对朝鲜半岛可能重新统一，中国应当明确支持，即使这意味着接受边境上出现一个强大的美国盟友。
vt. 察觉，感觉；理解；认知 vi. 感到，感知；认识到 同义词:detect, feel, absorb, see, read, to feel, come to realize The students perceived that his behavior had changed.同学们发觉他的行为有些变化。
n. 知觉；[生理] 感觉；看法；洞察力；获取 同义词:consciousness, viewpoint, sense, feel, insight Her perception of the right seemed almost intuitive .她对正确事物的理解几乎是直觉的。
n. 高位；栖木；杆 vt. 栖息；就位；位于；使坐落于 vi. 栖息；就位；位于 同义词:pole, high-order, inhabit, take post, sit, take post The eagles perched on their eyries.老鹰栖息在他们的巢窝上。
vi. 过滤；渗出；浸透 vt. 使渗出；使过滤 n. 滤过液；渗出液 同义词:filtrate, water logging, exude, transduate, diffusate to make coffee by percolating boiling water through coffee用沸水滤过咖啡的方法煮咖啡
n. [临床] 叩诊；振动；碰撞；敲打乐器；打击乐器组 同义词:vibration, collision, impact, crash A percussion instrument consisting of metal tubes or bars that emit tones when struck .由金属管或条棒组成的，敲击时能发出乐音的打击乐器。
adj. 外围的；次要的 同义词:secondary, supporting, minor This operation clears all the latched data for peripheral conveyor motion .该操作将清除所有关于外围输送机运动的数据。
adj. 易腐坏的；易毁灭的；会枯萎的 n. 容易腐坏的东西 It must be accepted that wood is perishable .众所周知，木材是容易腐朽的。
vt. 渗透，透过；弥漫 vi. 弥漫；透入；散布 同义词:filter, penetrate, smoke, shed Ink permeates the blotting paper.墨水渗透吸水纸。
vt. 使不朽；保持 adj. 长存的 同义词:retain, keep up We must perpetuate the system.我们必须将此制度永久保持。
adj. 复杂的，令人费解的；令人困惑的 同义词:complicated, sophisticated, involved, detailed, intricate His strange behaviour perplexed her greatly.他的奇怪举止使她茫然不解。
vi. 存留，坚持；持续，固执 vt. 坚持说，反复说 同义词:stay, abide, iterate He persisted in denying his knowledge of the matter.他始终否认知道这事。
n. 观点；远景；透视图 adj. 透视的 同义词:viewpoint, outlook, eye, sentiment, standpoint, clairvoyant So from the global perspective , it is very important .所以从全局的角度来看，这是很重要的。
adj. 相关的，相干的；中肯的；切题的 同义词:relevant, relational, correlative As a more pertinent example , consider the mass of the sun .还有个更适当的例子，想想看太阳的质量吧。
n. 害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人 同义词:verm, injurious insect Pest control is one of the major areas of concern in intensive agriculture .病虫害防治是集约型农业所关心的主要方面之一。
n. 花瓣 Now , volunteers are designing a petal ( pedal ) powered green crusher.现在，志愿者正在设计环保的踏板去壳器。

n. 枕头 vt. 垫；枕于…；使…靠在 vi. 枕着头；靠在枕上 同义词:weeping willow The child pillowed his head on his mother's shoulder.这孩子把头枕在母亲的肩上。
vi. 渴望，痛苦；憔悴 n. [林] 松树；凤梨，菠萝 vt. 为…悲哀；哀悼 adj. 松木的；似松的 同义词:rare, aspire, ananas, regret, grieve over Then he scraped away the dirt , and exposed a pine shingle .接着他刨去泥土，下面露出一块松木瓦块。

adj. 关键的；中枢的；枢轴的 n. 关键事物；中心事物 同义词:central, key Love plays a pivotal role in life .爱在生命中起着至关重要的作用。

n. 陈词滥调；平凡；陈腐 同义词:lousy cliches, banality A fellow comes out with some platitude when I am speaking with my whole heart .一个人散布枯燥乏味的陈腔滥调时，而我正全心全力地演说。
adj. 平凡的，陈腐的；陈词滥调的 同义词:ordinary, stock What troubles me most about this is not the workshop or platitudinous questionnaire . It is the DNA bit .我最感到苦恼的还不是研讨班，也不是这种陈腐的问卷调查，而是机构DNA这码事。
adj. 柔韧的；柔软的；圆滑的；易曲折的 同义词:flexible, soft, tender Moreover , though anatomical sex is binary, mental " gender " is more pliable .此外，解剖学的性是两方面的，精神上的性可能更加圆滑。
n. 困境；境况；誓约 vt. 保证；约定 同义词:difficulty, corner, dilemma, fix, predicament, undertake, assure He plighted his word to attempt it.他发誓一试。
n. 铅工业；铅管品制造 v. 探究；垂直悬挂；用铅锤测量；灌铅以增重（plumb的现在分词） Check to see if sewage lines are intact before using bathrooms or plumbing .在使用洗手间或马桶之前，奇怪查看下水道是否完好无损。
adj. 有毒的；恶毒的；讨厌的 同义词:toxic, evil, rank, vicious, venomous Many people believe that poinsettias are poisonous .许多人相信猩猩木是有毒的。
