n. 授花粉器 Flowers are often pollinated by bees.花常常由蜜蜂传授花粉。
n. 污染物 同义词:contamination, fomite In addition , ozone is a pollutant of automobile use .另外，臭氧为机动车辆使用过程中所产生的另一主要污染物。
adj. 流行的，通俗的；受欢迎的；大众的；普及的 同义词:democratic, fashionable, going, welcome, pop Basketball is a popular sport in China .篮球在中国是一项大众运动。
adj. 手提的，便携式的；轻便的 n. 手提式打字机 同义词:luggable, hand-held The problem is that existing apparatus for measuring density tend to be either precise or portable .问题是现有的测量仪器精确的不方便方便的却又不够精确。
vt. 预示；预兆；意味着 同义词:indicate, forecast, shadow, spell, announce Her silence portends trouble.她沉默不语可不是好兆头。
n. 部分；一份；命运 vt. 分配；给…嫁妆 同义词:part, proportion, fate, percent, lot, part, to allocate The conquered territories were portioned out among the victors.被征服的领土在胜利者之间被均分了。
adj. 积极的；[数] 正的，[化学][医] 阳性的；确定的，肯定的；实际的，真实的；绝对的 n. 正数；[摄] 正片 同义词:active, established, practical, actual, fixed, effective, sincere I choose the positive side of life .我选择了指出生活积极的一面。
vt. 控制；使掌握；持有；迷住 同义词:contain, regulate, bit, bottle, manage He decided to give away everything he possessed and become a monk.他决定放弃他所有的一切，出家为僧。
n. 拥有；财产；领地；自制；着迷 同义词:estate, property, treasure, worth The sense of triumph and renewed possession swelled within him .胜利和重新占有的感觉又在他心里涌起了。
adj. 邮政的；邮局的 n. 明信片 同义词:post card Privatisation of the postal service is an even bigger issue , and one where Mr Kamei has lots of form .邮政服务的私有化则是一个更为重大的议题，而龟井在此领域曾有诸多表现。
vt. 填迟……的日期；把……的日期填迟；继……之后 n. 事后日期；推迟日期 to postdate one’s day of birth把生日的日期往后填
adj. 死后的；遗腹的；作者死后出版的 Since then , Handel has enjoyed 250 years of uninterrupted posthumous fame .迄今，韩德尔已然得享了持续250年的身后声誉。

n. 潜能；可能性；[电] 电势 adj. 潜在的；可能的；势的 同义词:possibility, probability, feasibility, maybe, chance, feasible, possible, underlying, latent The greatest potential , however , is tied up in the housing market .然而最大的潜力，是房地产市场的不动用资金。
n. 陶器；陶器厂；陶器制造术 同义词:ware, earthware Plain wire is used to cut away the finished pot from its base on the pottery wheel .素线的作用是当一件陶器完成后用它把陶器从转盘上的基座上切下来。
n. 贫困；困难；缺少；低劣 同义词:difficulty, shortage, hardness, want Every country will have its own poverty museum .各国都将拥有自己的贫困博物馆。
n. 大草原；牧场 同义词:field, steppe Indians hunted the prairie for buffalo .印第安人在大草原狩猎野牛。
adj. 危险的；不确定的 同义词:dangerous, critical, risky, threatening Many of the sources of today 's growth are temporary and precarious .当前的经济增长只是暂时的，而且极不稳定。
vt. 领先，在…之前；优于，高于 vi. 领先，在前面 同义词:take over the lead, keep ahead, take over the lead, keep ahead M precedes N in the alphabet.在字母表上M在N的前面。

n. [化学] 沉淀物 vt. 使沉淀；促成；猛抛；使陷入 vi. [化学] 沉淀；猛地落下；冷凝成为雨或雪等 adj. 突如其来的；猛地落下的；急促的 同义词:deposit, sediment, sludge, immerse, catalyse, deposit, settle, rapid The truck overturned and precipitated us into the ditch.卡车翻了，我们摔进了沟里。

n. [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽 同义词:deposit, sludge, sediment, subsidence The cline is considered the probable result of geographic trends in precipitation , temperature , and perhaps also photoperiod .人们认为这种梯度变异可能是降水量，温度也许还有光周期等地理趋势造成的结果。
n. 先驱，前导 同义词:forerunner, vaunt-courier Crazing is the precursor of brittle fracture .出现小裂纹必然是脆性断裂的前兆。

n. [动] 捕食者；[动] 食肉动物；掠夺者 同义词:carnivore, reiver Laws that bar sex offenders from living in so many places should be repealed , because there is no evidence that they protect anyone predator can always travel.应当废除给性犯罪者居住地设定诸多限制的法律，并没有证据表明这些法律保护了谁，因为性犯罪者可以随意搬迁。
adj. 掠夺的，掠夺成性的；食肉的；捕食生物的 同义词:rapacious, spoliatory They want governors who would have done more to stop predatory subprime lending .他们希望那些本该更尽力的联储董事停止掠夺性次级借贷。
n. 前任，前辈 同义词:father, grand old man The Obama administration has been more vigorous on this front than its predecessor .在这一阵线，奥巴马政府比它的前任者更加积极有活力。
adv. 主要地；显著地 同义词:mainly, basically, largely, mostly, primarily Adamantane and bicyclo ( 222 ) octane predominantly Chlorinated at the bridge heads by this procedure .金刚烷和二环〔222〕辛烷主要是按照这个程序在桥头氯化。
vt. 支配，主宰；在…中占优势 vi. 占主导（或支配）地位；占优势 同义词:rule, hold sway, advantage over, prevail over The views of the left wing have tended to predominate within the party.左翼的观点趋向于在该党党内占支配地位。
adj. 卓越的；超群的 同义词:remarkable, excellent, prominent, ranking Since you are preeminent , I want to invite you to join our society .我们社团正需要你这样的江湖人士，有兴趣加入吗？
adj. 预制构件的 v. 预先建造组合（prefabricate的过去分词） a prefabricated project预先编制的计划
adj. 史前的；陈旧的 同义词:old, ogygian Experts can tell if an ancient Egyptian mummy or a prehistoric human was a boy or a girl just by looking at the skeleton .专家们可以通过观察骨架来区分一个古老的埃及木乃伊或者史前人类是男孩还是女孩。
n. 优势；多数；占优势 同义词:majority, superiority, advantage, edge, dominance A second problem is the preponderance of family -controlled firms .另一个问题是家族企业占多数。
n. 先决条件 adj. 首要必备的 同义词:prior condition, pre-condition A second prerequisite is that uranium 235 must be present in sufficient abundance .第二个必要条件是，铀235的含量必须够充足。
n. 存在；出席；参加；风度；仪态 同义词:existence, being, entity, is This is true even in the presence of water treatment systems , they say .他们还说现在水资源的处理方法更加使其成为真的。
n. 保存，保留 同义词:conservation, hold, retention, reservation The water and soil preservation project was set up in 1989 .其中的水土保护项目是1989年开始启动的。

n. 防腐剂；预防法；防护层 adj. 防腐的；有保存力的；有保护性的 同义词:antiseptic agent, conserving agent, antirot, rotproof Historically , formaldehyde was first used as a biological preservative more than a century ago .历史上，甲醛曾首次作为生物防腐剂在一个多世纪前被应用。
vi. 主持，担任会议主席 vt. 管理 同义词:to chair, run the show, manage, conduct, run, direct, control The Prime Minister presides at meetings of the Cabinet.首相主持内阁会议。
n. 威望，声望；声誉 同义词:reputation, credit But fighting in Afghanistan is not just about prestige .但是在阿富汗作战不仅仅是威望的问题。
n. 自负；要求；主张；借口；骄傲 同义词:requirement, opinion, desire, need, excuse pretensioned concrete预应力(或先张法)混凝土[参较 posttension]
vi. 盛行，流行；战胜，获胜 同义词:obtain, win Justice has prevailed,the guilty man has been punished.正义已经获胜，有罪的人受到了惩罚。

adj. 流行的；一般的，最普通的；占优势的；盛行很广的 v. 盛行，流行（prevail的现在分词形式）；获胜 同义词:popular, general, fashionable, going, common, winning The frothy levels of government indebtedness prevailing in developed countries are certainly not reassuring .发达国家政府普遍存在的高负债水平，当然不会让人放心。
vi. 捕食；掠夺；折磨 n. 捕食；牺牲者；被捕食的动物 同义词:grind down, lie on, victim, predation The villagers were preyed on by bandits from the hills.村民们受到山里强盗的抢劫。

adj. 原始的；主要的；最初的 n. 被压抑童年情绪的释放 vt. 释放（被压抑的童年情绪） 同义词:original, major, central, premier, leading, deliver, free, unhold " The Last of the Mohicans " breathes an atmosphere of almost primal innocence .《最后的莫希干人》则散发着一种近乎原始时代天真无邪的纯洁的气息。
adv. 首先；主要地，根本上 同义词:firstly, basically, mainly, mostly, largely There are also annuals , primarily impatiens , that bloom in the shade .一年生植物也是，凤仙花主要在荫凉处里开花。

n. 大主教；灵长类的动物；首领 adj. 灵长目动物的；首要的 同义词:leader, chief, captain, boss, principal, all-important Treetop delivery rooms are unusual for humans but not for other primate species .在树上生产对人类并不寻常，但是其他的灵长类就稀松平常了。

adj. 主要的；最好的；基本的 adv. 极好地 n. 初期；青年；精华；全盛时期 vt. 使准备好；填装 vi. 作准备 同义词:greatest, major, elementary, central, main, excellently, famously, youth, morning, essence, elite, flower, ready, provide to prime an explosive device使爆炸装置准备起爆
adj. 原始的，远古的；简单的，粗糙的 n. 原始人 同义词:original, simple, crude, plain, rough, Euroman This epic extolled the founder of this primitive tribe .这部史诗歌颂了这个原始部落的创始人。
n. 优先；优先权；[数] 优先次序；优先考虑的事 同义词:precedence, preference to sth The priority is protecting the police and the public from their attacks .当前的第一要务是保护警方和民众免受其伤害。
n. 特权；优待；基本权利 vt. 给与…特权；特免 同义词:franchise, peculiar the privileged class特权阶级
n. 探针；调查 vi. 调查；探测 vt. 探查；用探针探测 同义词:investigation, research, examine, explore, burrow into He probed the swelling anxiously with his finger.他用手指很担心地触摸肿处。
vi. 开始；继续进行；发生；行进 同义词:occur, happen, travel, pursue Work is proceeding slowly.工作正在慢慢地继续进行着。
vt. 处理；加工 n. 过程，进行；方法，步骤；作用；程序；推移 vi. 列队前进 adj. 经过特殊加工（或处理）的 同义词:manufacture, cope with, going on, course, system, method, approach to process leather to make it softer鞣制皮革使其变得柔软
vt. 宣告，公布；声明；表明；赞扬 同义词:indicate, sound, post, state, publish The ringing bells proclaimed the birth of the prince.鸣响的钟声宣布王子诞生了。
n. 倾向；癖性 同义词:tendency, liability, trend, preference, disposition in a proclivity for the uniform, the identical , and the inert ;存在于对千人一面、一致性和惰性的癖好；
n. 刺针；刺棒；签子 vt. 刺，戳；刺激 vi. 刺；捅 同义词:cnidocil, bodkin, stick, stimulate, fan, pink, poke, run through She prodded me sharply in the ribs.她使劲捅了捅我的肋骨。
adj. 惊人的，异常的，奇妙的；巨大的 同义词:tremendous, wonderful, huge, enormous, massive This has helped to fuel China's prodigious growth .这帮助成就了中国巨大的经济增长。
n. 奇迹，奇事；奇才；奇观；预兆 同义词:phenomenon, wonder, miracle, warning Dressed in a ridiculous costume , he was presented at court as a prodigy of six .穿了一套可笑的服装，他被人以六岁神童的称号带到宫廷里去。
vt. 生产；引起；创作 n. 农产品，产品 vi. 生产，创作 同义词:attract, cause, operate, occasion, induce, manufacture, work, agricultural products, turn out, bring in The man produced a ticket from his pocket.那人从衣袋里掏出一张票。
n. 精通，熟练 同义词:proficient in, conversancy In 2004 only one in five teachers passed the English - proficiency test .2004年，只有五分之一的教师通过了英语水平测试。
n. 侧面；轮廓；外形；剖面 同义词:configuration, side, shell, outline The huge trees were profiled against the night sky.在夜空的映衬下显出大树的轮廓。
adv. 禁止地；过高地；过分地 同义词:excessively, exorbitantly Even if refinancing were available for endangered firms , it would prohibitively dear.对于面临倒闭的公司，纵然再融资的方法仍然可行，但其代价却无比昂贵。
n. 增殖，扩散；分芽繁殖 同义词:diffusion, propagation proliferated ideas层出不穷的想法
adj. 多产的；丰富的 同义词:abundant, productive, full, luxurious Abroad , she was the country 's best -known journalist , a prolific author and columnist .而在国外，她是俄罗斯最出名的记者，一个多产的专栏作家。

n. 突出；显著；突出物；卓越 同义词:projection, protrusion This prominence of agriculture and the role women play in it is part of a wider set of changes that occur in the upper levels of the site .在查脱户耶克遗址的上层，可以观察到一组范围广阔的变化，而农业地位上升，以及妇女在农业中扮演的角色，是其中一个元素。

adj. 突出的，显著的；杰出的；卓越的 同义词:obvious, excellent, remarkable, brilliant, marked A few weeks ago a prominent white rancher near the border was killed , possibly by a smuggler or illegal immigrant .几周前，一位著名的白人大农场主在边境附近被杀害，可能是走私者或非法移民所为。
adj. 有希望的，有前途的 v. 许诺，答应（promise的现在分词形式） 同义词:likely, hopeful, undertaking They promised that the work would all be finished by next week.他们保证到下星期完成全部工作。
vt. 促进；提升；推销；发扬 vi. 成为王后或其他大于卒的子 同义词:facilitate, boost, prefer, upgrade, further He worked hard and was soon promoted.他工作努力，很快就获得提升。
adj. 显著的；断然的；讲出来的 v. 发音；宣告；断言（pronounce的过去分词） 同义词:obvious, prominent, marked, noted, outstanding, professed The priest said, “I now pronounce you man and wife.”神父说：“我现在宣布你们两人结为夫妻。”

adj. 适当的；本身的；特有的；正派的 adv. 完全地 同义词:suitable, appropriate, adequate, typical, becoming, totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, strictly, fully Proper weight alone doesn't show whether a diet is lacking in vitamins and minerals .仅仅适当的体重并不能说明饮食中是否缺乏维生素和矿物质。
n. 性质，性能；财产；所有权 同义词:performance, nature, ownership, estate, capability By appreciation , we make excellence in others our own property .欣赏能使别人的卓越成为我们自己的财富。
n. 支持者；建议者；提出认证遗嘱者 同义词:advocate, supporter According to her Web site , she is a proponent of alternative medicine that uses a holistic approach .据她的网站说，她是利用综合疗法以替代药物的支持者。
n. 比例；部分；面积；均衡 vt. 使成比例；使均衡；分摊 同义词:ratio, area, equilibrium, scale, part, apportion to proportion the width of a building to its height使建筑物的宽和高比例匀称
n. 所有权 同义词:ownership, possessory right, proprietary rights, proprietorial right The simplest form of business is called an proprietorship .最简单的企业构成方式是个人独资企业。
n. 推进；推进力 同义词:drive, pulsion But magnetic propulsion has some drawbacks .但是磁力推进有一些缺陷。
n. 前途；预期；景色 vi. 勘探，找矿 vt. 勘探，勘察 同义词:scenery, future, picture, expectation, landscape, reconnoitre, make a survey to prospect a mine勘探矿藏
vi. 繁荣，昌盛；成功 vt. 使……成功；使……昌盛；使……繁荣 同义词:arrive, flower, win, thrive May the gods prosper our city!愿神灵保佑我们的城市繁荣!
n. 繁荣，成功 同义词:success, victory, winning, up, hit The only road to enduring prosperity and stability is through open markets and open trade .通往持久繁荣和稳定的唯一之路是畅开市场和贸易之门”。
adj. 繁荣的；兴旺的 同义词:flourishing, booming The once prosperous area is filled with trash and swage sewage and lacks electricity .这个曾经繁荣的地方充斥着垃圾和污水，而且供电不足。
n. 贸易保护主义者 adj. 贸易保护主义的；保护贸易论的 A more fundamental protectionist threat lies in global imbalances , which are at the root of the crisis .一种更为根本的保护主义威胁在于全球失衡，这正式此次金融危机的根源。
n. 蛋白质；朊 adj. 蛋白质的 同义词:albumose, glaireous The amount and quality of food provided must satisfy energy and protein requirements .供应的食物数量和质量必须能满足能量和蛋白质需求。
n. 原型；标准，模范 同义词:criterion, standard, level, norms, type The company showed the prototype of the new model at the exhibition .公司在展览会上展示了这种新模型的原型。
adj. 突出的；伸出的 v. 突出（protrude的现在分词）；伸出 同义词:prominent, pointed, highlighted, striking, ajut, reaching, jutting He protruded his tongue.他伸出了舌头。
n. 方言；地方风格；乡下习气 同义词:dialect geography, patois But provincialism in educational research is , alas, nothing new.只不过教育研究中的地方主义也实在是屡见不鲜了吧！
adj. 刺激的，挑拨的；气人的 n. 刺激物，挑拨物；兴奋剂 同义词:incentive, stimulating, stimulus, irritation Meantime , the White House is calling the tests a " provocative act ".同时，白宫称这次测验是一次“挑衅行为”。
adj. 谨慎的；精明的；节俭的 同义词:cautious, wary, provident Given the cost of government bail -outs, why chastise the only prudent investment bank ?考虑到救助成本，为何政府要惩戒唯一一家审慎的投行呢？
vt. 撬动，撬开 vi. 刺探，探查 n. 窥探；杠杆 同义词:prize up, jimmy, burrow into, lever, heaver We use an iron bar to pry open the box.我们用铁棍撬开箱子。
vt. 宣传；公布 同义词:post, give publicity to to publicize a new policy宣传一项新政策[英国英语亦作publicise]
n. 普韦布洛（美国科罗拉多州中部一城市）；印第安人村庄 In 2003 , the city of Pueblo , Colorado passed a law making public places and workplaces smoke-free .2003年，科罗拉多州普韦布洛市通过了一项在公共场所和工作场所全面禁烟的法规。
n. 冲压机；打洞器；钻孔机 vt. 开洞；以拳重击 vi. 用拳猛击 同义词:blanking press, drilling machine, jab to punch holes in a sheet of metal在金属板上冲孔
vt. 刺穿；揭穿；削弱 vi. 被刺穿；被戳破 n. 穿刺；刺痕 同义词:break, cut through He was taken to hospital with a punctured lung.他因肺部被刺破而送进医院。
n. 净化；提纯；涤罪 同义词:distillation, decontamination This salt has been purified for use in medicine.供药用的盐已被净化。
n. 金字塔；角锥体 vi. 渐增；上涨；成金字塔状 vt. 使…渐增；使…上涨；使…成金字塔状 同义词:advance, to go up demand continues to pyramid需求量继续增加
adj. 古雅的；奇怪的；离奇有趣的；做得很精巧的 同义词:strange, peculiar On the face of it, life was a mixture of the quaint and the archaic .从表面上看来，生活是离奇有趣的事物和古老事物的混合体。

n. 资格；条件；限制；赋予资格 同义词:membership, limitation, capacity, condition, restriction Far better to add economics to the core curriculum in every school and make it a qualification for any who would dare to embark on the profession of government.更好的方法是把经济学作为每所学校的核心课程来教授，并且对于任何胆敢从政的人来说，这应该作为一个基本的资格。
n. 采石场；猎物；来源 vi. 费力地找 vt. 挖出；努力挖掘 同义词:source, provenience, dig up, scoop out They are quarrying the hillside for marble.他们正从山坡上采大理石。
vt. 熄灭，[机] 淬火；解渴；结束；冷浸 vi. 熄灭；平息 同义词:conclude, go out, die, cool, go out He quenched the fire with water.他用水将火扑灭。
n. 追求；寻找 vi. 追求；寻找 vt. 探索 同义词:pursuit, looking for, pursue / pursuit, go after, explore, search after Our hunting dogs are questing for small wild animals in the woods.我们的猎狗正在树林中搜寻小的野兽。
adj. 静止的；不活动的；沉寂的 同义词:still, resting Those " oligarchs " not in prison or exile are indeed politically quiescent .那些没有身陷囹圄和流亡海外的“寡头”的确在政治上都选择了“沉默是金”。
n. 被子；棉被 vt. 东拼西凑地编；加软衬料后缝制 vi. 缝被子 同义词:bedquilt, comforter His mother quilted a cotton-padded anorak for him.他的母亲给他缝制了一件棉猴儿。
n. [雷达] 雷达，无线电探测器 Until radar technique was used in astronomy , Man 's knowledge of Venus was still very superficial .直到雷达技术应用于天文学以前，人类对金星的了解还极为肤浅。
n. 辐射；发光；放射物 同义词:irradiation, Geigers But , it really can absorb in radiation .但是，它真的能吸收辐射啊。

adj. 激进的；根本的；彻底的 n. 基础；激进分子；[物化] 原子团；[数] 根数 同义词:thorough, organic, fundamental, ultimate, complete, elements, basis, foundation, base, bed Fourth , it is time for radical reform of finance .第四，是时候对金融业进行彻底改革了。
n. 半径，半径范围；[解剖] 桡骨；辐射光线；有效航程 同义词:semidiameter Analysis the reasons and methods of radius compensation in round turning tool .分析了数控车床中圆头车刀刀具半径补偿的原因及方法。
n. 筏；救生艇；（美）大量 vt. 筏运；制成筏 vi. 乘筏 同义词:lots of, wealth, ocean, body, billion They rafted their neighbours across the river.他们用筏子将邻居们运过河去。
n. 繁音拍子（多切分节奏的一种早期爵士乐） adj. 滑稽的；不严肃的 同义词:funny, humouristic Ragtime is a kind of music played by a solo pianist .散拍音乐是一种钢琴独奏的音乐形式。

vi. 团结；重整；恢复；（网球等）连续对打 vt. 团结；集合；恢复健康、力量等 n. 集会；回复；公路赛车会 同义词:league, restore, assemble, fall in, assembly, feedback, meet, gathering, congregation The company commander rallied his defeated and dispersed troops.连长把他的打了败仗的溃散部队重新召集起来。
adj. 猖獗的；蔓延的；狂暴的；奔放的 同义词:angry, rude Meanwhile , official corruption is rampant throughout the Communist party and bureaucracy .与此同时，官员腐败之风在整个党政机关蔓延。
n. 大农场经营者；大农场工人 The rancher wants us to Bring in more hay for his cattle .牧场主人希望我们为他的牲口带来更多的干草。
n. 经营大牧场 v. 经营牧场（ranch的ing形式） Itinerant ranching reached its peak in the 1880s .1880年代，巡回大牧场达到了顶峰。

n. 范围；幅度；排；山脉 vi. 平行，列为一行；延伸；漫游；射程达到 vt. 漫游；放牧；使并列；归类于；来回走动 同义词:extent, boundary, region, scope, spectrum, territory, area, reach, parallel with, feed, grass The salesclerks ranged the goods in good order in the shop-windows.售货员将橱窗中的商品排列得很整齐。
vt. 使纯化；变稀薄；精选 vi. 变稀薄；纯化 同义词:pick, handpick, rarify to rarefy the air使空气稀薄
vt. 配给；定量供应 n. 定量；口粮；配给量 同义词:admeasure, allowance, quantification, definite quantity Tea and sugar were scarce and were rationed during the war.在战争年代，茶和糖匮乏，均为定量供应。
n. [脊椎] 响尾蛇 同义词:Crotale, cascabel rattlesnake swiftly vibrated and shook its tail .响尾蛇急速地摇晃并抖动尾巴。
n. 掠夺，劫掠；大乌鸦 adj. 乌黑的 vt. 掠夺；狼吞虎咽 vi. 掠夺；狼吞虎咽 同义词:rapine, plunderage, sooty, harry, despoil, prey upon, gobble up The hungry rat ravened down the poison bait.饥饿的老鼠一口吞下毒饵。
vi. 再调整；重新适应 vt. 使…重新调整；使…重新适应 The driver's seat is too high,I have to readjust it.司机的座位太高了，我必须把它重新调节一下。
n. 领域，范围；王国 同义词:domain, territory, kingdom, province, world, universe, extent Loop gravity extends this insight into the quantum realm .环圈重力将这个见解援引至量子领域。
vt. 培养；树立；栽种 vi. 暴跳；高耸 adv. 向后；在后面 adj. 后方的；后面的；背面的 n. 后面；屁股；后方部队 同义词:cultivate, foster, plant, set, bed, rise, tower, fro, aback, latter, back, back, behind, ass The rabbit reared its ears.兔子竖起它的耳朵。
n. 叛乱；反抗；谋反；不服从 同义词:resistance, insurgency This rebellion is the latest in a series of uprisings led by the Tuareg .这次的叛乱是柏柏尔人领导的一系列起义中最近的一次。
n. [植] 花托；容器；插座 同义词:container, vessel, jack, pocket A cone - shaped ornament receptacle .心脏是一个圆锥形的器官。
n. [生化] 受体；接受器；感觉器官 同义词:ceptor, holding tank A particularly appealing one is the capsaicin receptor .其中最吸引人的目标是辣椒素受体。
n. 食谱；[临床] 处方；秘诀 同义词:secret, tips As day follows night , this is a recipe for the next crisis .就像黑夜过后是白天，这种疗法也将导致下一场危机。

n. 容器，接受者；容纳者 adj. 容易接受的，感受性强的 同义词:container, vessel, receiver, pocket, bin, acceptant, susceptive Once our recipient gets a car they get a six month 6000 mile warranty .一旦接受者得到了汽车，他们也同时获得半年6000英里的保修。
vt. 认出，识别；承认 vi. 确认，承认；具结 同义词:identify, spot, accept, agree, grant, accept, confirm on I recognize you now.You are Mary's husband.我现在认出你来了，你是玛丽的丈夫。
vt. 重建；改造；修复；重现 同义词:restore, rebuild The ancient temple ruined in the war will be reconstructed soon.这座在战争中被毁坏的古刹不久将重建。

n. 再建，重建；改造；复兴 同义词:restructuring, regeneration, renewal A big but little-known effort was the " Vienna initiative ", brokered by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development .一个大的，却鲜为人知的努力——“维也纳倡议”，由欧洲重建和发展银行做中间人安排。
n. 娱乐；消遣；休养 同义词:entertainment, pleasure, sport, occupation, amusement My only recreation has been watching TV .我惟一的娱乐就是看电视。
n. 矩形；长方形 同义词:orthogon Make a rectangle with your fingers like this .像这样用手指做个长方形的形状。
adj. 矩形的；成直角的 同义词:quartering Construct a set of rectangular axes and resolve any inclined forces into rectangular components .作一组直角坐标轴，把各力都分解成正交分量。
vt. 使再循环；使…重新利用 vi. 重复利用 n. 再生；再循环；重复利用 同义词:regeneration, breeding, rebirth to recycle water使水再循环
vt. 使改方向；重新寄送 adj. 再直接的 n. 再直接询问 I redirected his letters to his new house.我把他的信件改寄到他的新住所。

n. [作物] 芦苇；簧片；牧笛；不可依靠的人 vt. 用芦苇盖；用芦苇装饰 同义词:Phragmites, phragmites communis One day , as punishment for a bit of childish willfulness , she puts Jane into the room in which Mr. Reed died .一天，作为对简一丁点儿孩子气任性的惩罚，里德太太把她关进了里德先生病故的那个房间。
vt. 精炼，提纯；改善；使…文雅 同义词:improve, polish up Their daily work is to refine crude oil.他们每天的工作是精炼原油。

n. 精制；文雅；[化工][油气][冶] 提纯 同义词:cultivation, purification Bill Venners : You say , "Don't spoil a perfectly good program by over- embellishment and over- refinement . " How do I know when to stop ?比尔·凡纳斯：你们说：“过度修饰或者过度精炼会毁掉一个足够好的软件。”我怎么才能知道何时该停止？
n. 反射；沉思；映象 同义词:meditation, contemplation In telephony , an interference due to reflection of the transmitted signal from the receiving end .在电话技术中，由于发送信号从接收端反射回来而引起的干扰。
n. 折射；折光 Refraction makes a straight stick look bent if it is partly in water .折射使一根部分浸在水中的直棍子看起来是弯的。
adj. 提神的；使清爽的；使人重新振作的 v. 使清新；恢复精神（refresh的ing形式） 同义词:life-giving This is a refreshing change from the politics of climate change , which is all about the generics .相较于充斥着泛泛之谈的气候变化政治主张，这是个令人耳目一新的转变。
n. 点心；起提神作用的东西；精力恢复 同义词:dimsum, mug-up The spectators dropped off to get refreshment .旁观者纷纷离座去吃点心。
vt. 冷藏，冷冻；使冷却；使清凉 同义词:chill You had better refrigerate the beer before drinking it.喝啤酒前你最好先把它冷冻一下。
n. 冰箱，冷藏库 同义词:icebox, freezer I saw a refrigerator in the dining room .我在餐室里看见了一个电冰箱。
vt. 使再生；革新 vi. 再生；革新 adj. 再生的；革新的 同义词:reform, revivify, innovate, innovative, reproductive They were spiritually regenerated by his speech.他们听了他的讲话后在精神上获得了新生。
n. 政权，政体；社会制度；管理体制 同义词:government, power An " axis of evil " branded ripe for " regime change ".“邪恶轴心”“政权更迭”的时机已经成熟。
n. 纪律；系统化；严格控制；团的编制 同义词:discipline, systematization We also examine about the regimentation and designation of slaves in Chin and Han dynasties .此外，第一章也系统论述了秦汉奴婢的类别、名称等问题。
vt. 调节，规定；控制；校准；有系统的管理 同义词:possess, define, contain, manage, state We must try our best to regulate our expenditure.我们必须尽力控制开支。
adj. 管理的；控制的；调整的 同义词:administrative, managing, guiding This was the regulatory Achilles heel that led to the present crisis .这就是导致当今经济危机的“监管的阿基里斯之踵”。
vt. 使康复；使恢复名誉；使恢复原状 vi. 复兴；复权；恢复正常生活 同义词:repristinate, unmake, revive He was set free and rehabilitated as chief engineer.他被释放并恢复总工程师职务。

adj. 统治的；在位的；本届的；起支配作用的 v. 统治；支配；盛行（reign的ing形式） 同义词:ruling, dominant, governing, guiding On Monday , home side Chicago bears stunned the reigning Super Bowl champion Dallas Cowboys .星期一，芝加哥黑熊队丰场挫败了超级碗赛卫冕冠军达拉斯牛仔队。
n. 重新解释 The ancient “Book of Songs” needs to be reinterpreted for the young people.对青年人来说，古代的《诗经》需要做新的解释。
vt. 拒绝；排斥；抵制；丢弃 n. 被弃之物或人；次品 同义词:refuse, negative, inferior, degraded product I rejected his suggestion.我不同意他的建议。
vt. 释放；发射；让与；允许发表 n. 释放；发布；让与 同义词:deliver, send, free, project, convey, liberation, issuance He was released from prison after serving a sentence of five years.他在服刑五年后从狱中释放出来。

n. [数] 余数，残余；剩余物；其余的人 adj. 剩余的；吃剩的 vt. 廉价出售；削价出售 vi. 廉价出售；削价出售 同义词:leaving, arithmetical compliment, surplus, residual, odd, bargain sale, undercut, bargain sale The unsalable books are to be remaindered next week.滞销书将于下周削价出售。
n. 暗示；提醒的人/物；催单 同义词:connotation, implication, allusion If they don't pay their bills , send them a reminder .如果他们拖欠帐单不付，给他们送一张催帐单去。
n. 残余；残留物（remnant的复数） adj. 残存的 同义词:residua, hangovers, epibiotic It will still take some time to mop up these enemy remnants , but not long .肃清这一部分残余敌军，还需要一些时间，但已为期不远了。
vt. 致使；提出；实施；着色；以…回报 vi. 给予补偿 n. 打底；交纳；粉刷 同义词:introduce, present, prefer, file, advance, cosmetic brush He rendered a report to the commander-in-chief.他向总司令作了汇报。
vt. 宣布放弃；与…断绝关系；垫牌 vi. 放弃权利；垫牌 n. 垫牌 同义词:break up with, finish with She renounced her claim to the property.她声明放弃她的财产权。
n. 租金 vt. 出租；租用；租借 vi. 租；出租 同义词:letting, hire, lease out, hire out, lease out, hire out They want to rent a house by the side of the river.他们想在河边租一所房子。
vt. 使适应；再调整 同义词:adapt, condition, suit, season The most important step is to reorient the direction of the new building.最重要的一个步骤是给这座新建筑物重定方向。
vt. 补充，再装满；把…装满；给…添加燃料 同义词:supply, to supplement Let me replenish your glass with some more wine.让我给你杯子里再添点葡萄酒。
n. 代表；表现；表示法；陈述 同义词:presentation, statement, deputy, behalf of, ambassador Our firm has adequate representation in Europe .本公司在欧洲有足够的代理权。
vt. 复制；再生；生殖；使…在脑海中重现 vi. 复制；繁殖 同义词:generate, repeat, breed, increase The computer reproduced the data as a set of diagrams.计算机用一组图表把那些数据重新显示出来。
adj. 生殖的；再生的；复制的 同义词:generative, regenerative The reproductive system has a complex innervation concerned in copulation and oviposition .生殖系统有一个同交尾和产卵有关的复杂神经系统。
adj. 爬虫类的；卑鄙的 n. 爬行动物；卑鄙的人 同义词:poor, mean, base, dirty, insect, ratfink Rise , and don't degrade youself into an abject reptile .起来，可别把你自己贬成一个下贱的爬虫。
n. 名誉；声望 vt. 名誉；认为；把…称为 同义词:credit, name, prestige, expect, count, guess, find, feel He was reputed to be a millionaire.大家说他是个百万富翁。
vt. 类似，像 同义词:favor He resembles his father very much in character.他在性格上非常像他父亲。
n. 水库；蓄水池 同义词:artificial lake The only significant reservoir / host is man .唯一有效的宿主是人类。
n. 残渣；剩余；滤渣 同义词:surplus, spare No poisonous residue after disinfection , safe and reliable .消毒后无任何毒害残留物，安全可靠。
adj. 分别的，各自的 同义词:several, each The three methods described above have their respective merits .上述的三个方法都有它们各自的优点。

adv. 分别地；各自地，独自地 同义词:separately, alone, in several In all cases , the enzymes can be dissociated into two distinct protein components , termed A and B , respectively .在所有情况下，这个酶均可分解成两个不同的蛋白质组分，分别称作A和b。

n. 恢复；复位；王政复辟；归还 同义词:recovery, replacement, retrieval, renewal, resumption The third big achievement , alongside democracy and prosperity , is the partial restoration of public -spiritedness, trust , decency and kindness .除民主与繁荣外的第三项重大成就是部分恢复了公众精神、信任、体面与和善。
vt. 限制；约束；限定 同义词:block, set a limit to Membership of the club is restricted to adults.本俱乐部会员仅限于成年人。

n. 限制；约束；束缚 同义词:limitation, qualification, chain, constraint But it places high customs and other re( restriction ) on many products , especially rice , fruit and beef .但是在其他产品上都设有高关税以及各种限制，尤其是大米，水果和牛肉。
vt. 零售；转述 vi. 零售 n. 零售 adv. 以零售方式 adj. 零售的 同义词:sell-through, resale This kind of chocolate is retailed at one pound a kilo.这种巧克力糖零售每公斤一英镑。
n. 零售商；传播的人 同义词:bania, tradesman A small retailer should compare prices with a similar store .一个小的零售商应与类似的商店比较价格。
vt. 保持；雇；记住 同义词:keep up, to keep If you want to retain youthful vigor,you have to take regular exercise.如果你想保持青春活力，你就得经常锻炼。
vt. 重组；重新装备 vi. 更换工具；重新装备；更换机械设备 同义词:recombine, reequip We had to retool for enlarging reproduction.为了扩大再生产，我们必须更换机械设备。
n. 撤退；休息寓所；撤退 vi. 撤退；退避；向后倾 vt. 退（棋）；使后退 同义词:withdrawal, pullback, withdraw, bug out The enemy was forced to retreat from the city.敌人被迫撤出这个城市。
vt. [计] 检索；恢复；重新得到 vi. 找回猎物 n. [计] 检索；恢复，取回 同义词:restore, repair, recovery, restoration, renewal He retrieved the important letter from the waste paper basket.他从废纸篓里找回了那封重要的信。
vt. 显示；透露；揭露；泄露 n. 揭露；暴露；门侧，窗侧 同义词:make clear, prove, disclose, expose, uncovery, exposure to sth I should be glad to give you any help if you reveal your thoughts to me.如果你把你的想法透露给我，我愿意尽全力帮助你。
vt. 敬畏；尊敬；崇敬 Mr White was revered for his great learning by all the students in the college.怀特先生学识渊博，受到学院全体学生的尊重。

n. 背面；相反；倒退；失败 vt. 颠倒；倒转 adj. 反面的；颠倒的；[篮球]反身的 vi. 倒退；[桥牌]逆叫 同义词:failure, loss, contrary, losing, defeat, bottom up, head over heels, upside-down, perversive, retrogress, step backward Please reverse your examination paper.请把试卷翻过来。
vt. 修正；复习；校订 vi. 修订；校订；复习功课 n. 修订；校订 同义词:update, edit, to amend, recension, emendation The English textbooks for middle schools have been completely revised.中学的英语教科书已经全部被修订过。

n. 复兴；复苏；新生 同义词:reconstruction, fresh, renaissance, renewal " We're learning a lot on the International Space Station right now on air revitalization and water recovery , " Drake said.德雷克说：“关于空气再生和水循环利用问题，现在我们从国际空间站上学到了很多。
n. 复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神；再生效 同义词:reconstruction, renaissance, renewal, resurrection Is this West Side Story revival worth seeing ?那么《西区故事》是否还值得一看呢？
vi. 复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神 vt. 使复兴；使苏醒；回想起；重演，重播 同义词:come back to life again, resurge, recall, reinvigorate A dead man will never revive.死人将永不复生。
vt. 撤回，取消；废除 vi. 有牌不跟 n. 有牌不跟 同义词:recall, unsay He revoked his previous decision.他改变了以前作出的决定。
n. 修辞，修辞学；华丽的词藻 adj. 花言巧语的 同义词:trope, eloquence, smooth-tongued, plausible I may not offer rhetoric , but I do promise results .我不会用美丽的修辞，但我保证给出满意的结果。
adj. 有节奏的；有韵律的 同义词:cadent, metronomic His breathing became more rhythmical .他的呼吸变得更有节奏了。
n. 山脊；山脉；屋脊 vt. 使成脊状；作垄 vi. 成脊状 同义词:mountain range, cordillera to ridge the land垦地作垄
n. 裂缝；不和；[木] 裂口 vt. 使断裂；使分开 vi. 裂开 同义词:crack, split, separate, unhinge, gap, seam, spring off The fog is rifted.雾散了。
n. [物] 硬度，[力] 刚性；严格，刻板；僵化；坚硬 同义词:stiffness, starch The beam has a constant flexural rigidity .该梁具有常数弯曲刚度。
n. 暴乱；放纵；蔓延 vi. 骚乱；放荡 vt. 浪费，挥霍 同义词:loose, commotion, sow one's wild oats, easy virtue, lose, spend, consume The unsatisfied workers are rioting in the streets.心怀不满的工人们在大街上闹事。
vt. 使成熟 vi. 成熟 同义词:age, mellow, age, mature, flower The grapes are ripening, the apple trees are heavy with fruit.葡萄就要熟了，苹果树上结满了果实。
n. 仪式；惯例，习俗；典礼 同义词:ceremony, tradition, convention, usage, institution How he did this again and again , like some animal courting rite in an old zoology text .他一遍又一遍重复这一动作，好像老动物学教科书里写的动物求偶的仪式。
n. 仪式；惯例；礼制 adj. 仪式的；例行的；礼节性的 同义词:tradition, ceremony, convention, usage, service, routine, ceremonial A tired diplomatic ritual will play out once again .一场疲惫的外交仪式将再次上演。

n. 对手；竞争者 vt. 与…竞争；比得上某人 vi. 竞争 adj. 竞争的 同义词:equal, comparative, opponent, match, adversary, match, compete against, contest, cope, struggle to, competitive, vying The two students rivaled each other for the scholarship.这两个学生为获得奖学金而互相竞争。
vi. 漫游，漫步；流浪 vt. 在…漫步，漫游；在…流浪 n. 漫步，漫游；流浪 同义词:range, knock about/around, range, go on a tour, travel, bummel I like to roam around the fields.我喜欢在田野中漫步。
adj. 强健的；健康的；粗野的；粗鲁的 同义词:healthy, crude, gross, fine, rough a robust faith坚定的信念

n. 棒；惩罚；枝条；权力 同义词:punishment, authority, payment, bar, discipline Cars honked behind him . The mahout turned and gesticulated at him with rod . A passerby yelled at him not to block traffic .身后响起了汽车喇叭声，看象人也用小铁棒向他比划着，一个过路人更对他吼着让他不要妨碍交通。
n. 栖木；鸟窝；群栖的禽鸟 vi. 栖息；安歇 vt. 使…栖息；为…提供歇息处 同义词:perch, perch He was the quintessential old-school trader who worked his way to the top and ruled the roost .他是个信奉经典学院派理论的交易员，从公司底层干起，一步步走到今天。
n. 公鸡；狂妄自负的人 同义词:coq, chanticleer A donkey heard a rooster crow in the field .驴子听见公鸡在田地里啼叫。
vi. 旋转；循环 vt. 使旋转；使转动；使轮流 adj. [植] 辐状的 同义词:wheel, circle, spin, turn, spin, swing The moon rotates around the earth.月球围绕着地球旋转。
n. 碎石，碎砖；粗石堆 同义词:crushed stone, rockfill The town has twice been rubbled in battle.这个城镇曾经两次毁于战争。
adj. 基本的；初步的；退化的；残遗的；未发展的 同义词:elementary, basic, fundamental, essential, primary What would be the utility of the rudimentary beginnings of such structures ?这种构造，在其最初的幼稚的阶段能有什么样的用途？
n. 破裂；决裂；疝气 vi. 破裂；发疝气 vt. 使破裂；断绝；发生疝 同义词:fracture, cracking, fracture, crack, crack, fracture, stop The diplomatic relations between the two countries have been ruptured.两国外交关系已经断绝。
adj. 农村的，乡下的；田园的，有乡村风味的 同义词:country, sylvan Rural children face the same risks as city children .乡村孩子和城市孩子面临同样的危险。
adj. 防锈的；不锈的 vt. 使抗锈 同义词:stainless, anti-rust Stainless products are always popular because they're rustproof .不锈钢制品因为能防锈，所以很受欢迎。
n. 麻布袋；洗劫 vt. 解雇；把……装入袋；劫掠 同义词:gunny bag, burlap bag, get the boot, dehire to sack powder把炸药装入袋中
adj. 神的；神圣的；宗教的；庄严的 同义词:religious, blessed Then again , Palestine is the uniting and almost sacred cause of the Arab world .再一次，巴勒斯坦成为阿拉伯世界同仇敌忾、近乎神圣的概念。
n. 鞍，鞍状物；车座；拖具 vt. 承受；使负担；装以马鞍 vi. 跨上马鞍 同义词:sella, absorb, burden to saddle somebody with unpleasant work把讨厌的工作指派给某人
vt. 取样；尝试；抽样检查 n. 样品；样本；例子 adj. 试样的，样品的；作为例子的 同义词:essay, have a try, example, pattern to sample the products对产品进行抽样检查
adj. 假装虔诚的；假装圣洁的；假装诚实的 同义词:pietistic, Pharisaic a self-righteous or sanctimonious person .一本正经或假装神圣的人。
n. 制裁，处罚；认可；支持 vt. 制裁，处罚；批准；鼓励 同义词:approval, penalty, holding, support, adhesion, encourage, confirm, heart, uphold to sanction a proposal批准一项提案
n. 避难所；至圣所；耶路撒冷的神殿 同义词:haven, home, harbor, shelter As Jack continues to search the vacant sanctuary grounds , security guards watch him from a distance .杰克继续在空荡的保护区场地上搜寻，在远处，安全警卫观察着他。
n. [医] 环境卫生；卫生设备；下水道设施 同义词:hygiene of environment, environmental health The search for water and sanitation projects received more than 250 proposals from 54 countries .寻求饮水和卫生设施的项目收到来自54个国家超过250份建议。
n. 讽刺；讽刺文学，讽刺作品 同义词:hit, sarcasm Satire is often a form of protest against injustice .讽刺往往是一种对不公正的抗议形式。
adj. 讽刺的；挖苦的 同义词:acid, ironic Music is but the only one which is no language for expressing satiric or mean things .音乐是唯一不能用及表达卑鄙的或讽刺的事物的语言。
vt. 浸透，使湿透；使饱和，使充满 adj. 浸透的，饱和的；深颜色的 同义词:freight, water logging, permeant, satd the coil saturated with magnet磁饱和线圈
n. 规模；比例；鳞；刻度；天平；数值范围 vi. 衡量；攀登；剥落；生水垢 vt. 测量；攀登；刮鳞；依比例决定 同义词:dimensions, ratio, graduation, calibration, chip, shell, climb, sound, gauge to scale peanut剥花生皮

n. 跨度，跨距；范围 vt. 跨越；持续；以手指测量 同义词:extent, boundary, region, spectrum, territory, area, stride leap, last for to span the table to see how long it is用拃丈量桌子，看有多长
adv. 节俭地；保守地；爱惜地 同义词:economically, thriftily Genes for resistance thus spread through the population unless such drugs are used sparingly .如果不能合理有效地使用抗生素的话，抗药性的基因就会扩散到整个菌群。
n. 火花；朝气；闪光 vt. 发动；鼓舞；求婚 vi. 闪烁；发火花；求婚 同义词:A FRAME, scintilla, stimulate, launch, lift, drive, spirit, offer, coruscate Their eyes sparked with green in the dark night.在黑暗的夜里，他们的眼睛会发出绿色的闪光。
adj. 稀疏的；稀少的 同义词:exiguous, infrequent Outside this central area , the cells rapidly become more sparse .其他靠外部的区域，细胞迅速变得稀疏。
n. 卵；菌丝；产物 vt. 产卵；酿成，造成；大量生产 vi. 产卵；大量生产 同义词:child, creation, fruit, create, egg laying, oviposit, mass production Many sea fishes spawn in rivers.许多海洋鱼类是在淡水河里产卵的。

n. [生物] 物种；种类 adj. 物种上的 同义词:category, variety, manner, nature, kind Darwin followed up with The Origin of Species in 1859 .达尔文继续编撰，于1859年出版《物种起源》。
n. 规格；说明书；详述 同义词:description, amplification He now had an expertly detailed specification .现在他有了精细的规格说明。
n. 样品，样本；标本 同义词:pattern, swatch The problem before us is where we can find specimen .我们面前的问题是我们在哪儿能找到标本。
adj. 壮观的，惊人的；公开展示的 同义词:tremendous, incredible Africa will host its most spectacular global event in 2010 : the football World Cup in South Africa .非洲将主办其在2010年最引人注目的全球事件：在南非举办的足球世界杯。
adv. 壮观地；引人注目地 同义词:dramatically, remarkably The spectacularly successful World Wide Web is just a distributed version of a hypertext document system .获得惊人成功的万维网不过是一个超文本文件系统的并行版本。
n. 观众；旁观者 同义词:audience, onlooker But the crazy thing is that people still do go just to be a spectator at other people 's inability to sing .但是，当你不得不听那些没有唱歌天赋的人不停的唱歌，那真是件令人疯狂的事情。
n. 光谱；频谱；范围；余象 同义词:extent, boundary, region, territory, area Several different names have emerged to characterize different parts of the spectrum .几个不同的名称用来表示电磁波谱的不同部分。
vi. 推测；投机；思索 vt. 推断 同义词:guess, venture, understand, conclude This is the method that we have been speculating about.这正是我们一直在思考的方法。
n. 范围；球体 vt. 包围；放入球内；使…成球形 adj. 球体的 同义词:extent, boundary, region, scope, spectrum, territory, range, case, invest a mountain village sphered by trees万树丛中的小山村
adj. 球形的，球面的；天体的 同义词:global, ball-shaped A rubber spherical balloon is quickly blown up in an angry sea by a ditched pilot .一个迫降的飞行员在波涛汹涌的海上向一个橡皮球迅速充气。
adj. 脊髓的；脊柱的；针的；脊骨的；尖刺的 n. 脊椎麻醉 同义词:rachial, medullary They report finding a gene that sends the itch signal up the spinal cord to the brain .他们研究发现了有一种基因是传送瘙痒信号通过脊髓到脑部的。
adj. 脊髓的；脊柱的；针的；脊骨的；尖刺的 n. 脊椎麻醉 同义词:rachial, medullary They report finding a gene that sends the itch signal up the spinal cord to the brain .他们研究发现了有一种基因是传送瘙痒信号通过脊髓到脑部的。

n. 螺旋；旋涡；螺旋形之物 adj. 螺旋形的；盘旋的 vt. 使成螺旋形；使作螺旋形上升 vi. 盘旋；成螺旋形；螺旋形上升（过去式spiraled/spiralled，过去分词spiraled/spiralled，现在分词spiraling/spiralling，第三人称单数spirals，副词spirally） 同义词:screw, helix, helical, gyroidal The eagle spirals up into the sky.鹰盘旋着飞上了高空。
vt. 分离；使分离；劈开；离开 vi. 离开；被劈开；断绝关系 n. 劈开；裂缝 adj. 劈开的 同义词:leave, quit, leave, quit, get out, crack, cleavage, cloven, cleft to split a log into two把木头劈成两半
n. 损坏，糟蹋；掠夺；损坏物 同义词:lay waste to, breaking down The physical structure of a food also can affect the course and extent of spoilage .食品的物理结构也能影响变质的过程和程度。
vt. 抹掉；用海绵擦拭；讨得 vi. 采集海绵；过寄生生活；海绵般地吸收 n. 海绵；海绵状物 同义词:efface, cosher, spunge Sponge the glass, then clean with a dry cloth.先用湿海绵擦一下玻璃，然后用一块干布擦干净。
adj. 自发的；自然的；无意识的 同义词:autonomous, mechanical, natural, initiative You can pick up your story the next evening at this spontaneous bookmark .第二天晚上你可以凭借这自然产生的书签继续跟进你的故事。
adv. 自发地；自然地；不由自主地 同义词:naturally, in spite of oneself He also felt that control of that order also emerged spontaneously .他还认为秩序的控制也是自发出现的。
n. 聚光灯；反光灯；公众注意的中心 vt. 聚光照明；使公众注意 同义词:photospot, revelation light She's being spotlighted by the newspapers.她现在成了记者追逐的对象。
n. 喷雾；喷雾器；水沫 vt. 喷射 vi. 喷 同义词:foam, atomizer, eject, sparge, spritz to spray water from its mouth从其嘴中喷射出水来
vi. 发芽；长芽 vt. 使发芽；使萌芽 n. 芽；萌芽；苗芽 同义词:put, come into bud, germinate, bud, seed, bud The seeds will sprout in 3 days after they are sown.这类种子种下后3天出芽。
n. 鼓舞，刺激；马刺；山坡 vi. 骑马疾驰；给予刺激 vt. 激励，鞭策；给…装踢马刺 同义词:stimulus, inspiration, incentive, excitement, needle, stimulate, power He spurred his horse to catch the last post.他催马快跑，以便赶上最后一班收信时间。
vt. 镇压；把…压扁；使沉默 vi. 受挤压；发出挤压声；挤入 n. 壁球；挤压；咯吱声；南瓜属植物；（英）果汁饮料 同义词:silence, suppress, wedge in, pile in, nobbing to squash some of the eggs压碎了几个鸡蛋
vt. 挤；紧握；勒索 vi. 压榨 n. 压榨；紧握；拥挤；佣金 同义词:force one's way, thread one's way, compression, commission, purchase to squeeze oneself into the lift挤进电梯
n. 喷射；注射 vt. 喷湿 vi. 喷出 同义词:injection, emission, jet, belch out, spout out The orange skin squirted in my eye.橘皮汁喷进了我的眼睛。

n. 公共马车；驿站马车 同义词:dawk Out of nowhere appeared a stagecoach .突然一辆公共马车凭空出现了。
adj. 蹒跚的；令人惊愕的；犹豫的 v. 蹒跚（stagger的ing形式） 同义词:doddery, hitchy, tottering Um , the size , the scale , the scope is truly staggering .这些城市的数量和规模真的是让我吃惊。
adj. 停滞的；不景气的；污浊的；迟钝的 同义词:slow, dull If the economy remains stagnant , the Bank will probably be slow to remove the liquidity .如果经济仍继续停滞不前，英国央行将可能放慢消除流动性。
n. 楼梯 同义词:apples and pears A vertical support at the center of a circular staircase .螺旋楼梯中柱环行楼梯中间的垂直支撑。
n. （植物的）茎，秆；（支持叶子、果实和花的）梗，柄；追踪；高视阔步 vt. 追踪，潜近；高视阔步 vi. 高视阔步地走；潜近，偷偷接近 同义词:stem, tracking, handle, trail, follow up on, move in on He stalked to the building.他悄悄地靠近了那所建筑。
vi. 站立；位于；停滞 vt. 使站立；忍受；抵抗 n. 站立；立场；看台；停止 同义词:sit, lie on, stomach, go, tough, abide, sustain, stop, stay Don't stand. Take a seat, please.别站着，请坐下。
n. 主要产品；订书钉；主题；主食 adj. 主要的，大宗生产的；常用的；纺织纤维的 vt. 把…分级；钉住 同义词:topic, theme, subject, main products, primary, major, central, main, leading, pin up, nail up to staple one's drafts用订书钉把稿子钉起来
n. 淀粉；刻板，生硬 vt. 给…上浆 同义词:rigidity, amylum Starch my shirt's collar, please.请把我的衬衣领浆硬。
n. 海星 同义词:sea star, asteroidean While admitting the beauty of a starfish , he saw greenish toes protruding from the sandy floor .正当他惊叹于海星的美丽时，他看见从沙质海床里露出来绿色的脚趾头。
n. 饿死；挨饿；绝食 同义词:fast, apastia The World Food Program says starvation is a problem in parts of Asia , Central America and the Middle East .联合国世界粮食计划署表示在亚洲、中美洲和中东的一部分地区饥荒也是一个问题。
vi. 饿死；挨饿；渴望 vt. 使饿死；使挨饿 同义词:rare, die form hunger, famish Have you got any food in your house? I'm starving!我饿坏了，你家有什么吃的吗?
n. 藏匿处；藏匿物 vt. 存放；贮藏 vi. 存放；藏起来 同义词:store, deposit, put out of sight, trust with They stashed the guns away under the ground.他们把那批枪埋藏在地下了。
adj. 固定的；静止的；定居的；常备军的 n. 不动的人；驻军 同义词:standing, settled, still, resident, set Relativity states that fast - moving objects age more slowly than stationary ones.相对论说，快速移动的物体会比静止不动的老化得慢。

vt. 控制，引导；驾驶 vi. 驾驶，掌舵；行驶 n. 阉牛 同义词:possess, contain, regulate, bit, bottle, to navigate to steer a plane驾驶飞机
adj. 星的；主要的；星球的 同义词:primary, major, central, leading, great From the accurate theory of stellar interiors one can establish such a dependence .根据精确的恒星内部结构理论，可以建立这种关系。

n. 干；茎；船首；血统 vt. 阻止；除去…的茎；给…装柄 vi. 阻止；起源于某事物；逆行 同义词:birth, blood, stock, block, dispute, prohibit, discourage, prevent from, head off The strawberries should be stemmed before they are tinned.装听之前，这些草莓得去掉果梗。
adj. 不育的；无菌的；贫瘠的；不毛的；枯燥乏味的 同义词:hungry, desert Best of all, the yen is not sterile asset like gold .最重要的是，日元并不是像黄金那样的“不结果”资产。
adj. 粘的；粘性的 同义词:glutinous, viscous There are several explanations for why dividends have been sticky in Asia .对于为何亚洲的红利一直具有粘性，存在几个解释。
vi. 变硬；变猛烈；变粘 vt. 使变硬；使粘稠 同义词:harden, callus to stiffen a knife by quenching以淬火使刀子变硬
n. 刺激；激励；刺激物 同义词:incentive, animation, excitement, needle, irritation China is a worry , thanks to the scale and composition of its stimulus .中国是个担忧，这要感谢中国激励措施的组合及程度。
n. 刺痛；讽刺，刺激；刺毛 vt. 刺；驱使；使…苦恼；使…疼痛 vi. 刺痛；被刺痛；感到剧痛 同义词:stimulus, smart, incentive, excitement, hit, stick, pink, smart, bite He was stung by a wasp.他被马蜂螫了一下。
n. 针脚，线迹；一针 vt. 缝，缝合 vi. 缝，缝合 同义词:steek, seam, oversew, sew up to stitch two sacks together to make a curtain把两块麻袋片缝在一起权充窗帘
n. 股份，股票；库存；血统；树干 adj. 存货的，常备的；平凡的 vt. 进货；备有；装把手于… vi. 囤积；办货；出新芽 同义词:birth, blood, stem, ordinary, mediocre, be furnished with, corner I stocked many facial tissues in my shop.我的店里有大量面巾纸的存货。
n. 石匠；石工；石工锤 同义词:jadder, masonry He had worked as a hire hand in the farmer , a stonemason and a punter .他当过农场雇工、石匠，做过船夫。
adj. 结实的；矮胖的；勇敢的；激烈的 n. 矮胖子；烈性啤酒 同义词:acute, solid, firm, tough, game, punchinello Vandeuvres had sat himself down by the stout man , who still looked very sedate .汪德夫尔已经走到那个矮胖子身边坐下，那个人的样子，依然是很沉着的。
n. 张力；拉紧；负担；扭伤；血缘 vi. 拉紧；尽力 vt. 拉紧；滥用；滤去；竭力 同义词:tension, burden, weight, tauten, take pains, abuse, tighten up to strain a rope拉紧绳子
n. 线；串；海滨 vt. 使搁浅；使陷于困境；弄断；使落后 vi. 搁浅 同义词:string, thread, cluster, ground, beach, take the ground The receding tide stranded the whale.退潮把鲸鱼搁浅在海滩上。
n. 层；地层；阶层 同义词:thickness, layer, degree, tier In parallel or concordant bedding the strata overlay each other like pages of a book.在平行的或者整合的层面中，地层好象书页一般互相重迭。
vt. 伸展,张开 vi. 伸展 adj. 可伸缩的 n. 伸展，延伸 She's stretched out in the sun.她伸开四肢躺在太阳下。
n. 大步；步幅；进展 vt. 跨过；大踏步走过；跨坐在… vi. 跨；跨过；大步行走 同义词:evolution, steps, step over, step over He strode about the meeting room.他在会议室内大步地来回踱步。
vi. 打，打击；罢工；敲，敲击；抓；打动；穿透 vt. 打，击；罢工；撞击，冲击；侵袭；打动；到达 n. 罢工；打击；殴打 同义词:grasp, beat upon, impact, beat upon, stroke, shock, hit, hiding He's struck by his father.他挨了父亲的打。
adj. 显著的，突出的，惊人的；打击的；罢工的 v. 打（strike的ing形式） 同义词:prominent, obvious, marked, tremendous, noted, beating He's struck by his father.他挨了父亲的打。

adv. 显著地；突出地，引人注目地 同义词:remarkably, notably, dramatically, prominently, markedly strikingly common for young Israelis to start businesses with friends that they met in the army .年轻的以色列士兵在部队里就开始和朋友做生意的现象非常普遍。
n. 线，细绳；一串，一行 vt. 扎，缚；使排成一列，串起；伸展，拉直 vi. 连成一串；排成一列 同义词:thread, linea, spread, pink to string a bonnet系上扁软帽的带子
adj. 严厉的；迫切的；银根紧的 同义词:severe, tight, hard, harsh, pressing The Clean Water Act expressly provides that it does not preempt more stringent state law .《洁净水法案》明确规定，该法并不先占更为严格的州法律。
vt. 剥夺；剥去；脱去衣服 n. 带；条状；脱衣舞 vi. 脱去衣服 同义词:shear, destitute of, belt, band He stripped an orange of its rind for me.他为我剥去了橘子皮。
vi. 努力；奋斗；抗争 同义词:apply oneself, struggle, labor He strove to make himself understood.他尽力让别人理解他的意思。
n. 中风；冲程；笔画；打击；尝试；轻抚 vt. 抚摸；敲击；划尾桨；划掉 vi. 击球；作尾桨手；敲击键盘 同义词:blow, shock, experiment, go, strike, dong, daut, hit the ball He stroked the name of himself with his pen.他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。
adj. 程式化的；按固定格式的 v. 风格化；仿效…的风格（stylize的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:ritualized His beginning position was stylized Sicily Defence.他以西西里防御的程式开局。
vt. 除去；减去；取回 vi. 下拉；撤去 同义词:get rid of, wipe off The border between the N American and Eurasian Plates does not subduct .北美板块和欧亚板块之间的边界地区不会俯冲潜没，也不会滑动。
n. 主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民 adj. 服从的；易患…的；受制于…的 vt. 使…隶属；使屈从于… 同义词:topic, theme, nation, titles, motive, followed, compliant It is a bounden duty for a soldier to be subjected to the orders.服从命令是军人的天职。
v. 使遭受（subject的过去分词形式）；使从属；受…影响 It is a bounden duty for a soldier to be subjected to the orders.服从命令是军人的天职。
vt. 淹没；把…浸入；沉浸 vi. 淹没；潜入水中；湮没 同义词:flood, flow, drown out, swallow up The whole village and the fields have been submerged by floods.洪水已淹没了整个村庄和农田。
vt. 使服从；主张；呈递 vi. 提交；服从 同义词:maintain, advocate, put in, hand in Should you submit yourself to him?你应该顺从他吗?
adj. 后来的，随后的 同义词:succeeding, pursuant To this end , the first panel is generally quite short , with subsequent panels gradually increasing in length .这样做的结果是，第一个采区一般很短，接下来的采区一般逐渐增加长度。
vi. 平息；减弱；沉淀；坐下 同义词:fall, settle, lower, cool, deposit The foundations of the building have subsided.该建筑的地基已下沉了。
vt. 资助；给与奖助金；向…行贿 同义词:fund, stake Soldiers are subsidized in our country .在我国军人享受津贴待遇。
n. 补贴；津贴；补助金 同义词:pension, allowance But be they ostrich or pigeon , Cubans it seems will soon have to face the reality of subsidy cuts .但不管是鸵鸟还是鸽子，古巴人似乎不得不很快面临补贴削减的事实。
vi. 存在；维持生活 vt. 供养 同义词:exist, occur, maintain, support, sustain, provide for Some doubt still subsists in his mind.他头脑中还是有些疑虑。
n. 生活；生存；存在 同义词:life, existence, presence, entity, living Islands of capitalism existed amid a sea subsistence labour .资本主义群岛存在于的求生存的劳动力大海中。

adj. 大量的；实质的；内容充实的 n. 本质；重要材料 同义词:massive, extensive, macro, much, volume, essence, entity, principle, texture, interior This generated profit , but any substantial technical innovations required the approval of management and a re -engineering of the entire network .这是有益的，但是任何实质的技术创新都需要管理层的批准，并需要对整个网络进行重构。

adj. 有实质的；大量的；真实的；独立存在的 n. 名词性实词；独立存在的实体 同义词:massive, extensive, actual, sincere, macro The question will be whether they favor a substantive reform or some kind of symbolic action .但问题是，他们是支持实质性的改革，还是某种象征性的行动。
n. 代用品；代替者 vi. 替代 vt. 代替 同义词:replacement, proxy, supply, fill in, replace, cover for, take the place of somebody, stand in for sb to substitute petrolic products for coal用石油产品替代煤
adj. 地下的；秘密的；隐蔽的 n. 地下工作者 同义词:underground, secret, chamber, inside, cabinet But they do not last long under the subterranean pressure .但是它们在地下的压力下撑不了多久。

adj. 微妙的；精细的；敏感的；狡猾的；稀薄的 同义词:sensitive, delicate, detailed, refined, designing It is also true that these indicators are blunt instruments for describing often subtle attitudes .上述指标在描述这些往往微妙的态度时，不大管用，这也是事实。
vt. 减去；扣掉 同义词:substract, subduce Subtracting the costs, the profit would be 1,000 pounds.扣除费用，其利润为1 000镑。
adj. 连续的；继承的；依次的；接替的 同义词:continuing, straight, endless, running, serial The rule of combination of symmetry operations is successive performance of them .对称操作的组合规则，是逐次地去运用它们。
adj. 简洁的；简明的；紧身的 同义词:brief, concise, compact Please give me a succinct summary of your points .请你简明扼要的概括下你的观点。
adj. 足够的；充分的 同义词:competent, plenty, wealthy His theory of atom was not sufficient for treatment of large atoms or molecules .他的原子理论用于处理大的原子和分子是不能令人满意的。
n. 顶点；最高级会议；最高阶层 adj. 最高级的；政府首脑的 同义词:height, sky, peak, apex, crown, first-chop, ritzy He kept Stalin company to summit during the World War Ⅱ.第二次世界大战期间他曾陪伴斯大林参加过最高级会谈。
adj. 华丽的，豪华的；奢侈的 同义词:grand, luxury, magnificent, brave, gorgeous The famous lawyer was shown to a sumptuous suite .那位著名的律师被引进了一套豪华的房间。
adv. 表面地；浅薄地 同义词:surfacely, ectally Even the east 's superficially good statistics often hide grave weaknesses .就连东德表面良好的统计数字也常常掩盖着严重的缺陷。
adj. 上级的；优秀的，出众的；高傲的 n. 上级，长官；优胜者，高手；长者 同义词:ranking, lofty, higher-up, prefect But he is a man of great dignity , superior talents and high ideals .但他是一个很有尊严的人，具有超人的才华和崇高的理想。
adj. 超自然的；神奇的，不可思议的 n. 超自然现象；不可思议的事 同义词:magic, mysterious, supranatural In that case a sense of being watched by a supernatural being might be useful.这种方式是让人们感到有一种超自然的东西在监视着他。
n. 补充，补遗；补充物；附录 vt. 补充，增补 同义词:recruitment, renewal, to replenish, eke to supplement an appendix to the book为该书补编一篇附录
vt. 抑制；镇压；废止 同义词:control, restrain, stay The rebellion against the government has been suppressed by the government troops.反政府的叛乱已被政府军平定了。

adj. 最高的；至高的；最重要的 n. 至高；霸权 同义词:highest, maximum, peak, top, principal, hegemony FACTS , ruled America's Supreme Court in 1918 in the " hot news doctrine ", cannot be copyrighted .1918年，美国最高法院就案件“热点新闻学说”，裁定事实不能上版权。
adv. 至上地；崇高地 同义词:consummately, nobly In each little slice of life , it's easy to supremely successful at richly living .在生命的每个小片段中，要获得华美无比的生活并非难事。
n. 表面；表层；外观 adj. 表面的，肤浅的 vi. 浮出水面 vt. 使浮出水面；使成平面 同义词:face, outside, garment, external, facial, shallow, superficial, Head Above Water, tabulate to surface a road铺路
v. 冲击（surge的ing形式）；浪涌 同义词:impinging to surge at anchor抛锚的船随波起伏
vt. 超越；胜过，优于；非…所能办到或理解 同义词:overcome, top, exceed, cap, transcend He surpassed me in maths.他的数学比我学得好。
vt. 维持；支撑，承担；忍受；供养；证实 同义词:maintain, undertake, support, accept, favor to sustain the main beam支撑主梁的重量

adj. 持续的；持久的；持久不变的 v. 维持（sustain的过去式和过去分词）；承受 同义词:continuing, lasting, kept Fuel up with healthy snacks. Large meals can make you drowsy . Try eating smaller meals and more healthy snacks throughout the day for sustained energy .通过健康有节制的饮食来补充能量。大吃大喝会让你昏昏欲睡。试一试每天少吃多餐来保持一整天的能量。
n. 食物；生计；支持 同义词:food, diet, holding, eating, support They wanted to see him , because they wanted to draw a certain sustenance from his strength .他们想见到他，因为他们想从他的实力里吸取某种养料。

n. 沼泽；湿地 vt. 使陷于沼泽；使沉没；使陷入困境 vi. 下沉；陷入沼泽；陷入困境；不知所措（过去式swamped，过去分词swamped，现在分词swamping，第三人称单数swamps，名词swampiness，形容词swampy） 同义词:wetland, cienaga, embog, sunk His words were swamped by the laughter.他的话淹没在笑声之中。
vi. 挤满；成群浮游；云集 n. 蜂群；一大群 vt. 挤满；爬 同义词:burst at the seams, be packed with, cloud, horde, climb, burst at the seams The students swarmed out of the classroom.学生们蜂拥着跑出了教室。
vt. 扫除；猛拉；掸去 vi. 扫，打扫；席卷；扫视；袭击 n. 打扫，扫除；范围；全胜 同义词:clean off, broom, clean, do out, extent, boundary, region, spectrum, territory, area to sweep the yard清扫庭院
n. 扫除；垃圾 adj. 彻底的；广泛的；扫荡的 v. 打扫；扫除（sweep的现在分词形式） 同义词:refuse, garbage, junk, thorough, extensive, widespread, complete, radical, scavenging to sweep the yard清扫庭院
adj. [生态] 共生的；共栖的 同义词:paragenetic If true , the symbiotic nature of a cell provides a couple of lessons .如果这是真的，那么细胞所具有的这种共生本性，就能为我们提供不少的教益。
adj. 匀称的，对称的 同义词:well-proportioned, meristic This problem can be avoided by using three components which produce a symmetrical path curve .使用三块能产生反对称形路径曲线的元件，即可避免上述问题。
adj. 同情的；交感神经的；共鸣的；赞同的；和谐的；合意的 n. 交感神经；容易感受的人 同义词:harmonious, balanced, acceptable, vagus nerve Those supposed supporters swore that they would be sympathetic to our plan .那些所谓的支持者发誓说他们会赞成这个计划。
adj. 综合的；合成的，人造的 n. 合成物 同义词:comprehensive, integrated, artificial, general, composition Highly flammable synthetic materials should be avoided .高度易燃的合成材料应被避免。
n. 糖浆，果汁；含药糖浆 同义词:juice, sirup Sometimes it registers slowly , as though you 're a maple tree tapped for its syrup .有时候这种感觉显现得很慢，就好像你是一棵正在收取糖浆的枫木那么地慢；
n. 高原；台地 同义词:meseta, altiplano Night slowly reached tableland .夜，款款地来到高原上。
vt. 拿，取；采取；吃；接受 vi. 拿；获得 同义词:carry, adopt, have, eat, assume, pick up, get access to Taking a pen in her hand,she began to write.她手里拿着一支钢笔，开始写起来。

n. 关税表；收费表 vt. 定税率；征收关税 As a group , brokers have demonstrated much more muscle in engineering tariff reductions than fund managers are ever able to do on their own .作为一个团体，经纪人已经表明，在设法降低收费上，他们比基金经理人自身的力量要大得多。
n. 酒馆；客栈 同义词:hotel, pub He stayed pretty long in tavern .他在酒店里呆了很久。
n. [建] 构造学，[地质] 构造地质学 同义词:structural geology Geologists describe the motion of the plates and the consequences of such motion as plate tectonics .地质学家把板块运动及这种运动所造成的后果看作是板块构造运动。
n. 沉闷；单调乏味；厌烦 同义词:heavy-footedness, oppression I didn't know how to while tedium .我不知道如何度过乏味的时刻。
n. [通信] 电报机，电报 vt. 电汇；流露出；打电报给… vi. 打电报 同义词:wire, tgm, wire transfer, cable transfer, wire She has telegraphed the message to her parents.她已给父母打电报了。
n. 庙宇；寺院；神殿；太阳穴 同义词:vihara, fane Is there a temple here , too ?这儿是不是也有一个寺庙？
adv. 临时地，临时 同义词:provisionally, casually That net outward flow of investment continues , although in 2005 and 2006 the trend temporarily reversed .这种向外的投资流仍在继续，尽管2005年和2006年这一趋势被暂时扭转。
n. 承租人；房客；佃户；居住者 vt. 租借（常用于被动语态） 同义词:lessee, renter, rent The house is tenanted by two Chinese students.这所房屋由两个中国学生租住。
n. 倾向，趋势；癖好 同义词:liability, trend, direction, tide, set Since gravity works equally on everything, there would be a tendency to pull those uneven places down.由于重力作用于物体上是相等的，会有倾向于将受力不相等的地方拉平。
n. 房屋；住户，租户；租房子 同义词:housing, whare She lived in that gloomy tenement , a place not fit for swine .她就住在那幢阴暗的、连猪也不宜住的公寓里。
n. 触手，[动] 触须，[动] 触角 同义词:antenna, palpus The tentacle may and be only a pseudomorph , unbearable admonishes Italy .触手可及只是假象、咫尺天涯才是箴意。

n. 末端；终点；终端机；极限 adj. 末端的；终点的；晚期的 同义词:destination, limitation, threshold, bottom, goal, advanced, finishing, marginal Circuit terminal . Use text block control handle to position terminal number .电路端子。用文本块控制手柄来定位端子号。
n. 术语，术语学；用辞 同义词:technology, onym The terminology of financial markets can be imprecise .金融市场术语的定义也许不那么精准。
n. 平台；梯田；阳台 vt. 使成梯田，使成阶地；使有平台屋顶 vi. 成阶地；成梯田；筑成坛 adj. （女服）叠层式的 同义词:platform, balcony a terraced garden梯形花园

n. [地理] 地形，地势；领域；地带 同义词:domain, province, world, kingdom, universe He saw mountains casting shadows on the moon and realised this body was a world , like the Earth , endowed with complicated terrain .于是他看见群山在月亮上投下影子，才意识到月球正如地球一般，也是一个地形复杂的世界。
adj. 地球的；陆地的，[生物] 陆生的；人间的 n. 陆地生物；地球上的人 同义词:earthly, telluric He hopes to distribute it on terrestrial television soon .他希望尽快在无线电视上播放。
vt. 证明，证实；作证 vi. 作证；证明 同义词:demonstrate, prove, favor, make sure, argue, seal of, give evidence of She testified under oath that the defendant was innocent.她发誓证明被告无罪。
n. 纺织品，织物 adj. 纺织的 同义词:cloth, web, spinning Perhaps I 'd better explain . I represent a very large textile group .也许我最好说明一下。我代表一个很大的纺织品集团。
n. 质地；纹理；结构；本质，实质 同义词:essence, configuration, mechanics, framework, substance, truth, principle carpets textured with patterns in high and low pile用长短绒织成各式图案的地毯
n. 大腿，股 同义词:upper leg A small fish brushed against his thigh , sending a shock like electricity through his body.一条小鱼碰了他的大腿一下，他觉得那鱼像是对他闪电般地一刺。
n. 线；螺纹；思路；衣服；线状物；玻璃纤维；路线 vt. 穿过；穿线于；使交织 vi. 通过；穿透过 同义词:string, clothes, array, line, route, move through, go across, get through sth, get across The girl threaded the needle for her mother.女孩为妈妈穿针。
n. 三，三个 num. 三 adj. 三的，三个的 同义词:trois, trinal, ternate Three is go-between among them .他们中的三个是中间人。
vi. 繁荣，兴旺；茁壮成长 同义词:succeed, flower The region is thriving.这个地区繁荣起来了。
n. [气象] 雷暴；雷暴雨；大雷雨 同义词:electrical storm, tornado On the way here , we flew over a thunderstorm .在来这里的路上，我们飞越了一场雷暴。
vi. 倾斜；翘起；以言词或文字抨击 vt. 使倾斜；使翘起 n. 倾斜 同义词:pitch, slope, lean, slope, lean, slope, pitch, clino The girl tilted her head forward.女孩把头向前倾。
n. 木材；木料 同义词:wood, tree They sped the shipment of furs , then timber , iron , grain and coal .他们加快了皮毛的航运，然后是木材、铁、谷物和煤炭。
n. 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数 vt. 计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度 adj. 定时的；定期的；分期的 同义词:era, age, when, multiple, regular, stated, periodic, delayed to time an invasion选择入侵的时机
n. 胆怯，胆小；羞怯 同义词:cowardliness, timorousness Besides , you could hardly accuse Mr Obama of timidity .此外，你也不能指责奥巴马胆怯。
n. 纸巾；薄纱；一套 vt. 饰以薄纱；用化妆纸揩去 同义词:set, gauze a pool tissued with ice水面结薄冰的池塘
adv. 向前；（门等）关上 prep. 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向 同义词:forth, ahead, along, forwards, front, unto, towards, at, out turn to the right向右转
item.phonetic: [强 tu:; 弱 tu; 辅音前弱tə; t]

item.trans: n. 公差；宽容；容忍；公差 同义词:patience, charity, mercy But zero tolerance of what ?但对什么零容忍呢？
vt. 忍受；默许；宽恕 同义词:stomach, go, stand, abide, tough to tolerate heresy容许信奉异教
adj. 地志的；地形学的（等于topographic） 同义词:physiographic Topographical detail visible in daylight is printed in subdued colours .白昼可见的地形起伏部采用色调柔和的颜色印刷。
n. 地势；地形学；地志 同义词:terrain, surface relief The group 's economic geography is as spectacular as its topography .这个组织的经济地理与其地形一样壮观。
n. [气象] 龙卷风；旋风；暴风；大雷雨 同义词:cyclone, Tornado Jockey First you 'll need a background plate : a shot of a tornado swirling through the sky .首先，你需要一个背景平台：一张龙卷风在天空肆虐的照片。
n. 转矩，[力] 扭矩；项圈，金属领圈 同义词:torgue, turning moment The cage is connected by a spindle to the torque spring and pointer .用销子将其骨架结构与转矩弹簧和指针连接。
adj. 猛烈的，汹涌的；奔流的 同义词:fierce, violent, hard The region has been pounded with torrential rain for the past four days.这一地区在最近四天里连续遭受了暴雨的袭击。
adj. 有毒的；中毒的 同义词:poisonous, virous The House and Senate each passed bills the next year to control toxic substances .美众议院与参议院各自通过了明年的控制有毒物质的法案。
vi. 追溯；沿路走 vt. 追踪，查探；描绘；回溯 n. 痕迹，踪迹；微量；[仪] 迹线；缰绳 同义词:go back, carry up, represent, figure, trail, suggestion, mark, tail, drop The murderer was traced to Paris.那个凶手被追踪到巴黎。
n. 轨道；足迹，踪迹；小道 vt. 追踪；通过；循路而行；用纤拉 vi. 追踪；走；留下足迹 同义词:path, railway, tail, trajectory, orbit, clear, trail, go, walk, step to track game追踪猎物
vt. 践踏；蔑视，伤害 vi. 践踏；蔑视，伤害；脚步沉重地走 n. 蹂躏；践踏声 同义词:knife, ride down, ride down, wound, havoc to trample on a flower bed踩花坛
n. 宁静；平静 同义词:equilibrium, serenity If you 'll only not tell papa , my going need not disturb the tranquility .你只要不告诉爸爸，那我去，也碍不着任何人的平静。
vt. 胜过，超越 同义词:overcome, exceed, top, cap, surpass kindness that transcends mere courtesy决非仅是礼节性的善意
n. 转让；转移；传递；过户 vi. 转让；转学；换车 vt. 使转移；调任 同义词:negotiation, diversion, make over, dispose of, hand, negotiate They will transfer those books into the new library.他们将把那些书搬进新的图书馆。
vt. 改变，使…变形；转换 vi. 变换，改变；转化 同义词:influence, fashion, vary, innovate, veer from, to change A little paint will transform this old car.喷点漆就能让这辆旧车变个模样。
n. [遗] 转化；转换；改革；变形 同义词:conversion, deformation, reform, distortion, switching And in this way , these women enacted a lot of transformation , beautiful transformation .通过这种方式，这些女人转变了许多，这是一种美丽的转变。
n. 过渡；转变；[分子生物] 转换；变调 同义词:conversion, switching, changing But he said the courts have undermined the transition .但是他表示法院却破坏了这一转变。
adj. 透明的；半透明的 同义词:crystal, limpid Yet almost all these animals , such as jellyfish, qualify only as " very translucent , " not totally see -through.然而这类动物绝大部份只能算是「高度半透明」，还不算完全透明。
vt. 传输；传播；发射；传达；遗传 vi. 传输；发射信号 同义词:release, send, communicate, project, let go He has transmitted the report to us.他已经把报告传送给我们。

n. [电讯] 发射机，[通信] 发报机；传达人 同义词:sender, communicator The transmitter sends out short intense bursts or pulses of energy with a relatively long interval between pulses .发射机发出的是短促而又强烈的，具有相当长的时间间隔的能量“突发”即能量脉冲。
adj. 透明的；显然的；坦率的；易懂的 同义词:apparent, honest, decided, crystal, open They also secrete a waxy , transparent substance called cutin .它们还分泌蜡质的透明物质，称作角质。
vt. 移植；迁移；使移居 n. 移植；移植器官；被移植物；移居者 vi. 移植；迁移；移居 同义词:remove, transfer of culture, implantation, engraftment, remove, move I transplanted those flowers to the garden.我把那些花移植到花园里。
vt. 诱捕；使…受限制；使…陷入困境 n. 陷阱；圈套；[建] 存水弯 vi. 设陷阱 同义词:ensnare, web, mesh, pit He used some cheese to trap the rat.他用了些乳酪诱捕耗子。
n. 踏；胎面；步态；鞋底；踏板；梯级 vt. 踏；踩；践踏；跳；踩出 vi. 踏；踩；行走；交尾 同义词:step, sole, trample down, ride down, step, set foot to tread grapes踩葡萄(榨汁)
n. [法] 叛国罪；不忠 同义词:recreancy He forfeited his estate by treason .他因叛乱罪而被没收地产。
adj. 极大的，巨大的；惊人的 同义词:huge, enormous, massive, macro, vast The impact of evacuation and relocation on those with health or functional impairments can be tremendous .撤离和重新安置对这些健康状况欠佳或身体残疾的人影响极大。
n. 沟，沟渠；战壕；堑壕 vt. 掘沟 vi. 挖战壕；侵害 同义词:sulcus, reen, infringe upon, infringe on to trench land for draining在地面挖沟排水
n. 趋势，倾向；走向 vi. 趋向，伸向 vt. 使…趋向 同义词:tendency, tide, direction, liability, set, verge on, tend towards The river trends north.这条河向北流。
adj. 部落的；种族的 同义词:ethnic, racial Among tribal people all knowledge inherited by tradition .在部落中，通过传统继承的知识。
vi. 滴；细细地流；慢慢地移动 vt. 使…滴；使…淌；使…细细地流 n. 滴，淌；细流 同义词:creep, drop, gutta Tears were trickling down her cheeks.泪水不断地从她的面颊淌下来。
vt. 引发，引起；触发 vi. 松开扳柄 n. 扳机；[电子] 触发器；制滑机 同义词:attract, produce, cause, operate, occasion, flip-flopper to trigger a rifle开枪
adj. 热带的；热情的；酷热的 同义词:intense, warm, hot, enthusiastic, passionate The sky would be clear from sunup to sundown in Florida . The winds would be warm and tropical .但是在佛罗里达，从日出到日落，天空永远是晴朗的。热带风是那样的温暖。
n. 被发现的东西；收藏的东西 The center housed a trove .该中心存放着一件无价之宝。
n. 浴盆；桶 vt. 把…装入桶；为…洗盆浴 vi. 洗盆浴；（衣服等）被放在桶里洗 同义词:bath, barrel And yet it is a harmoniser , not tub -thumper, the UN most needs .话又说回来，现在联合国的确更需要一位调和者而非演说家。
n. 管；电子管；隧道；电视机 vt. 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送 vi. 乘地铁；不及格 同义词:pipe, tunnel, fail, take the subway Jane tubed mathematics.简数学不及格。
vi. 摔倒；倒塌；滚动；打滚；仓惶地行动 vt. 使摔倒；使滚翻；弄乱 n. 跌倒；翻斤斗；跌跤 同义词:collapse, founder, founder, mess, falling down, circumgyration She tumbled off her bicycle.她从自行车上摔了下来。

n. [生态] 苔原；[地理] 冻原；冻土地带 同义词:cold desert, frozen ground Human beings fill every ecological niche on the planet , from the icy tundra to the tropical rain forests to the deserts .从冻土地带到热带雨林，再到沙漠，人类已填满了这个星球的每一个生态位。
n. 隧道；坑道；洞穴通道 vt. 挖；在…打开通道；在…挖掘隧道 vi. 挖掘隧道；打开通道 同义词:tube, cuniculus, dig They tunnelled into solid rock.他们在坚硬的岩石中凿隧道。
adj. 骚乱的，混乱的；狂暴的；吵闹的 同义词:angry, chaotic, troubled, confused IT HAS been another turbulent week for the euro .对于欧元而言，这又是充满骚乱的一周。
n. [税收] 收费高速公路；收税关卡 A lot of cars passed through the turnpike at rush hours .许多车在交通高峰时通过了高速公路。
n. 绿松石；蓝绿色 adj. 蓝绿色的 同义词:turcos, kallaite, glaucous, cyan MoC: Turquoise bicycle shoe fins actualize radishes greenly!绿宝石单车鞋的鳍让萝卜变绿了！
vt. 使缠绕；使交织；编饰 vi. 缠绕；搓；交织；编饰 n. 麻线；细绳；搓；合股线 同义词:thread, ensnarl, wind, twist up, string, drawstring The girl twined her fingers and then untwined them.女孩把手指交叉，然后又把它们松开。
vt. 捻；拧；扭伤；编织；使苦恼 n. 扭曲；拧；扭伤 vi. 扭动；弯曲 同义词:screw, harry, distortion, strain, bend, double up She twisted many threads to make this rope.她用许多条线搓成这条绳子。
vt. 代表；作为…的典型；具有…的特点 同义词:to stand for, represent for He typifies the uncompromising reformer.他是不屈不挠的改革者的典型。
adj. 残暴的；暴君的；专横的 同义词:ruffianly, atrocious The people soon reacted against the tyrannical system .人们不久便起来反抗暴政。
adj. [声] 超声的；超音速的 n. 超声波 同义词:transsonic, supersonic, ultrasound wave ultrasonic and CT examination were important means in diagnosis .超和ct检查是诊断急性胰腺炎的良好辅助手段。
adj. 朴素的；未装饰的 同义词:plain, frugal Loveliness , needs not the foreign aid of ornament , but is when unadorned , adorned the most.美丽的东西不需要外在的装饰，天然无雕饰是最好的装饰。
adj. 不能架桥的；不能逾越的 While Israel 's leader refused to accept the two - state idea , it was unbridgeable .以色列领导人拒绝接受两国共存主张，这是无法弥合的。
adj. 未知的；图上未标明的 同义词:unknown, sealed In fact we are entering uncharted territory .事实上，我们正进入一个未知的地域。
vt. 经历，经受；忍受 [过去式underwent 过去分词undergone 现在分词undergoing ] 同义词:experience, stand, stomach, tough, abide The city has undergone many changes during the last ten years.这个城市在过去十年中经历了很多变化。
adj. 潜在的；根本的；在下面的；优先的 v. 放在…的下面；为…的基础；优先于（underlie的ing形式） 同义词:organic, potential, fundamental, preferred, ultimate Shale underlies the coal.页岩层在煤层下面。
vt. 承担，保证；从事；同意；试图 同义词:accept, pursue, address, try, offer We could undertake the work for the time being.我们可以暂时从事这项工作。
adv. 确实地，无庸置疑地 同义词:strictly, real These breakthroughs will undoubtedly lead to further advancements in the near future .毫无疑问，这些突破将导致未来的进一步发展。
adj. [地质] 未勘查过的 Iraq is also estimated to have a large supply of oil , and unexplored areas may hold much more .伊拉克也被预计可以供应大量的石油，并且未探测的区域的石油含量更多。
adj. 未施肥的；土地不肥沃的 He remains an un - impregnated ovum , an unfertilized pistil .他依旧是一个未受胎的卵，一个未得花粉的雌蕊。

adj. 不可思议的；难以想像的 同义词:magic, mysterious, miraculous, fantastic However , the key point is that the last 18 months have already produced a stream of once unimaginable events .然而重点在于，过去18个月已经发生了一连串曾经以为是不可思议的事件。
adj. 无人居住的，杳无人迹的 同义词:unpopulated, tenantless These tribes roved through the uninhabited areas hunting game .这些部族寻找猎物走遍了那无人地区。

adj. 味道差的，难吃的；讨人厌的，使人不快的 同义词:unsavoury, brackish POLITICS , said the late John Kenneth Galbraith , is the art of choosing between the disastrous and the unpalatable .最近，已故经济学家约翰•加尔布雷斯将政治比作是在灾难与不快之间做抉择的艺术。
adj. 空前的；无前例的 同义词:unheard-of, all-time I think this is an unprecedented time .我认为这是一个空前的时期。
adj. 不可预知的；不定的；出乎意料的 n. 不可预言的事 同义词:changeable, errant Some economists took the fact that prices were unpredictable to infer that prices were in fact " right ".一些经济学家凭借价格不可预测这一事实，来推断价格实际上是“正确”的。
adj. 无前途的，没有希望的 同义词:futureless It also diverts computational cycles away from unpromising areas .它还把计算周期转移出没有希望的区。
vt. 解开；阐明；解决；拆散 vi. 解决；散开 同义词:decide, settle, illustrate, settle, work out, figure out The child unraveled grandma's knitting.这个孩子弄散了奶奶的编织物。
adj. 自由的；无限制的；不受束缚的 同义词:free, unlimited The aim is to ensure the availability of enough safe drinking water to allow unrestricted distribution .确保有足够的、可自由分配的安全饮用水是我们的目标。
adj. 未经证实的，无事实根据的 同义词:uncorroborated, unattested Many contemporary publications quote figures that unsubstantiated .许多现行刊物所采用的数字是不确切的。

adj. 未受影响的；未改变的；未触动过的；不受感动的 同义词:unchanged, uninfluenced While much of the town is fairly new , there are older , untouched corners where locals get on quietly with their lives .城中的大多地方都是相当新，但也有比较古老，无人触及的角落，而当地人就在这里平静地生活。
vt. 使升级；提升；改良品种 n. 升级；上升；上坡 adv. 往上 adj. 向上的 同义词:promote, prefer, rise, raise, updates, ascension, upward, up to upgrade a clerk to manager将办事员提升为经理
n. 山地，高地 adj. 山地的，高地的 同义词:height, raise, altitude, rise, elevation, highland They move with their flocks upland pastures .他们带着牲畜迁往“高原”上的牧场。
adj. 城市的；住在都市的 同义词:city And notice how state and major urban area fusion centres will in future share information .再来看一下各州和主要城市区域融合中心未来将如何共享情报吧。
n. 都市生活；都市集中 同义词:urban life This whole journal edition is devoted to New Urbanism , with a number of case studies .这本期刊全部内容刊载关于新都市主义的文章，并有许多个案研究。
n. 都市人 More and more urbanite , begin to pay attention to mental health problem , this is with healthy likewise important .越来越多的都市人，开始注重心理健康问题，这是与身体健康同样重要的。
n. 都市化；文雅化 to urbanize a district使一地区城市化
vt. 使都市化；使文雅 同义词:citify to urbanize a district使一地区城市化
n. 引座员，带位员；接待员；门房 vt. 引导，招待；迎接；开辟 vi. 作招待员；当引座员 同义词:porter, receptionist, aim, serve, invite, attend, guest, ush I was ushered into the headmaster's office by my teacher.老师领着我进入了校长的办公室。
adj. 功利的；功利主义的；实利的 n. 功利主义者 " We see it as a purely utilitarian initiative, " he says .他说：“我们仅是单纯地视其为一个实用主义策略。”

n. 实用；效用；公共设施；功用 adj. 实用的；通用的；有多种用途的 同义词:practical use, public facility, applied, universal, current Diminishing marginal utility also expresses a " variety is the spice of life ".边际效用递减也表现为一种“多样化是生活乐趣”。
n. 利用，使用 同义词:employment, usage, exploitation, use We must utilize all available resources.我们必须利用可以得到的一切资源。
vt. 利用 同义词:do with, trade on, capitalize on, avail of, presume on We must utilize all available resources.我们必须利用可以得到的一切资源。
adj. 乌托邦的；空想的；理想化的 n. 空想家；乌托邦的居民 同义词:romantic, fantastic, daydreamer, fancier Having set out the tenets of Utopian economics , the author then pokes holes in them .提出乌托邦经济学这一概念之后，作者开始揭露其中薄弱之处。

adv. 完全地；绝对地；全然地；彻底地，十足地 同义词:totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, fully, strictly Today the notion of forever concealing the murder of many millions of people may seem utterly crazy .今天，要想永远掩盖起对于百万人的屠杀，这种想法似乎是荒唐透顶的。
n. 空缺；空位；空白；空虚 同义词:gap, blank I see a vacancy board outside for a kitchen helper . Is it still available?我在外面招工牌上看到有个厨房帮手的空缺。这空位现在还有吗？
vi. 消失；突然不见；成为零 vt. 使不见，使消失 n. 弱化音 同义词:disappear, blank, unmake The mysterious woman passenger vanished.这位神秘的女乘客突然不见了。
adj. 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的 n. [数] 变量；可变物，可变因素 同义词:mobile, liquid, unstable Fixed , variable , and mixed costs can be graphed as functions of their cost drivers .固定、变、合成本可以以其成本动因的不同功能用图表表示。

n. 变异；变化；不一致；分歧；[数] 方差 同义词:differentiation, shift, change, diversification, turn This was mainly because of the ability of detecting genetic variance of the two techniques .多样性上略有差异，这主要是因为两种技术的对遗传变异的检测能力不同。
n. 亮光漆，清漆；虚饰；光泽面 vt. 装饰，粉饰；在…上涂清漆；使…有光泽 同义词:vernis, frills, colour, paint, hang, sugar Don't sit on that chair ——I've just varnished it.别坐在那个椅子上，我刚上完清漆。
n. 拱顶；撑竿跳；地下室 vi. 跳跃；成穹状弯曲 vt. 做成圆拱形；撑竿跳过 同义词:basement, undercroft, jump, dance He came to the gate and vaulted over.他来到大门前，一跃而过。
n. 植被；植物，草木；呆板单调的生活 同义词:plant, vegetative cover This means removing all vegetation , right down to the soil .这意味着把所有的植被埋到土壤里面。
n. 面纱；面罩；遮蔽物；托词 vt. 遮蔽；掩饰；以面纱遮掩；用帷幕分隔 vi. 蒙上面纱；出现轻度灰雾 同义词:yashmak, facemask, shadow, shield, curtain She veiled her face when she went out into the street.她上街时用面纱蒙着脸。
n. 脉纹的排列；脉络 v. 使有纹理（vein的现在分词形式） 同义词:venation Low expansion resin is, prevents from casting defects , especially veining and hot tear caused from thermal expansion.低膨胀树脂对解决铸造缺陷，特别是对毛刺、热裂尤为有效。
n. [力] 速率；迅速；周转率 同义词:speed rate, expedition But such velocity antiatoms are not very useful .不过这种高速的反原子并不是很有用。
adj. 庄严的，值得尊敬的；珍贵的 同义词:precious, golden, solemn, sacred, majestic These venerable glasses disappeared a couple of weeks ago .这副有年头的墨镜前几周不见了。
n. （感情的）发泄；出口；通风孔 vt. 发泄感情；放出…；给…开孔 vi. 放出；（通过排泄等）减轻压力 同义词:exit, way out, relieve one's feelings, reel out, let off to vent smoke排放烟雾
vt. 敢于 vi. 冒险；投机 n. 企业；风险；冒险 同义词:dare to, be bold to, adventure, take a risk, enterprise, risk, undertaking, throw Men ventured their lives in war.人们在战争中冒着生命的危险。
n. 诗，诗篇；韵文；诗节 同义词:poetry, poem Old girls , now rejected , would quote chapter and verse .过去的女朋友，现在失宠了，会提出旁证。
n. 版本；译文；倒转术 同义词:edition, translation The witness corroborated her version of the event .证人证实了她对那事件的看法。
adj. 脊椎动物的；有脊椎的 n. 脊椎动物 同义词:backboned, amniote Of or characteristic of vertebrates or a vertebrate .贪婪是一个守财奴的主要特点。
adj. 垂直的，直立的；[解剖] 头顶的，顶点的 n. 垂直线，垂直面 同义词:standing, perpendicular, perpendicular plane, perpendicular line We call this the vertical migration .我们叫他们垂直迁徙。
n. 船，舰；[组织] 脉管，血管；容器，器皿 同义词:container, ship, pocket a vessel of wrath遭天罚的人
adj. 可行的；能养活的；能生育的 同义词:feasible, working This proved that the technology , although still at an early stage , was viable .这表明：该技术尽管仍处于萌芽阶段，但确是可行的。
n. 警戒，警觉；警醒症 同义词:guard, alertness And its best defence remains the extraordinary resourcefulness , common sense and vigilance of its people .而香港地位的最好的捍卫仍是香港人的智慧，判断和警醒。

n. 暴力；侵犯；激烈；歪曲 同义词:invasion, infringement In the novel , them , or in almost all of Oates? s works , there are three themes : woman , violence , and community .在小说《他们》，或在其几乎所有的作品中，主要体现了三种主题思想：女性，暴力和社区。
adj. 滤过性毒菌引起的；滤过性毒菌的 The virus ( viral ) sickness is one of the world 's most destructive diseases of livestock .此类病毒性疾病是世界上对牲畜破坏性最大的疾病之一。
n. [病毒] 病毒；恶毒；毒害 同义词:vindictiveness, Vyrus I talked to you over the computer , and you gave me a virus .我通过计算机跟你交谈，你竟然传染给我一个病毒。
n. [物] 粘性，[物] 粘度 同义词:stickiness, adhesiveness Glass and pitch behave like supercooled liquids of very high viscosity .玻璃和沥青的行为很像具有极高粘滞性的过冷液体。
adj. 生动的；鲜明的；鲜艳的 同义词:telling, live, bright An old soldier gave us a vivid account of the Long March .一位老战士有声有色地给我们叙述了长征的故事。
adj. 空的；无效的；无人的 n. 空虚；空间；空隙 vt. 使无效；排放 同义词:empty, hollow, useless, bare, vacant, vacuum, room, clearance, blank, emptiness, invalidate, nullify to void a check使支票无效

adj. [化学] 挥发性的；不稳定的；爆炸性的；反覆无常的 n. 挥发物；有翅的动物 同义词:unstable, explosive Also the best trades often crop up at the point when investors are most nervous and markets are most volatile .同样，最景气的行业也总是在投资者们最紧张、市场最不稳定的情况下突然出现。

adj. 火山的；猛烈的；易突然发作的 n. 火山岩 同义词:fierce, violent, hard, eruptive rock, extrusive rock Natural aerosols are produced by sea salt , desert dust , volcanic eruptions and smoke from forest fires .天然的浮质是由海盐、沙漠灰尘、火山爆发物与森林火情的烟雾产生的；
n. 火山 Let 's look inside a volcano .让我们来看看火山内部。
adj. 贪婪的；贪吃的；狼吞虎咽的 同义词:greedy, grasping The British are the most voracious newspaper readers in the world .英国人是世界上最贪婪的新闻读者们。
adj. 易受攻击的，易受…的攻击；易受伤害的；有弱点的 同义词:sensitive, assailable But modern humans were more vulnerable to the cold .但是现代人更容易受到寒冷的攻击。
n. 腰，腰部 同义词:middle, loin The upshot is a device that weighs around 5kg and can be strapped to a user 's waist .其产物便是一种重量仅为5千克左右、可被绑在使用者腰部的装置。
n. 胡桃；胡桃木 adj. 胡桃科植物的 同义词:juglans Would you like some walnut cream ?你要来点奶油核桃吗？

n. 病房；保卫；监视 vt. 避开；保卫；守护 同义词:observation, safeguard, monitoring, surveillance, watch, avoid, guard, shun More importantly , he went on, his knowledge means that he can now take measures to ward off the disease .随后他解释道，更重要的是，我知道了这些信息之后就可以采取措施预防患病。
n. 仓库；货栈；大商店 vt. 储入仓库；以他人名义购进（股票） 同义词:stockroom, godown Baths were taken in the warehouse once a week by carrying hot water to the tub .货栈成了洗澡的地方，每周一次，热水是打到澡盆里的。
adj. 谨慎的；机警的；惟恐的；考虑周到的 同义词:cautious, prudent Many are wary of capital inflows , having been hit by their reversal in the past .许多国家对资金流入小心谨慎，它们在过去遭到撤资的打击。
adj. 谨慎的；机警的；惟恐的；考虑周到的 同义词:cautious, prudent Many are wary of capital inflows , having been hit by their reversal in the past .许多国家对资金流入小心谨慎，它们在过去遭到撤资的打击。
n. 河道；水道 同义词:canal, riverway This same Hezekiah also stopped the upper watercourse of Gihon , and brought it straight down to the west side of the city of David .这希西家也塞住基训的上源，引水直下，流在大卫城的西边。
adj. 柔软的；蜡色的；像蜡的；苍白的 同义词:soft, tender, gray, ductile And the waxy oil keeps ears from getting too dry .同时耳蜡也可以避免耳朵过于干燥。
adj. 疲倦的；厌烦的；令人厌烦的 vi. 疲倦；厌烦 vt. 使疲倦；使厌烦 同义词:tired, worn, trying, boring, harassed, jade, be tired out, labor, jade Mary wouldn't admit how much the children wearied her.玛丽无法容忍孩子们对她的烦扰。

n. 天气；气象；气候；处境 vt. 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打 vi. 风化；受侵蚀；经受风雨 adj. 露天的；迎风的 同义词:climate, situation, last out, eat into, bloom out, effloresce, outdoor, unroofed They are going to weather the corn in the thrashing field.他们要把玉米在打谷场晾晒干。
n. [地质] 风化作用；[水利] 泻水斜度；挡风雨材料 v. 风干；使退色；经受住（weather的ing形式） 同义词:eolation, airing Certain plants play an additional role in weathering .某些植物起了风化作用的辅助作用。
adj. 怪异的；不可思议的；超自然的 n. （苏格兰）命运；预言 同义词:magic, mysterious, fantastic, fate, prediction, lot, destiny, fortune Wait , is that a new weird kid from Pakistan ?等一下，是不是那个新来的巴基斯坦怪小孩？
vt. 焊接；使结合；使成整体 vi. 焊牢 n. 焊接；焊接点 同义词:combine, bond, jointing, soldering to weld the crack in the water pipe焊接水管的裂缝
adv. 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地 adj. 良好的；健康的；适宜的 n. 井；源泉 同义词:fully, properly, fine, adequately, wide, healthy, favorable, robust, fine, fit, principle, fountain I felt tears well up in my eyes.我感到眼泪涌出我的双眼。
adv. 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地 adj. 良好的；健康的；适宜的 n. 井；源泉 同义词:fully, properly, fine, adequately, wide, healthy, favorable, robust, fine, fit, principle, fountain I felt tears well up in my eyes.我感到眼泪涌出我的双眼。
n. 奇想；一时的兴致；怪念头；幻想 同义词:vagary, fancy Now he is subjecting Parliament to whim .现在他强迫国会听命于自己的率性政治。
vt. 削；削减；切；削弱 vi. 削；削木头；弄坏身体 n. 屠刀 同义词:break, log, butcher knife Don't whittle the stick into a short one.别把木棍削成短的棍。
adj. 批发的；大规模的 n. 批发 adv. 大规模地；以批发方式 vt. 批发 vi. 批发；经营批发业 同义词:mass, wide-scale, sales by bulk, cosmically This kind of wine wholesales at $50 per case.这种葡萄酒批发每箱50美元。
adj. 健全的；有益健康的；合乎卫生的；审慎的 同义词:healthy, calculating, sound I believe that sex is one of the most beautiful , natural , wholesome things that money can buy .我相信性是金钱能买到的最漂亮的，自然的，有益健康的东西。
n. [林] 柳树；[木] 柳木制品 adj. 柳木制的 同义词:Salix He says most of his childhood friends now Willow Creek, an evangelical behemoth in Chicago 's suburbs .他说，他的大多数儿时伙伴现在都去位于芝加哥郊区的柳树溪教会这一福音大派了。
n. 证人；目击者；证据 vt. 目击；证明；为…作证 vi. 作证人 同义词:proof, teste, demonstrate, prove, argue I can witness that he wasn't at the scene of the crime.我可以证明他不在案发现场。
vt. 包；缠绕；隐藏；掩护 vi. 包起来；缠绕；穿外衣 n. 外套；围巾 同义词:wind, lock, wind, outerwear, outer coat to wrap a baby in a blanket用毯子把婴儿裹起来
n. 破坏；失事；残骸；失去健康的人 vt. 破坏；使失事；拆毁 vi. 失事；营救失事船只 同义词:destruction, breaking, blasting, remain, disruption, destroy, undermine, founder My car was completely wrecked in the accident.我的车在这次车祸中彻底毁了。
n. 摔跤；扭斗 v. 摔跤；格斗（wrestle的ing形式）；与…摔跤；使劲移动 同义词:rassle, rassling They are going to wrestle a match next month.他们下月要进行一场摔跤比赛。
n. 纱线；奇谈，故事 vt. 用纱线缠 vi. 讲故事 同义词:relation, story, tale, narrative, tell a story The yarn is carefully selected for quality and woven very tightly in this fabric.这纱的质量是经过精心挑选的。而且质地织得很紧密。
vt. 屈服；出产；放弃 vi. 屈服，投降 n. 产量；收益 同义词:desert, quit, succumb, to surrender, crop, output, harvest, proceeds an orchard that yielded a good crop收成好的果园
n. 蛋黄；[胚] 卵黄；羊毛脂 同义词:vitellus, yelk The cost of a lifetime spent opening eggs incompetently is a small amount of wasted time and some spilled yolk .敲不好鸡蛋的严重后果也就是花点时间收拾一下洒出来的蛋黄而已！

adj. 热心的，热情的，积极的 同义词:intense, active, positive, eager, warm This happened in Poland zealous sleaze -hunters of the Law and Justice Party squandered their election win in 2005 .这种情况在波兰发生过，雄心勃勃的公平法制党在2005年赢得了大选便轰轰烈烈的反腐。
